1b1(dkar chag 1): n+ya gro'i sngor ltar chu zheng gab pa'i btse pa'i gser bzhin dbu ni dbabs legs gdugs// debye rgyas dri mengad mdzod du sbe dbus stugacing sa 'dreb cing la'i 'ang ba bzhin
1b2(dkar chag 1): sbyar dgus ring // dkar nag pa 'dres rim par kun tus tho ba'i shangs dang bim pa ltar dmar yid 'ong mchu// thags bzang srab mnyer snyan 'phyang mgrin mdzes mi mngon gnyen chags rnal phyag 'tshal 'dud// legs
1b3(dkar chag 1): bcu'i ming kur ma lus 'gengs shing sems can kun gyi yid dang mthun// don bzang ma 'dres gang gi rna bar lhung de'i tshen mongs 'breg par byed// dri zag la ping ka tshang pa shang shang ti'u dbang po'i dbangs lngar snyan/ 
1b4(dkar chag 1): skal ldan rna ba'i bcud chen ma rig mun bsel ngam pa'i rjes la 'dud// legs par zhugs dang rigs drangs mthun par zhugs// phag dang bsod nams shing gi dpal gyur pa//  nga chub ster ba'i sku
1b5(dkar chag 1): gcig pu// sa 'dus pa'i sde la snying nas 'dud// dpag med dus nas mngon par sangs rgyas kyang // tshad med thugs rje'i gzhan dbang gyur pa'i mthus// mu med ning du drangs reng sprul pa yi// 
1b6(dkar chag 1): daser ge sa tha rang bag 'tshal 'dud// kun lam ltar brtse ba'i thugs rje yis// kun tu 'dul bar dka' ba'i bde 'bangs rnams// kun mkhyen ge 'phang mcheg la 'gang mdzad pa// kun
1b7(dkar chag 1): gzigs sarnam ra phyag 'tshal 'dud// dka' bskur len sreg la'ang mi 'dzem par// rgya gar yul du gshegs nas lung rigs gnyis// legs bsgyur mur rum gnas pa'i bad yul
1b8(dkar chag 1): 'dar// bstan pa gsal mdzad le pa Na zhabs la 'dud // khyad par gangs can ldengs 'dir bstan pa'i bdag/ srid pa gsum gyis mkhan sten par grags// rgyal bas lung bstan dadres pa'i khe tsA ba
1b9(dkar chag 1): dri ldan shes rab zhabs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bstar ba gnas dang mi brjed dran pa'i gzungs// bre gres rgyas mdzad mkhas pa kun gyis sngags// yen tan kun gyi gzhir gyur sprul pa'i sku// gsal byed yi
1b10(dkar chag 1): ge'i tshigs la phyag 'tshal le// ka ye gsan dang skal ldan lha mi kur// gang ma 'di snyan gyi bu gar lhung ba na// sdebs legs blo gsal yid 'breg ma nus pas// 'chang rdung rtsom pa'i khur la shugs
1b11(dkar chag 1): ma rings/ steng bcung ring chags dga' ba'i gtam gleng na// steng gsal dngas pa nam mkha' lta bu la// legs bzhi mtshams nas las rlung phra me yis// rlung dkyil sde sra rngam du dpag chad ni/ 
2a1(dkar chag 1): sa la drug 'bum rgyar ni grangs med do// de ste chung kyil rngam du dag chad de// 'dum phrag bcu gcig stong da nyi shul// rgyar ni dag chad 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang // sram sno brgya sa
2a2(dkar chag 1): byeng dang lnga pa chags// de steng gser gyis gzhi dpag chad ni// sum 'bum bzhi khri'i dbus su ri rab ni// rin chen bzhi las grub cing mngon par mtho// dpag chad brgyad khri nu nang brgyad khri 'bags// de la yongs su bskor ba'i ri bdun
2a3(dkar chag 1): kyang / chu yi nang du ri rgyal 'dra bar nub// steng du 'an khwa ti khri cig khri dang // snga steng steng phrag gnyis dang lnga brgya dang // mi steng brgya dang lnga bcu la legs pa// de dag rim bzhin steng du mngon par 'phags// gling ba ni grang phran
2a4(dkar chag 1): brgyad kyang legs par chags/ gling bzhi'i nang nas lde bregs 'jam bu'i grong // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byon pa'i yul// bcud kyi sems can 'od gsal lha nas chad// tshe le dngag med bsam gtan
2a5(dkar chag 1): ngas la spyod// 'od kyis rang 'tshe rdzu 'phrul mkha' la 'phur// zas su bdud rtsi ma rmes ma btab spyong // 'ded log can gyi sa gnyis thig gis bges// bdag dang gzhan du 'dod pas 'dzin pa byung // de chen la lce gcod
2a6(dkar chag 1): par byed pa yi// mang pos bkur ba'i rgyal po thog mar byon// de nas rgyal rabs bcu gcig rdzogs pa'i mthar// mchog sbyin zhes pa'i rgyal po byon pa'i tshe// tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na 'khor ba 'jig/ 'jig rten khams
2a7(dkar chag 1): bon nas ches 'khor bskor// de nas rgyal rabs sum brgya rdzogs pa'i mthar// tsan+d+ra zhes bya'i rgyal po byon pa'i tshe// che khe sum khri'i dus na gser thub byon// 'jig rten khams 'dir chos kyi 'khor le bskor// de nas rgyal
2a8(dkar chag 1): sum brgya rdzogs pa'i mthar// kri kri zhes pa'i rgyal po byon pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas 'ad srungs 'jig rten khams 'dir byan// 'gro la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad// de nas rgyal rabs mang ba rdzags pa'i mthar/ 'as
2a9(dkar chag 1): gtsang zhes byargyal po byon pa na// ston mchog zas gtsang sras pa 'jig rten byon// de mtshar byang chub shing la sku rgyab brten// srong la bdud btul gung la mnyam par gzhag/ tho rangs byang chub chen po 'dres par mdzad// la
2a10(dkar chag 1): rjes drang srob lhung nags su// theg dman gdul bya lnga sde bzang po la// bden bzhi chos kyi 'khor lo bzher bar mdzad// de nas bya rgong spungs pa'i ri la sogs// gdul bu drung sems dgra bcom chogs rnams la// thun med min pa'i
2a11(dkar chag 1): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// yangam pa can dang 'od ma'i tshas rnams su// don dam rnam dag nges pa'i chos 'khor bskor// mang pos bkur nas sgra gcan 'dzin gyi yar // rgyal rabs sa ya gcig dang 'bum phrag lnga// dam chos 'dul la
2a12(dkar chag 1): gzung las legs par bshad// de yi phyir na ngam chos 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar ldan pa rgya gar 'phags pa'i yul// phyis nas bstan pa bu rgyal bad du dang // chos rgyal gdung rabs rin chen 'phreng ba bzhin// gzhang bre ba can pa
2a13(dkar chag 1): bang bye dpa la las thub// gnas la ji dzun ltang gyi stong gnyis dang // bar gyi legs drug sa la sde brgyad dang // reg gi bcan gsum gdung rabs nyi shu bdun// de nas kun parang nas sprul grob re// rgyal ba'i lung bzhin yum bu tham
2b1(dkar chag 1): dam che mang dung ya'i ma khres tos/ rmongags la mam ma gsu ga ngams bya su rgyas gyi da/ gag/ se sa pa saca 'ayod pa nyi du nus/ sa sa
2b2(dkar chag 1): de nas gdung rabs lnga par ches rgyal ni// chos kyi rgyal po sred pa tsan skam po'i dus// ras 'phrul snang rdzu 'phrul mthu las grub// dam chos par phyir yi ge'i srol yang bye// po shAka rnam gnyis mchod pa'i rten du bzhugs// sangs rgyas bstan pa da gzhing rgyas par matang / 
2b3(dkar chag 1): 'i ma nas sman pa'i dbal thong ba/ phyi'i ma ngo mtsha ldan pa'i gnas kyi 'thug// yan lag 'drung segs 'grab ma ma gapangs dag shes ma pang tsho yi shar// rab gang gis nga byang ldaman stong nga// bcwa gnas can tha bar / 
2b4(dkar chag 1): shwes rnam gnyis 'phags mchog yang sras bzhugs// rdo rje gangan ma tshungs chos 'khor lnga sa'i nug// gnas der phyin pas bdun pa'i sa yang 'grob// bad+ma'i sgrub gams phu mo lding gang // cha ring rgya bar bang rtseg dab byor// grung zong brgyang chung byin pa
2b5(dkar chag 1): shar/ nyams rtogs 'bel ba gangs dkar bu le'i lde// 'phen gyi gdanas dpal ldan sa kwa'i nug// ngag zhing yen tar tshang ba ma che bre'i bang // yul la g.yang chags lhung rje lung ba'i dbus// rgya b.ri badz+ra rab bter bzhugs pa'i ri// rin chen spungs 'dra nang mkha'i mthongs la khengs// rdo rje
2b6(dkar chag 1): gdan gyi rapal yon 'bregs sam ci// bar san bya phran zil gyis gnon pa'ir// byung chernam sab 'phur ba nam mkha'i rgyan// ma rung bya tshogs zil gyis mnananam ci// g.yon ri thabs kyis gzhol zhing dma'as 'dzin// ri zla zung go 'byen lam phye 'am tse// mdun na gtsang
2b7(dkar chag 1): chab sden me dal gyis 'bab// chu ba bad+hA'i yon tan 'phrogs sam si/ ne'u gsing sngon mo mdzes pa'i thang mal brda la/ ba yu le bgeng pa'i yon tan 'phrogs sam ci// 'dur du bor ba lha byim dkyil 'ang 'dir// sku gsung thugs rjer dge 'dun chags ltar 'dus// mcher stin rtsa
2b8(dkar chag 1): mdze ram mkha'i sprin lngar gtings// yongs dag 'phags yul chos kyi dga' tshal yang // kun nas 'pham par mdzad pa ye ma mtshar// steng na lha dang skyob pa'i lha ngo mtho// 'og na klu dang 'dod dgu char bzhir spel// bar na mi dar rnam dag dge ya ye ngas// skyes pa'i mi la grags
2b9(dkar chag 1): ba'i gtam yeng ba// dpa' mdzangs sngon bsags las la yengs skyed pa'i// 'jab lnga lta bu'i rdor legs rang rgyal dang // dab rgyal sdebs ldan gzhan sde yam par byed// bsag pa dang ldan dag la bro sdebs ldan// nor bayang lta bu'i rab rgyas tse nga nga // 'khor bar yid 'bru
2b10(dkar chag 1): sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs// byams pa dpal mo che dbang bu 'dren zhes// gzhin nu nying nas dge ba'i las la brtsen// drin can pha ma me tog zong ltar bcings// lta bu lta bu'i o lo gtsug rgyan dang // g.yos la zas bcung bdud rtsi lta bur sbeng // nor rgyun lta bu'i mangs
2b11(dkar chag 1): sa gyu// mi lus dan ldan ba pa mig bras pa'os// srung la ma'as pa'i bltar 'dzi sus po nga // lhag papa dge pa'i rigs su 'dzin pa sa// de da pang rgyal ma thos nga // 'od dung mnor pa 'thos po la zu// nga sa kyi
2b12(dkar chag 1): yang nang rgyal dang // 'am thal ba 'dra shis bu dren dang // bum mi ring du thaMng la sogs pa// nam ma khyer rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal ze phyi dang // yul khams pang 'a dang 'brug ni bdang //  byug pa legs shing car mu dus 'amar bya// hUM yi rten du 'am bdan 'du dus
3a1(dkar chag 1): stsal rtsa ba tshul ya 'am 'as 'a du yul sa 'a sam
3a2(dkar chag 1): sa bang dbyung ma thasatu tshams mngamatsam sa' mal tshung ma sa ma lal ma tha bca ba sabs tsham gzung banapa dun ma caca byag ma
3a3(dkar chag 1): rabar ba saca/ yul dmas larnapas mam thab sa tshu bame ba da las la maru 'o// ci bcad lanangs la tsa da'ang 'gru ba sarapa yangadramasas
3a4(dkar chag 1): rang su mi mang ca khru ga ngar bsem/ gdum bcu la drir 'argyam ngom pa yi ngas 'phel sa gu rtsas t+yang ba'i lu da / rab su gag/ 'cha ba sngam pam ma mas/ gsadral rim sa babral/ tshi pa ber byeng 'gyuba'i lu ris 'a
3a5(dkar chag 1): du 'aru bas dang / 'dzus 'dul rig pa bdu sa/ rang ra dwang mgyur tsa drilung la ya gyur paras bar bsdu bal bar gra ba/ sprul pa lta lupa la 'as pa byas 'alta 'bras bu ba ba bas ma sa pa bang rangs nga thal ba chabar baches
3a6(dkar chag 1): mang ldal / rgyal tsha byung latsham 'imab margyab stsal la bas par sa ya tu phyir kyang ma ma yal ma tsha ba dbu ma
3a7(dkar chag 1): brtswa lbag sa mags/ gag bag mas gsasas/ kyis 'bras bcu bsum sa kyang cang lda pa cim la/ mi zabs thobang / yul gyin du ji ltung zhes/ 
3a8(dkar chag 1): sa dra ba mdapa gru na mi she chu shes tag/ des paskud pa ni bad rke bang // bangasamams na la mkhyil/ bya chu pe mag 'a rgyas smra/ sa yong lo bdun pa mas los su lu su
3b1(dkar chag 1): can dang du tsas wadu mas mnan tshan/ mas ba sadangs thams // phrab# 'a
3b2(dkar chag 1): bdang ga/ mchar sbyin padab med pa 'di spel na// dngu ma dag ba'i gtam nib theg/ dang // bcanas pa mchag ci kun pa chug ga gcos bcu padam/ ngam mi yang sa/ mamam bya ma'i thung duthum
3b3(dkar chag 1): ri / chumamam dab cog sa ma sadag de pagasas tshung 'baganan pasud shog ga das dngas// chub snying ban sa smra tsam pa shes thams/ tho mos satha brtsag ra thus/ tha lnga sa ma ma ma cha
3b4(dkar chag 1): drags rtsesapa bab gro ga ni drus pag/ gas la ma byed ba 'ar 'i dug/ rig pa'i zhubs dus/ rgya rgya ras ci 'brus rabadas nga nas/ sa sna ma shes batshas sna ba ldan pa mi
3b5(dkar chag 1): dngaN mangs theg da ma yin ma pa'a'/ ma nas car rgyal gel la du byal/ sa rtsam sa bangs dang// bang chus pa yang sel dang / bamam dzi/ ba la gakyis yin/ 'artsalabs
3b6(dkar chag 1): dag rgyal dang /  'al pa zhan 'dzin yod// babs ma dag pa bkra shis dang / b.lag par khrug langs bri ngas tu bras/ rnam sgrub ya sheg pa'i ngas dang // sheg lam bzhed bya 'ang ma'ang// ji ltar tha la grags
3b7(dkar chag 1): thams ma brag pa// dang mas bsgrubs pa'i drub mi gnas bseng rnams// this sna lnga dpa na ltar/ pa ldan lngags las 'khrum// nus ngas dang 'khrul ba la ba'i byed ba pa kham tshang sa la stsas pa'i blo stobs kyis
3b8(dkar chag 1): ba sngags nab rgyam ma 'am phyin// 'du gas smrab dang / smra tshamachag/ rten 'ang ba'i ma thabs macang sam par ma cang zab/ mtsham sa dang bcad grangag las ma gnal bar// rnam gang las la ldan papa gsam pa snang sa// napas
3b9(dkar chag 1): sar du tho nyed bar byag/ mabar ra mashe ma 'a cu'adas 'tshal tsan cigs yang 'ducwa tshi mtshal tu byams/ yi das cha kyis bra tsham pa thangs// langs cang btungab ba yas lanas/ dral chad 'apa me shes thal/ nis ngas la
3b10(dkar chag 1): pa la stsa sa kyi bud ci ku 'al dzang/ kar yag ya thong chub ma mal/ mas ca pa ma nga sa/ ma byi mas tshogs pa zur/ rna pa bsgru la
3b11(dkar chag 1): ma ga malas ya tsal shA ma tsas ga/ car cing bdapa yis yang / tha ma gras pa babyud dal langs/ rkyong na ci da thasugangs madrul sa// ma yim sa tsho
3b12(dkar chag 1): mam sa ma sa sengs bya mos/ nab kyi ma gsas cu da mdas mangs/ dam ma yi/ langs mang mi ba bamangs 'atsa ba lab la tsho'i
4a1(dkar chag 1): / ngas/ shAm byang ma bcad mgyul chab chubanan satha sa nga nyi zug/ dring bab ya sar tra lang su na lan sa mamasa'a'achag sapa sa nga mas pa'ang khas bram babacagata / 
4a2(dkar chag 1): sbu thu dag pa skyes yang // nga ba 'i bcu 'gus dang snyil la gcag/ ma bya ches par ma mgro la cig/ tshan bas mas byam sa 'i sre za rtag pa sas pas dpa brda mig/ ga ci shug tshig nga blan papal bab la// kha la sa bas mchi ye sa sa
4a3(dkar chag 1): kha das pa spa pa ras phul ba las/ tham cangs sa mchogacig su la dang // ma sa sams ca bas rang ra byas ca ba sa das ya rnams pa ga 'akya theg gas gru bdapas la dang semes yangs khyas ma'abar g.yangs masu
4a4(dkar chag 1): dbaba' brtsas pa'i legapas ya dag gi se 'alas par shang bas/ ngar ba nga sam par mdulang mangs/ mam ba 'ang pa lar thung chub / 'bab 'am ma 'a ma ba bya sas mad bya bumala'a'ab sred par snyem pa ched dus tu tsho dang / snga
4a5(dkar chag 1): drug dra bar pa lag gas ya 'am pa ma 'a brgyab pa/ ma byas la pa latshas lams ra las pas/ ma sa yang sa ba ca gral yas bcug/ nas pa das 'dir ma tsham me lo pa/ yang dgas smras pa sa tra m-i pa sha / pham pa'i ses mo spangs 'ang dus pa lams/ 
4a6(dkar chag 1): gdang yang brel log pa gyu thos sa ya ma 'dris slob pa byangs sas/ gas ga sas cad ma chuba'i bdang / khyims ma rgyas ma sa ra gyu sa/ chubakhyen tsha bye paco/ Na spang sa ma chi mi rjo pa'i sa ma byam ngas tshas la/ ma tha
4a7(dkar chag 1): par sto kyis shog/ 'asalam tshogs 'dus sde yongs pa bshis la/ sgyingab rgyal 'ams mongs la 'gra shis shog/ kyang ba ba gsapa dri dI yod/ bshig ba'o// 
1b1(dkar chag 2): daro bu rud+hu dIn can+da dur+ya'i 'das la 'du// 'gro kunasags pa'i dang pa tsam ljon
1b2(dkar chag 2): bdang // sder bsags 'bras bu dman pa'i mthus// rgyu lus 'byung shugs lcang gi skong // ljang ma lanyal zhing dge blo nyams// 'byor khu sem shes pa'o// lha chos dka'
1b3(dkar chag 2): ngal ba'i rgyu// dkar chag bya ba ngo yus yin// ngo yus ches ma nus pa chung / rnam dkar 'bras bu mi bslu ches/ len kyang phyis kyi bu rgyud dang // 'byor ldan bsod rams bsags pa rnams/ ga
1b4(dkar chag 2): dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir// mdor bsdus tsam zhig skabs su dngas// dpyir dkar mag 'debs pa la// li nang bsang ba'i dkar chag yod// da yang sbyang shugs med pa dang // sang ka ta la ma sbyangs pa
1b5(dkar chag 2): ji bzhin pa 'byor ma/ 'ong zhing mkhas rnams bzod par gsol// tshig legs legs 'dra ba ma byung yang 'don dngon pa ston pa'i yin// don du pir dang ba skye
1b6(dkar chag 2): gling mchog rgyal po 'dzam+bu gling // gling bzhi'i nang nas khyad par 'phags/ khams gsum yon ngar 'dun dang ldan/ sgrubs pa'i brjem mcheg lags dus gsu
1b7(dkar chag 2): thams cad kyang // sbrul sku mchog yin/ de ma kyi yul/ 'phags mchog zhing khams mchogang lnga 'grel ze ga
1b8(dkar chag 2): gang 'dul srung bstan nas// sol ldan ljos kyi 'gro ba kun/ thar pa byang chub lam sna 'dren/ drag po'i tshul yang zhi ba'i lha/ 'gro ba 'drem khong 'bangs skyid pa'i nyim
1b9(dkar chag 2): sgying la g.yang chags 'byor 'dus 'did dgu 'dzengs pa'i nachen bamed pa 'dra/ dges 'dod gder kha lha yis ning khams pazhi ma 'bul ba'i skabs me
2a1(dkar chag 2): tshogs cag du de// bya ba thams cad tu 'bras las bskyed/ ma la mi rung ba'i legs brgya / springs/  sa deng dgu 'job pa'i baT 'bargyas// de sbeng sa dang grags pa'i dpal thob pa/ 
2a2(dkar chag 2): rgyal gsung zhig pa zhengs 'bras bdud ci'i // skye kun lengs su spyod cing rje rje'i sreg legs grub nyon mongs bdud las rab rnal dang / ngas chos mi rub tul pa dang / 'i nad med dpal 'byer
2a3(dkar chag 2): phung su tshogs/ mchog gsum gdung gi rmar brten gang de'i sras// 'dod dgu'i char 'bebs yid ba'i na dang // mi shigs pa yi dpa' dang longs spyoda'abyer mdzad
2a4(dkar chag 2): dgos skyes yab mes kus// gtsug ner ngam pa'i lha ches ngag la byed// lha bu rnams kyang dge pa'i ches la skyed// dbang phyub 'jal de'i mched dra bcig/ lha me 'dzum dkar bas bcud g.yang
2a5(dkar chag 2): du 'phel// a b+hi ma ti'i don 'grub bams pa'i bshes/ 'dzir rgya mtsho'i tshegs mchod dpal me rnams/ spro ba kha ner dag pa'i ces la 'bur// mthun pa'i ngam 'cha
2a6(dkar chag 2): ma nyams mtha' ru phyin// se la dkon mchog thugs rje rab tu g.yos// spyir ni sku gsung thugs brten che cher sgrubs// de nang dus gsum bde gshegs chos kyi sku// mtha' med 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs
2a7(dkar chag 2): cig be// na mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i yid pa lha// sa bcu'i dbang phyug 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal// 'phags mchog thugs rje chen po ga rgyu ni 'phags pa'i yul mchog pan/ 
2a8(dkar chag 2): shing ni sA la chen por rab mngags shing // rin chen gser dang dul las khyad me pa'i// tsan na ngag la sprul pa tshatshathos pa// lhub lnga ba rgyan rnams chen chen gser gyi spring// 'phags
2b1(dkar chag 2): cheg lngar dngas su byon rnams ci// bu ram shing bston pa kyis// 'phags pa'i yul mchog bya dang rje bzang ba dang / bal sleng rdzi steng la sogs
2b2(dkar chag 2): thom tshogs/ ched du bya ba'i gdul bya grangs med la/ bar pa chang nying med pa'i chos 'khor skong// de yang rgyas 'brang brgyas gsum stong bdu nas// 'bring gi rgyab pa'i khri lnga snang ba// 'bri
2b3(dkar chag 2): mi bsdus pa shi khri bo ti gnyis// brjod pa phyogs mthun dben rtsems po'i drug/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes po 'i drug/ gzhan yang me sde mdzang blun la sogs pa// bong chen bcu phrag gcig dang bag
2b4(dkar chag 2): dgra'i drangs/ sde mo ches kyi 'dung mnas ngam pa nas/ 'jam dbyangs rnam sprul thon mo sam b+ho Ta// yang sprul rig byed bye ba phrag ste nas// yangs pa'i rgyal khams ches kyi ga
2b5(dkar chag 2): mdzad pa bcu phrab drug dang bzhis lhag yi ger tshogs/ thugs gsang dpal ber 'khyil ba'i thog dag / zhes pas bai num mthi shos ngos/ ra
2b6(dkar chag 2): dang pa'i 'a'ang ma chas mangs pas sa 'bras las yi ger ra brji byings dpangs 'dril rda ba dang /  rus dra shes che me nams tshe dang
2b7(dkar chag 2): 'brag tshangs pa/ g.yung drung bcas// bcu brag gcig gis sor 'arjes legs par bathun// slab gsum rnam ngas rdul khrims rkyen gyi mdzes// gzhung lugs brgya phrab chos kyi spyod me swa ra/ 
2b8(dkar chag 2): rang spring spobs pas bgrin pa bzeng steng nas// dam chos nor khrul ma dag dri ma'i tshogs// rnam ngag zung gi nyes tshogs ma lus bsal// dam chos rgya chen 'di dag bzhengs pa'i du// rab par thugs pa
3a1(dkar chag 2): sangs drang du ra // shel ga ces grwa chen por khri thob pa// drug pa mkhan chen gi mtshan ca dang / pa'ams chos 'azang rab 'babs pa rgyas dang / 
3a2(dkar chag 2): pa 'phrum ma pa 'du dz+ra rje pa rdzam mdun hUM// yo yug snang ba man ma/ mkhas pamam chochom ca grags pa/ 'bye dras rgya
3a3(dkar chag 2): grwa lun tshim mas // gnyen pang srog drang yis rdo grags pa// swa sde bcu bar sgo drug sdom dag// bstan 'dzin la bar lho nang pa dang // sprul sku bstan 'dzi byangs yul pa
3a4(dkar chag 2): ma cis shar nub thug po 'khru mar ba// sr-ing sgom ste dge nos shar ldong // rigs 'dzin grwa bzang bstan pa na lnga bung nga/ rdo rje rdo grags dkar po la sems pa/ 
3a5(dkar chag 2): gnyen can dag 'a phyogs yum mi khyim mdzes kyis/ skabs cang 'atsu chags spang 'dong dur/ thams dag mtshan kyis yo ga rgyas/ ngas pa rnams kyis
3a6(dkar chag 2): ltar babs// dkar phyogs lnga rnams gang ga dang rgyal mtshan 'gyur// bkra shis mnga' gsol bgagasangs pan lding // bsngo ba smon lam bcan po'i go bzhin gyon// pa'i byi'ing
3a7(dkar chag 2): su tsam lags// nga ni mang gi dgar chag 'debs/ zang zing nor gyi 'phags nor 'gugs/ ming byongs pa'i mtsha
3a8(dkar chag 2): legs pasamartsis// d+hu g+hu trig drig rnam shes 'bral/ rang no dor dgos gzhan nor
3b1(dkar chag 2): nga lang snying po med 'phel 'grib ce// legs pa brgya yi ngo bzung
3b2(dkar chag 2): legs pal pa / klen dang 'dra ba'i tshe tshad la// gtar gyis can pa 'dzin par
3b3(dkar chag 2): pa'i bas ba'i nga mas 'dabs// ngang pa 'gyur meng na mkha' la/ thugs rje'ichas sgra char rgyun chad mang // dge ba'i 'od zar
3b4(dkar chag 2): 'bar dang bang ba'i 'brag spong dang / byang chub la tog 'bras bu smin/ nganas bsdug bsngal su samadzang ma 'a phags ra
3b5(dkar chag 2): par phyur po'i rgyal sa zi la la dkor mcheg thugs rje can/ de ni bsang ba'i gar chags yin/ 
3b6(dkar chag 2): ga 'grel lnga skabs chang chu'i rnams/ sngon 'phags sdig sgrib ga stsas nas dag phyi
3b7(dkar chag 2): spring par dge la'i mthung nus pa las/ bstan dang bsas 'dzin rgyas pad/ bengs sogs 'grobam mas
3b8(dkar chag 2): baphrul ming yang ya sku med dag mamachom rnams gsum dang / ma.u rtsal srung ba'i chos sbyor
4a1(dkar chag 2): 'di rang tha zheng bar dang chas pa sa mthal dra phyir zhes pa'i bar dag nyi mo zhes pa rag dbya ches pa'i bar yang nga' marnas pa dag btsams ma na phanapa pa'i yar da
xa1(dkar chag 2): du mdo dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
xa2(dkar chag 2): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis tha
1b1(bzang spyod): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra nar+ya pra Ni d+han rA dza/ bod skadang du/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa sngon lam gyi rgyal po 'dag
1b2(bzang spyod): pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// ji snyed su ngag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// dus gsum gshegs pa mi se kun/ 
1b3(bzang spyod): bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// bzang po spyad pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba
1b4(bzang spyod): thams cad yid kyi mngon sum du// zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btung pa yis// rgyal ba kun la ra ba tu phyag 'tshalo// rdul gcig
1b5(bzang spyod): steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad
2a1(bzang spyod): rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mas/ da dgu bsngags pa ma zang rgya mtshan pas// dbyangs kyi lan lag rgyam chab d+hA kun gyis/ rgyal bkun gyis yon tan
2a2(bzang spyod): rab brjod cing // bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis brjod// me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang / 
2a3(bzang spyod): mar me mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // bye ma phur ma ri rab mnyam pa
2a4(bzang spyod): dang / bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod bar bgyi// mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba
2a5(bzang spyod): de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bza nga po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod
2a6(bzang spyod): chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa cis mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis sa
2a7(bzang spyod): sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kun
2a8(bzang spyod): gyi rje su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sngon ma rnams// byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khomam
2b1(bzang spyod): / bla na med pa bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhid de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang // bdag gis thal
2b2(bzang spyod): mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ 
2b3(bzang spyod): thams cing bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod gyur cig/ gang yang ma byon de dag
2b4(bzang spyod): rab myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas skyon// phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongasu dag gyur cig/ 
2b5(bzang spyod): byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang / sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de
2b6(bzang spyod): rtag tu nang med bde gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// mthun par gyur cig re ba'ang grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro/ 
2b7(bzang spyod): ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjesu slob gyur te// bzang po spyod pa yongasu rdzogs
2b8(bzang spyod): byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag pa// rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin sbyin nang // grul bum dag dang mi yi skang
3a1(bzang spyod): rnams dpa/ 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// nges shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson pa
3a2(bzang spyod): byang chub sems ni nam yang brjeng ma gyur/ sdig pa 'ang rnams sgring par gyur pa dag / de dag ma lus yongasu byang bar shog las dang nyon mongs pad kyi las rnams los grol zhing 'jig
3a3(bzang spyod): rnon 'gro ba rnamasu yang / ji ltar pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ zhi zla nam mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu lci bar byed/ 
3a4(bzang spyod): bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'ged cing // 'gro ba thams cad / la ni phan par spyad// byang chub spyod pa yong su rdzogs byed cing // sems can dag gi spyod dang mthun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod
3a5(bzang spyod): pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyong par gyur// bdag gi spyong dang mtshung sa par gang spyod pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs pa
3a6(bzang spyod): shug/ lus dang ga rnams pa ni sems kyis kyang / skyeng ba dag dang smon lam gcig tu sdung// bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grags po gang // bzang po spyad pa rab tu snya
3a7(bzang spyod): sngon bgyid pa// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrang bar shog/ de dag bdag gis nam yang yad mi dbyung // sangs rgyas sras kyi bskor ba'i mgon po rnams// mngon sum
3a8(bzang spyod): rnas tu bdag kyis rgyal la pa// ma sa pargal bkun tus skyebapa/ de dag la yang mching ba rgya cher / rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin can
3b1(bzang spyod): byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyong pa rnams par spyod pa yang / ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/ srid pa thams cad du yang 'kho ba ma
3b2(bzang spyod): bsod nams ye shes ngag ni mi zad rlung// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod gyur cig/ rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed cing
3b3(bzang spyod): rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams
3b4(bzang spyod): phyogs su yang / ska tsam khyen la dus gsum chad snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas rgya mchi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / bskal ba rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcim
3b5(bzang spyod): lag rgya mtsho'i skad kyis// rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi
3b6(bzang spyod): dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba thams cad dang / 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la// blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug
3b7(bzang spyod): 'angs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang / skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi// gang yang bskal po dus gsum chad dngag skad cig ma shas kyis
3b8(bzang spyod): lu rnams ches pa mam mang pa pa ngas ma la ma rlong dul la rgyam rgya
4a1(bzang spyod): 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa// de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba dag gi zhing rnams bko
4a2(bzang spyod): la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor// mya ngan 'das par rab tu ni mtha' sten// mgon po kun gyi drang du bdag mchi'o// kun
4a3(bzang spyod): myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun nas sgo yi thel pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun nas
4a4(bzang spyod): dge ba'i bsid nams stobs rnams dang // chags pa medad par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag byang chub stobs rnams yang dag
4a5(bzang spyod): sgrub par byed// las kyi stob cha yongs su da ga byed cing // nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'jom sa par byed/ bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med ra
4a6(bzang spyod): byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par dgrol// chos rnams rgya mtsho rab
4a7(bzang spyod): mthong byed cing // ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag bgyid cing // smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu
4a8(bzang spyod): mchod bgyid cing // bskal pa rgya mtsho mi skye spyang bar bgyi// gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi// byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/ bzang po spyang pas byang chub
4b1(bzang spyod): rgyas nas/ de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo ba// gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spang
4b2(bzang spyod): phyir// dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing // spyong pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang // bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de
4b3(bzang spyod): 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par sheg/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyis ni smon lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skye bar// 
4b4(bzang spyod): yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ spyod pa dag ni tshad yong ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang rang gzung ma da par shog/ spyod pa tshad meng pa la gnas nas kyang // 
4b5(bzang spyod): ngag 'phrul pa tha~Mng 'tshal bar bgyi// na mkha'i mtha ra thug gyur pa ji tsam par// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/ 
4b6(bzang spyod): bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// lha dang mi yi bde ba'i mchog rnams
4b7(bzang spyod): kyang // zhing gi rdul steng bskal par phul ba bas// gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi rjesu rab mos shing // lam gcig tsam yang dad pa skyang
4b8(bzang spyod): pa ni// bsed nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pas// des ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur// ngas na
5a1(bzang spyod): grogs po ngarang spangs pa yin// sdang ba tha' yas de yang nges myur mthong // de dag brnyed pa rang rnyed bde bar 'tsho// mi tshe 'di yang de ngag legs par 'ong / 
5a2(bzang spyod): kun tu bzang po nga yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis
5a3(bzang spyod): bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dos rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
5a4(bzang spyod): bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub// 'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du dmyur 'gro/ song nas sems can par phyir der 'dug
5a5(bzang spyod): se/ byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bsgo ra// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad ba dul// gang yang bzang po skyed pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba
5a6(bzang spyod): ni ston tam klog na yang // de yi rnam par smin pa sang+yas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang // kun tu bzang po nga yang de bzhin
5a7(bzang spyod): te/ de dag kun gyi rjesu bdag slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu sngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba zad kyis// bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des// bdag
5a8(bzang spyod): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te// mdzes sum snang ba
5b1(bzang spyod): mas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro// der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon du gyur par shog/ de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs
5b2(bzang spyod): su bkang // 'jig rtem ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes// sdang ba mtha' yas
5b3(bzang spyod): rgyal bas mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo yi stengs kyi
5b4(bzang spyod): phyogs bcu rnamasu yang // sems can rnams la pha na pa mang po bgyi// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam pa tang ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ 
5b5(bzang spyod): nges ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad ce gcig gis thams cad 'byor par shog/ bzang po sbyong pa'i smon lam bsngos pa yis// bson nams ngam
5b6(bzang spyod): pa mtha' yas gang thob nges// 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i gnas rang thob par shog/ smon lam rgyal po 'di dag mchog gi gtso// mtha'
5b7(bzang spyod): yas 'gro ba kun la phan byed cing // kun tu bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub ste// ngan seng rgyud rnams ma lus stongs par sheg/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam
5b8(bzang spyod): kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// ye ng+garmA he tu pra bA la? au tur+b+hiSh+Ta nata thA ga to h+ya ba nga dra/ taMShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e wa bA ngi ma hA shra ma NaH/ mang+ga la/ 
6a1(bzang spyod): dgo byang chub sems dpa'i ltung bar bshags pa bdag ring 'di shes bgyid / rnga ma la su
6a2(bzang spyod): mchig/ sangs rgyas la skyab su mchi'o// chos la snab su mtshor// dge 'dun la skyeng su ma pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdugs
6a3(bzang spyod): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i snying po rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tsha'o// 
6a4(bzang spyod): de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dgyes la phyag 'tshalo// 
6a5(bzang spyod): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhinag pa rin chen bu 'od la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs ba mthong ba dod yod la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs
6a6(bzang spyod): 'dzin cer zla ba la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbyin la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa la phyag 'tsha'o// 
6a7(bzang spyod): de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chu la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chu lnga'i lha la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang la phyag
6a8(bzang spyod): 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
6b1(bzang spyod): gshegs pa byangam med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshalo// me tol dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhi gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer
6b2(bzang spyod): rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dpal
6b3(bzang spyod): la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i dpal phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan dpal shin tu yongs grangs la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po
6b4(bzang spyod): dog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul las shin tu
6b5(bzang spyod): rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gdon pa gshegs pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs
6b6(bzang spyod): ngakun ras sdang ba bkong ba'i dpal phyug 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dadra rab par gnon pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dag
6b7(bzang spyod): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang pad+ma la rab tu bzhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
6b8(bzang spyod): gyi khams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing zhes pa'i sangs rgyas
7a1(bzang spyod): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bdag la dgong su gsopa// bdag gi skye ba 'di dang / skye ba thog sa pa bachis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'ab ba'i skyegam
7a2(bzang spyod): thang du sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang / bgying du bskul pa dang / bgyid pa rjesu yi rang ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi dkor ram/ dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun kyi dkar
7a3(bzang spyod): bregs pa dang / 'phrog tu bcug pa dang / 'phrog pa la rjesu yi rang ba 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du bstsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rje su yi rang
7a4(bzang spyod): ba 'am/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par byung bzhugs pa dang / 'jug du bstsal ba dang / 'jug pa la rje su yi rang ba 'am/ las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgrubs
7a5(bzang spyod): nas bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gan su mchi ba 'am/ yi dwags kyi yul du bachi ba 'ag/ yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba 'am/ kla klor smra ba
7a6(bzang spyod): 'am/ lce tshe ring po rnam su skye ba 'am/ dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba'am/ lta ba log par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par mi bgying bar 'gyur
7a7(bzang spyod): nga'i las kyi sgrib pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bac+doMs ye shes gyu ga/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du 'gyur ba/ chang mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa gzigs pa de dag spyad sngar mthol lo
7a8(bzang spyod): 'chagaso// sman kyang gcod cing sdom par bgyi lag so// sang+yas brjes de dag thaMd bdag la dgongasasu gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di dang / skye bathog ma mchis pa nas 'bor
7b1(bzang spyod): na 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu srin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la zas 'am gcig tsam bskul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa gang lags pa dang / gang gis tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i
7b2(bzang spyod): rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis sems can yongasu smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / 
7b3(bzang spyod): bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis bla na med bI yang dag ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thang gcig tu bsdus shing
7b4(bzang spyod): bzlums te bsdoms nas bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong nam mchis pa/ gong ming gong ma/ bla ma'i yang bla mar yongasu bsngo bas blaran med nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7b5(bzang spyod): tu yo u bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs rnams kyis yongasu bsngos pa dang / ji ltar du bon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongasu bsngo bar
7b6(bzang spyod): 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs bac+doMs rnams kyis yongasu bsngo bar mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang lo su bsngo bar bgyi'o// sdig pa thaMd ni sor bshag so// bsod nams
7b7(bzang spyod): thi la ri rjes yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas thang la ni bskal zhing gsol ba 'deb so// bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi mchog dam pa thob par gyur cig/ mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa
7b8(bzang spyod): dpa gang dag 'das pa dag dang de bzhin gang ma byon/ yon ngan bsngags pa mtha' las rgya mtsho 'dra kum gathal mo sbyar ba bgyis de srung su bdar ma mig 'phabs pa phung po gsub pa zhes pa theg pa che ma dri ma ngo rdzogaso// 
8a1(bzang spyod): rdza sa tri bran dA na rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lab gyi rgyal po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// kun dga'
8a2(bzang spyod): bo ji lngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang ba spyod pa'i tshe/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
8a3(bzang spyod): gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lba ngas la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong lnga mig ldan pa yi/ 
8a4(bzang spyod): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang // nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshalo// ngan 'gro las ni bzlog bgyid cing // mtho ris las ni rab stor la// rga shi med par 'dren
8a5(bzang spyod): bgyid pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na// bdag gis sde ga pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis na su// bdag gi/ 
8a6(bzang spyod): de dag bshags par bgyi// gang las rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te/ bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi/ 
8a7(bzang spyod): zhing khams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas yi rang ba// de la bdag ni yi ring ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// bsod nams kun la ya
8a8(bzang spyod): rang ngo // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/ 
8b1(bzang spyod): 'chang rgya bgying par bskul ma 'debs// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/ srog chags kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur
8b2(bzang spyod): tshig ches rje chen po'i sgra yis ni// sems can sdug bsngal mthar bgyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam ya su// chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod ba'i 'dam du bying
8b3(bzang spyod): gyur cing // srid pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyis bcings bdag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigasu gsol// sems kyi dri mar gyur pa la// sangs rgya
8b4(bzang spyod): rnams ni slong ma mdzad// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // gang dag 'das
8b5(bzang spyod): dang ma byon pa// de dag rje su bdag slob cing // byang chu bskyang ba spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog/ mngon
8b6(bzang spyod): shes drug po mngom rgyas nas/ bla med byang chub ga gyur tshal/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'byu dang // rang bzhinam mchis gnas ma mchis// ma rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis/ 
8b7(bzang spyod): pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po lngar// sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis srog ma mchis// / bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtobs
8b8(bzang spyod): shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa yi// dngos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun la phan spa ru// ser sna ma mchis spyan gtong shog// dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// 
9a1(bzang spyod): bdags chub shog/ dngos po thams cad rnam 'dzag par// tsun par 'arol phyim chags shig// khris kyi tshul khrims sbyin meng cag chu
9a2(bzang spyod): khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa 'am yang na chub ma me// rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzed
9a3(bzang spyod): ngam khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ brtan spre le le ma mchis shing // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis
9a4(bzang spyod): brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sgyu ma lnga bu'i ting 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta buHting 'dzin gyis// bsam gangan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ 
9a5(bzang spyod): rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum dang // dus gsum mnyam pa'i nga dang yang // rig sum mngon sum bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun
9a6(bzang spyod): gyis bsngags pa dang // 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang // byang chu sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig// de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing // byams pa grags
9a7(bzang spyod): dang ldan pa yis// pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// sa bcu po la rab tu gnas// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gang la gnas nas thabs
9a8(bzang spyod): mkhas pas theg pa bde ba dang / 'jug pa bde ba dang / lam bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i thabs mkhas pa ni 'di yin/ 
x1a1(bzang spyod): byis pa ldag par rmongs byed kyang // pha rol tshol bar mi byed do// mig sman gyis ni gsar bris shing // rnag can lus ni brgyan pa yis/ khyis
x1a2(bzang spyod): ba ldag par rmongs byed kyang // pha rol tshol bar mi byed do// lus ni dri zhim gyis bskus nas// rkang pa gcag gis byug pa dag/ byis pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang / 
x1a3(bzang spyod): pha rol cho mi byed do// gang zhig 'dod par kun sbyor 'brel chags shing // kun tu sbyor ba'i skyon rnams ma mthong ba// 'dod par 'brel la chags pa'i mi de yis
x1a4(bzang spyod): chu bo mtha' yas yangs pa rgal mi 'gyur// tshogs bra la mchog dang tha ma thams cad dag/ 'di la bdag dang bdag gir mi lta zhing // de ltar rnam
x1a5(bzang spyod): grol sngon chadang ma rgal ba'i// chu bo rab rgal yang srid ma nga par 'gyur// gang zhig tshal spangs tshal med pa// nags tshal spangs nas nags su rgyug
x1a6(bzang spyod): grol ba 'ching bar gcen pa'i// gang zag 'di la ltos shig tshur// shing rta 'thun pa'i rtsibs ldan pa// yan lag yid 'ong gos dkar g.yogs// sdig med
x1a7(bzang spyod): 'gro ba la ltos la// chings pa'i rgyun rnams gcad par gyis// 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi dag ni// phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang // bskyed mos tshal dang
x1a8(bzang spyod): mchod nas dang // ljon shing rnams la skyabasu 'gro/ skyabs de gtso bo ma yin ning // skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa min// de la skyabs su song po yis// sdug bcwa
x1b1(bzang spyod): kun las grol mi 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun la ni skyabasu song zhing // sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // sdug bsngal yang dag
x1b2(bzang spyod): 'das pa dang // bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// 'phags lam yan lag brgyang ba ste// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba// 
x1b3(bzang spyod): de ni skyabs kyi mchog yin zhing // de ni skyabs kyi dam pa yin// de la skyabasu song ba yis// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// mthong bas mthong zhing
x1b4(bzang spyod): mthong bas ma mthong mthong // ma mthong mi mthong mthong bya mtheng mi 'gyur// mthong na 'dra ma mthong // mthong 'dis 'dra ba mi mthong ste// 'dra
x1b5(bzang spyod): mthong mi yis mthong ba med// mi yis ci ma mthong na 'dra ba mthong // ci zhig mthong na 'dra ba mtho nga ma mthong mi 'gyur// ji ltar 'di na 'dra ba
x1b6(bzang spyod): mthong ba dag/ gang zhig med na 'dra bar mthong dang 'bral// gang tshe 'di yis sdug bsngal ma mthong ba/ de'i tshe na bdag tu mthong bar 'gyur// ji lta
x1b7(bzang spyod): ji ltar sdug bsngal rdzogs pa// des ni bdag 'di 'dra ba mthong mi 'gyur// gang gi so so'i skye bsgribs nas// 'du byed sdug bsngal ma mthong ba// 
x1b8(bzang spyod): 'dzin 'dre mthong ste// de med 'dra ba mi mthong ngo // mthong ba'i choms te nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / sdig pa thams car mi bya ste// dag
x3a1(bzang spyod): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya miSh+Tha tan dru ga nga rdzun be bul lan spu
x4b1(bzang spyod): / 'gre las/ sku gsub dang sngags dang rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang / 'chi ba slu ba zhes bya ba'i rim par bya ba snga bco lnga pa'o// de nas dngos gru kur gyi gnas// gsang ba mchog dgyes
x4b2(bzang spyod): ste/ yid 'ang bcud ri kur gyi brten// sems can kun la bde ster ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis brgyas// bla ri dam pa bris pas 'bab/ radab steng ldan pa'i pad+ma mo// sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa
x4b3(bzang spyod): la dang ni lha pos zhus gyur pa// 'khor le kun byings pa dang // dbyangs rnams kyi nibye brag dang / yi ge she ba ma 'tshal te/ 'khor lo'i grangs ni dzaM lta bu/ de rnams las ni tso dag lags// sna tshogasahA
x4b4(bzang spyod): yi sngags dang ni/ 'khrul 'khor dag ni bder bsdus dang // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni// de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyis ba stan// 'di dag la ni the tsom mchis// bde ba chen pos bshad gas
x4b5(bzang spyod): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa gang // de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa// lagase lagase lha me che/ glegs chen po legs lags// mkha' ge ba ri thad kyang // the tsam
x4b6(bzang spyod): spya na gzhan sa smos// sgra ba kun tu rnam 'brel pa// khang par du ni gtor ma sbyi/ tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya// sgrub pa be yas g.yen nas bskor// 'di yis sgrub po kun la ni/ ma mo dga' 'gyur tha
x6a1(bzang spyod): sa kun tu skya pa nas skyes kyis de nyid du ches rnams la ches kyi mig tshum
x6a2(bzang spyod): m+b+hang+ga m+b+ha N+ya n+ya kla dzadzun ta ma khrub ma na yangs
x7a1(bzang spyod): mtshan thas lag med pa'i'adapa' yang ngas maud gnyis 'tshom med pa gsol pa 'as sa rkyen ming ma skye mi tshogs bcas kyis rtsa pa rdo tshum lus
x7a2(bzang spyod): a D+yan bang+gA grung gnas ma gsol ba 'debs rnabasam pa lhun gyis 'grub par byin gyis barmongs las can 'gro ba'i don du gted 'don na rdza ma cheg zil zog med pa' dpar 'du/ 
x7b1(bzang spyod): sha ca pa 'on mongs 'tshal lo dug lnga bcud skyor tshang dus bdag gis thugs ni skyed na dang ldan mtho ris 'dren pa'i zugs rje can tu brgyar bad+ma 'byung gnas ma maso ba dbas pa ma pasun gyis thub par byi gyi / 
x7b2(bzang spyod): ro za tshal pa dag gisam ma 'aso mas chos 'khor banyan pa 'das la thas mam ming gzhis ma chos med par gsol ba 'das bcan la brim pa chur 'thor rgyam ma 'a das sa
x8a1(bzang spyod): thugs rdo rje ye shes phyag rgya chematha' dang tshig byim gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad
x8a2(bzang spyod): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rin po che che mngo cod pan gyi rje mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brlang ba dang / de ba'i na
x8a3(bzang spyod): gas pa thams cad kyi rdzu da gsung dang thugs rdo rje ya sa ting nge 'dzin che mapo dang ljon pa dang / de bzhir pa
x8a4(bzang spyod): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung dang thugs rdo rjeye shes kyi las sna tshogs pa man
x8a5(bzang spyod): de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyai srung sung zugs rdo rje ya shes
x8a6(bzang spyod): mchod pa chen spro ba'i ngamatshig gis gsang ba ngo / de bzhim gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku pa
x8a7(bzang spyod): bskor pa dang yang thabs rlo klu'i rgyal po ba' ba dang / dpa' klu'i rgyal po snang gis yongasu bskran pa
x8a8(bzang spyod): yang dag par zhugs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ phyi mkha ba'in de dag la

x9a1(bzang spyod): / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung nyi phyi ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste
x9a2(bzang spyod): ba'i gang zhe na/ sbyor ba dang / tshab snyan pa dang / ngan gleng ba dang / ded mthun pa'o// rab 'byer ngas yang 'dzinas sangs rgyas kyi spun gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 
x9a3(bzang spyod): steng gi byams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhan
x9a4(bzang spyod): sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin sheg pa la phyag 'tshal lo// maH/ 
x9a5(bzang spyod): // 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams sdu
x9a6(bzang spyod): ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang
x9a7(bzang spyod): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
x9a8(bzang spyod): dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang // don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// mang+ga laM/ bkris/ 
x9b1(bzang spyod): mkhyen pa'i ye ges mtsho// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/ nyon mongs ma lusa'i byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin// 
x9b2(bzang spyod): ye shes dbang skur cod pan can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thog/ sgrib pa kun las po
x9b3(bzang spyod): bang grol// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs papo// sems can kun gyi bru chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/ 
x9b4(bzang spyod): / lus kun rnams las rnam grol ba// na mkha'i mtha ral rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen
x9b5(bzang spyod): rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la// khyab bdag ram shes dam
x9b6(bzang spyod): tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung // 
x9b7(bzang spyod): bkra shes pa// grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grangs dge// dbugs 'bying rna rol// / ye she
x10a1(bzang spyod): ni ches dag sbyin pa srid pa'i 'jigs 'breg yin pas ni rdzas kyis gang ba yang // srabs gsum pa dang ma yis bla ra'i sras po tshangs dang lha dbang dag ni rgya ba dang mdasang
x10a2(bzang spyod): gang 'jab dpal 'jig rten mgon po srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dpal ldan rdul dang bong chub sems// rgyab tu sa bzhi dge la tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rig rnams du ri'i seng
x10a3(bzang spyod): rgyas rnam dag pa'o// da ltar kla klo'i dbang po'i 'khrug par 'gyur te nges par lus can rnams kyi dbus so'o// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang pi rol du ni nges par mkha'i yul da kla kle 'khrug ste 'khrug
x10a4(bzang spyod): pa min// dus kyi lo rim grangs lo yi nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur te rigs drug bgod pa'i yan lag gis// zla ba'i dab bas sum cu rtsa drag ste re yis bskung ba'i ro rdo rnal 'bor ma rnams dag gi
x10a5(bzang spyod): rigs// gza' yis bcad pas thob pa rab tug sel zhing nges par ngas kyi 'khor lo dag gi lha rnam so// piMg saM kyis bcad pa dag gi lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par
x10a6(bzang spyod): brjod par 'gyur re mi bdag sgra 'phrul dra ba rnam pa gsum yang nyan zhag las 'gyur yang dag bug par rig byed dang // slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsho ma dang chu gder gyis 'gyur dpal ldan
x10a7(bzang spyod): 'dus pa dus kyi dag pa ni// de nyid daces po gzhan yang dag gis rnam dman de dag phyed kyi dpe bas rnam par pha ba ste// slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtsham dang cha gtaraM gyis 'gyur dpal la bsres
x10a8(bzang spyod): pa dag ni dge ba gnyis te bcu gsum bcu dag dang ni dug pa de nyid bcas// zla ba'i tshe rabasu nges nyon zhig tshogs las gza' yis cha yis thob pa gang dag nyin nag drug de dag
2a1(sna tshogs): dang 'phags pa nyi thos thams cad la dag 'tshal lo// 
2b1(sna tshogs): 'dra skad bdag gros zhes pa dus gcag ra/ bcol ldan 'das rgyal
2b2(sna tshogs): dri'i khra rwa/ 'ong pa'i leng kal rung ka grangs pa'i/ dge
2b3(sna tshogs): sleng ste nyes rgyu lA'i cu dge slong gi dge 'dun
2b4(sna tshogs): rgyu dpe dang / rlung sems dpa'i sa pa sa pa'i chen
2b5(sna tshogs): po/ sangs rgyas kyi ni the dang pa nas 'dus pa/ skye ba gcig
3a1(sna tshogs): gis thogs pa/ rang med grangs med pa dang / thabs gcig tu
3a2(sna tshogs): bzhugs te/ de'i rang bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du ras yongs su bskor cing ringar
3a3(sna tshogs): gyis bltas te ches ste to// de nas dang chung ser sa dngal sems dpa' chen
3a4(sna tshogs): rab kyi rdul gyis rna raganon pa zhes dang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur ras 'dug
3a5(sna tshogs): bde skan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus me geyas pa'i lhang sa
3b1(sna tshogs): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal re sbyar ba btung ras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
3b2(sna tshogs): ces gsol to// gal te nus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs pa na
3b3(sna tshogs): de bzhi gshegs dra ngag/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig
3b4(sna tshogs): 'u lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b5(sna tshogs): dpa' chen po// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//  kyes la byes na zhe pa/ de sa
3b6(sna tshogs): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang
4a1(sna tshogs): nga lung bsdan pas khyed kyi sems das par bag/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa
4a2(sna tshogs): dang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis
4a3(sna tshogs): rnam par gder ba sa 'di srad tsos gsil // bcer ldan 'das shes rab kyi
4a4(sna tshogs): pa rol tu phan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi da ba bcom ldan 'angs
4a5(sna tshogs): tsam gyis ni/ bang rab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4a6(sna tshogs): pin pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bang chub sems dpa' sems
4b1(sna tshogs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags rim ldan 'angs po rdzas ting chu
4b2(sna tshogs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bdang sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed cing bdad kyi las thams cad
4b3(sna tshogs): kyang rdegs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
4b4(sna tshogs): ji lta bas gnas na myur pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ches yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ra ba lags/ de skad ces ga sel ba dang
4b5(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gden pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rab kyi rtsal
4b6(sna tshogs): gyis ram par gnon po byang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngar dang / ci nas khyed ste'i rang pe la bar pa dang sra be rang
5a1(sna tshogs): la dang ba dang 'jig rjen la song dartsa ba dang lnga dang mi rnams kyi sku de phal po ma nger dang pa nga rang bang ba'i phyir 'dus shing
5a2(sna tshogs): nga ltar gyi dang ma 'ongs pa'i ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams la snang ba byung bar 'ded pas/ nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
5a3(sna tshogs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba legs so logs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa bar ba'in du
5a4(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpabe rab kyi rtsal gyis rngam par gamed pa sang nas bka' stsal rakyi ral gyis
5a5(sna tshogs): rnam par garten pa khyed ngen gyi dbang gang mazeng ras de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan ji lta bu 'dri/ nga skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
5a6(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gded pas 'di skad ces gsal 'acom ldan 'das
5a7(sna tshogs): sems can khams song lo sra pa dang sems can thams cung la song brje sems can thams cad kyi rin gyi sra
5a8(sna tshogs): bdabang ban gshegs pa la ngon nga du lags ci'i srad du ldan 'das 'ang
5b1(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa de 'am shes dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ches dang
5b2(sna tshogs): mas thams cad sdang ba lags pa'i srang da'o// bcom ldan 'das nga la sems can gang dag 'ar thos kyi theg pa la drwa pa gyur bang dag gis thos ra
5b3(sna tshogs): du zag pa ma mchis pa'o sa mden sum du bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa la nges par gyur pa dag kyang myur du rang sangs
5b4(sna tshogs): rjes kyi theg pas nges 'byung bar 'gyur/ ba dang / gang dag bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par rigs par
5b5(sna tshogs): nga kyang myar nga bla ra med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i bang chub mngon par rdzogs rang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang
5b6(sna tshogs): dag pa'ang srin ming pa la ma zhugs shings gsum la ma nges pa ngo dag gos thos ra dra ra meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
5b7(sna tshogs): bskrad par 'gyur ba dang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhes pa'i lame bta
5b8(sna tshogs): pas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba'i spang de ba'i ragashegs pa'i yul dang
6a1(sna tshogs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan du gsel/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sems yang pal nges
6a2(sna tshogs): rnams kyi srang nga nga bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba ma lags/ dbul ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi slad nga ma lags/ dpal po'i theg
6a3(sna tshogs): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi slang nge ma lags/ la le can rnams kyi srang du pa lags/ le le'i zil gyis den pa rnams kyi srang nga ma lags
6a4(sna tshogs): lta ba'i 'dam pa bong ba rnams kyi slad nga ma lags/ bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa rnams kyi slad nga sa lags/ nge tsham 'tshal cing khal ma mchis pa rnams
6a5(sna tshogs): kyi slang nga ma lags ye byang bsnyungs pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi snang du ma lags/ bskrang ngas pa rnam sa kyi slang du ma lags/ sems
6a6(sna tshogs): 'khrul pa rnams kyi srang nga ma lags/ 'ded pa'i 'dam du zing ba rnams kyi slad du ma lags/ g.ye can rnams kyi sla nga ma lags/ sgra car rnams
6a7(sna tshogs): kyi slad du ma lags/ bgyis pa mi bzer rnams kyi slang dus lags/ sdig pa 'tshal ba rnams kyi spang dupa lags/ sdig pa sbed pa rnams kyi sra
6b1(sna tshogs): dpa lags dal khrims rnams pa rnams kyi srang du ma lags/ dul khrims yongs su ma dag pa rnams kyi srang nga mags lta ba pa 'ams pa mas
6b2(sna tshogs): kyi spang nga sa lags/ dadad kyi steng yal la sbeng ba rnams kyi slang ngam lags bdag la bsteng pa rnams kyi sring ngam lags/ gan la sdang
6b3(sna tshogs): pa rnams kyi srang nga ma lags rnyeng pa dang bkar ba sti la gang nga rnams kyi slang nga ma lags/ lhung bzeng dang ches ges la chags pa rnams
6b4(sna tshogs): kyi srang nga ma lags rga la 'ches pa rnams kyi srang nga ma lags kha gsag can rnams kyi srang
6b5(sna tshogs): ma lags gzhag srengs can rnams kyi slang nga ma lags// theb kyis ladral ba rnams kyi srang nga ma lags
6b6(sna tshogs): rung pa la dad par sgrub pa rnams kyi srang du ma lags / bcom ldan 'das sems can de lta bu rnams kyi slang du bdag nga bzhin gshegs
6b7(sna tshogs): pa la rab ma lags so// bcom lngan 'das sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshol ba dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i
7a1(sna tshogs): ye shes dang / rang rlung gi ye shes dang / ri nyam pa'i ye shes dang / blar med pa'i ya sa re la de dag dang / gang rag bdag drang pa rol kyang ring mi gra
7a2(sna tshogs): nra bdag la sred pa dang / gzhan la sde dang lnga ga la mchis pa/ bsem ldan 'das ra bcang ba lta bur nga rgyal ma mchis pa/ zug rngu phyung bgadel ba lta bur sems ngar 'a / 
7a3(sna tshogs): sems sa dang / ru dang / pa dang / rlung dang / nar kha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i rin pa rnams kyi sdang du 'dab de bzhin ga bya
7a4(sna tshogs): pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyang mi dmigs shing rlom sems su mi bgyid la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/ ros ma lags pa lnga ga la mchis pa
7a5(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ran pang dag gi srang du bdagang bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba lags so/ com ldan 'das bsam pa dag pa/ g.yom
7a6(sna tshogs): ro ri sa pa/ sgrarar ris pa/ drang ba/ sems panyam pa/ sems can thams cad la sbar pa dang / snying brtseb car yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba/ yang dag par gzeng basbed pa
7a7(sna tshogs): yang dag par dga' bar bgyid pa/ khur chen po khyer ba/ theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa/ 'gying rer pos so se nye bar gnas pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can
7a8(sna tshogs): thams cad bde ba zab par 'gyid pa/ 'dran pa/ rnam par 'dren pa/ yongs su 'dren pa/ ches thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa/ skye ba'i gnas thams cad mi tshol ba bdud kyi
7b1(sna tshogs): zhugs pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ 'dun pa can brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ ngag mchis pa/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ the tshom thams cad btsod
7b2(sna tshogs): pa la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags// bcom ldan
7b3(sna tshogs): 'das sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la yang rlom sems su mi bgyid cing mngon par mi zhan la chags par mi gnas shing / rlom sems thams cad las yang dag
7b4(sna tshogs): par 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa/ lam du zhugs pa/ lam sten pa'i sems can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi slad du/ bcom
7b5(sna tshogs): ldan 'das bdagang bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad la bde ba dang / lhag na ma mchis pa'i bde ba dang / bla na pa ma
7b6(sna tshogs): pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba dang / 'dus ma bgyis pa'i bde ba nye bar bsgrub par 'tshal te/ bdag sems can thams cad kyi de nga
7b7(sna tshogs): pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba'i sdang dung bzhin gshegs pa la zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal zhing / the tshom mchis rab kyang
7b8(sna tshogs): sems cad rnams kyi tha tshom rab tu spong ba'i sdang du ches bshad par 'tshal la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad kyi the tshos bsal ba'i slang du bcom ldan 'a
8a1(sna tshogs): la'u lags so// de ci'i slad du zher/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni sdug bsngal dang mi mthun zhing bde ba 'tshal la/ sems can thams cad ni bde bdon
8a2(sna tshogs): du gnyer ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab ma gtogs par gzhan sems can rnams kyi bong ba gang yang bdag gis ma mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
8a3(sna tshogs): thug pa/ theg pa chen po ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi bde ba gang yang ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di mthong pos sems can rnams la
8a4(sna tshogs): bde ba nye bar bsgrub pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don 'di yang dag par mthong bas bdag gi nga
8a5(sna tshogs): bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal
8a6(sna tshogs): gyis rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa legs so le gas so// khyod skye bo phal po che la snying brtse ba'i phyir
8a7(sna tshogs): bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba ni khyod kyi yon tan gyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// de'i phyir rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon po legs
8a8(sna tshogs): par nyon la yid la rab tu zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad // bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi
8b1(sna tshogs): rdul gyis rnam par gaben pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab kyi tshul gyis rnam par gnon pa khyod 'di skad du/ 
8b2(sna tshogs): bcor ldan 'das khyong shes rab kyi la 'phyin pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyini bzhes dgyi ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes
8b3(sna tshogs): rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi nas zer ba ni rab kyi tshul gyis rnam par gnon pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gis kyang brjod pa rung ba ma yin te/ shes ra
8b4(sna tshogs): rol tu par pa 'i rig thams cad las 'das pa 'o// rang kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/ 'di shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di
8b5(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes brjod par mi nus so// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol
8b6(sna tshogs): pa / shes kyi rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//  kyi tshul gyis rnam par gnon pa/ shes rab nyid de bzhin ga shegs pas pa rnyed pa mas
8b7(sna tshogs): ro du na pa lta ri rigs pa ga la 'gyuraro// rab kyi tshul gyis rnam par gnon pa shes rabacas pa pa 'dzini chos thams cad kun tu shes pa 'di
9a1(sna tshogs): na chos thams cad rnam pa gzhan du brjod pa/ chos thams cad ni brjod pa las rnam par grol ba ma yin no// gang chos thams cad kun tu shes pa dang / gang
9a2(sna tshogs): chos thams cad kun tu rig pa de yang tshig gis brjod par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang ji ltar sems can rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ba de ltar shes rab ces pa'o// 'di ni
9a3(sna tshogs): bdags pa zhes bya ste/ de'i pir shes rab ces pa'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa/ chos thams cad ni gdags su meng / gzung du meng / ba shad du mad / sdang ba
9a4(sna tshogs): me de / de lta bur kun tu rigo pa de ni kun tu rig pa zhes bya'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa she sa rab ces bya ba de ni shes pa'ang ma yin kun tu mi shes
9a5(sna tshogs): pa'ang ma yin dra las kyang ma yin de las ma yin pa yang ma yin te de'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa de ni mi shes pa'i spyod
9a6(sna tshogs): yul yang ma yin/ ye shes kyi spyod yul yang ma yin/ mi shes bri'i yul yang ma yin/ ye shes kyi yul yang ma yin te/ ye shes ni yul med pa'o// gal te
9a7(sna tshogs): shes la yul yod du zin na mi shes par 'gyur ro// ye shes ni mi shes pa las ma yin/ mi shes pa'ang ye shes las ma yin/ ye shes ni mi shes pa ma yin/ mi
9a8(sna tshogs): shes pa yang ye shes ma yin te/ ye shes kyis ye shes shes bya'o// ye shes kyis mi shes pa zhes pa'o// mi shes pas ye shes shes bya'o// de la ye shes pa ni
9b1(sna tshogs): 'di'o// ye shes du ni 'di'o// ye shes nga ni 'dris so// ye shes nga ni 'di'i phyir ro zhes ye shes cung zad kyang bstan par mi nus te/ de'i phyir ye shes de ni ye shes nyid kyis
9b2(sna tshogs): meng ngo // ye shes kyang ye shes su mi gnas te/ mi shes pas kyang ye shes shes mi bya'o// gal te mi shes pas ye shes shes bya na ni/ de'i phyir bris pa so so'i skye bo thams cad
9b3(sna tshogs): kyang ye shes can du 'gyur ro// gang ye shes dang mi shes pa mi dmigs shing ye shes dang mi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de nyid ye shes shes pa
9b4(sna tshogs): ste/ ye shes ni ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du ma yi na no// de bas na ye shes ni brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing / yul thams cad las rab tu 'das pa ste/ ye shes ni gang gi
9b5(sna tshogs): yul yang ma yin no// yo shes kyi yul yang gang yang ma yin no// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gno na ba/ ye shes bstan pa'i yul yang ma yin/ 
9b6(sna tshogs): phyogs kyang ma yin pa 'di gang gis shes pa de ni ye shes can nam ye shes can ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa gang 'di
9b7(sna tshogs): lhor rab tu shes pa dang rjesu rtogs pa dang kun tu shes pa de ni shes rab ces pa'o// rab kyi rdulo gyis rnam par gnon pa/ gang 'di ltar mngon par rtogs pa mngon sum du
9b8(sna tshogs): bang pa nga ri 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ces bya'o// 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i shes rab ces ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ji
10a1(sna tshogs): rten nyid kyang mi dmigs na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab lta ga la yod de/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis gang 'jig rten las sgrol bar
10a2(sna tshogs): 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges 'jig rten mi dmigs pas ci yang sgrol bar mi byed de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ces bya'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
10a3(sna tshogs): gnon pa 'jig rten zhes bya ba 'di ni btags pa zhes brjod pa ste/ btags pa ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'das pa ma yin gyi/ btags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ni
10a4(sna tshogs): 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// 'da' bar bya ba ni 'dzi dag rten las 'das pa ma yin gyi 'da' bar mi bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la gang 'da' bar bya
10a5(sna tshogs): ba dang / gang gis 'da' bar bya ba'i chos phra rab tsam yang med pas de'i phyir 'das pa zhes bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'a ngas pa la ni 'jig rten yang med/ 'jig rten las
10a6(sna tshogs): 'das pa yang med do// bla na med pa la ni bsgral ba med de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
10a7(sna tshogs): rab bstan pa zhes bya ste/ 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ces ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin
10a8(sna tshogs): gyi ni brgal ba sto/ de la ni 'da' bar bya ba ci yang med pas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab ces pa'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de la gang nges por rtogs
10b1(sna tshogs): pa'i shes rab nges ci nges par rtogs/ 'di la ni nges par rtogs par bya bci yang med do// gal te nges par rtogs par bya ba 'ga' zhig yod du zin na ni 'di shes rab kyis nges par rtogs
10b2(sna tshogs): pa zhes gangags na gang gis kyang mi rtogs shing / kun rtogs pa ma yin la/ gang gis rtogs par 'gyur ba'i bye brag gang yang mi dmigs so// nges par rtogs pa zhes pa pa ni 'di la
10b3(sna tshogs): rtogs par byed pa ci yang mang cing kun tu rtogs par bya ba yang mang de/ de la rtogs par byed pa ci yang med cing kun tu rtogs par bya ba yang med pas de'i pir nges par rtogs po zhes bya'o// 
10b4(sna tshogs): 'di la'i gong yang mthar 'gro ba med cing dpung du yong ma yin te/ nga'i pir nges par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// nges pa ra rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs pa ni steng ma rtogs
10b5(sna tshogs): te/ gang du yang mi rgyug rnam par mi rgyug la/ kun tu mi rgyug ste/ nga'i phyir nges par rtogs po zhes pa'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa/ nges par rtogs
10b6(sna tshogs): shes pa ba'i shes rab kyis ci nges par rtogs sha na/ gang ci snang ba de thams cad nges par rtogs so// gang gis nges par rtogs she na/ shes rab kyis so// shes rab kyis
10b7(sna tshogs): ji ltar ro nges par rtogs she na/ gang btags pa'i mtshan nyid de thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa yang btags pa'i mtshan nyid du'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par
10b8(sna tshogs): gnon pa gang 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan pas nges par rtogs pa ngas ni khams gsum rtogs so// ji ltar rtogs she na/ khams gsumin khams med par rtogs te/ 
11a1(sna tshogs): 'di la ri khams rtogs pa ci yang med // des khams gsupa ni khams med par rtogs so// gang lta khams gsum khams med par nges par rtogs pa
11a2(sna tshogs): gang gis de ltar khams gsum nges par rtogs pa de nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan po zhes bya'o// ji ltar na nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhe na/ nges par rtogs
11a3(sna tshogs): par bya ba ni mi dge pa gang yang med de/ des thams cad dge bar nges par rtogs te/ de nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu 'anga'o// de de ltar rdegs pa'i shes rab dang
11a4(sna tshogs): ldan pas/ gang ci mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bsnam sa pa dang / myangs pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par shes pa de dag thams cad nges par rtogs so// ji lnga
11a5(sna tshogs): bur rdzogs she na/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'bras dang / nang dang / zug rngu dang / stong pa nyid dang / sdig pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtha' ma dang / 
11a6(sna tshogs): 'jig pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang / g.yo ba dang / 'jig pa'i tshul can dang / bdag med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa ste/ rab kyi
11a7(sna tshogs): rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de ni bsil bar gyur pa/ zug rngu med pa zhes bya'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa/ 'di lta sta dper na zug rngu meng pa zhes bya ba'i sman gyi
11a8(sna tshogs): rigs de gang na 'dug pa na zug rngu thams cad sel cing nges par 'don to// de bzhin du 'di lta bu'i chos rnams dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni zug rngu med cing bsil bar 'gyur la/ 
11b1(sna tshogs): nges par rdzogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan cing dag med rtag tu gnas la/ nges par rdzogs pa'i shes rab kyis khams gsum thams cad la mi chags shing bdud kyi nags pa thams
11b2(sna tshogs): cad las rab tu 'das so// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje ni dbug pa'i phyir gang du btsugs pa de dang / de nyid du nges par phigs so// de bzhin du dge slong
11b3(sna tshogs): gris nges par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gang du btsugs pa dang / gang du spyod pa de dag thams cad nges par rtogs so// de nges par
11b4(sna tshogs): rtogs pa'i shes rab 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba dang ldan pas chags pa meng pa ni gsum rig pa zhes bya'o// rab kyi
11b5(sna tshogs): rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa rig pa zhes bya ba de ni ma rig pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags so// ra rig pa yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba de ni sdug bsngal gyi phung
11b6(sna tshogs): nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla drags// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na sman pa mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid rno ba/ lhag par rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ sngar
11b7(sna tshogs): thams ca la mkhas pa/ nang ldang ba thams cad la mkhas pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa/ des nad pa gang dang gang la gso ba byas pa de dang de 'tshe
11b8(sna tshogs): desa'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de sman thams cad la mkhas shing nang ldang ba thams cad la mkhas te/ nang thams cad las thar par byeng pa'i phyir ro// rab kyi tshul gyis rnam pa
12a1(sna tshogs): gnon pa de bzhin du rig pa gsum pos ni ma rig pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ rga shaM dang / mya ngan dang / 
12a2(sna tshogs): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yang mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnod pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
12a3(sna tshogs): shes rab nges par rtogs par 'gro ba zhes pa'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnod pa ngas 'di la dgongs nas/ srid par skye ba yongasu zad ba/ gang gis yang dag par shes pa/ 
12a4(sna tshogs): gang rnams rtogs par 'gro ba de/ 'jig rten na ni shes rab mchog ces bshad do// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa srid par smra ba yongasu zad pa zhes bya ba gang gi tshig bla
12a5(sna tshogs): dwags yin na na/ de ni 'thung ba dang nub pa rab tu rtogs ba'i tshig bla drag so// 'byung ba dang nub pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba'i chos ci yang rung ste/ ngo thams cad ni 'gog
12a6(sna tshogs): pa'i chos te/ 'di ltar kun 'byung ba dang nub pa rab tu rtog so// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni 'byung ba'i tshig bla dag so// nud pa
12a7(sna tshogs): zhes bya ba de ni 'gog pa'i tshig bla drag so// 'byung ba dang / nub pa zhes ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du ni ma yin no// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa kun 'byung ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de
12a8(sna tshogs): ni kun 'byung ba'i chos ma yin no// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa mnyam pa las 'byung ba gang yang med de/ de ni kun 'thung bar mi 'gyuraro// de mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su song ste/ ngang
12b1(sna tshogs): phyir kun 'byung ba zhes pa'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa mnyam pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba ni 'di la 'byung ba gang yang med de kun 'byung bar yang mi 'gyuraro// de'i rang bzhin gang yin
12b2(sna tshogs): pa de ni rang gi rang gis 'jig cing de ni 'gog pa ste/ de la ni 'gog pa gang yang med do snyam po ni bla na med pa'i 'gog pa ste/ gang la skye ba meng pa de la 'gog pa med dang ni 'gog pa'o// 
12b3(sna tshogs): rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ de ltar skye ba med cing 'gog pa med pa'i phyir gang 'byung ba dang nub pa rtogs pa de nub pa rab tu rtogs pa ste/ de'i pir 'byung ba dang nub par rab tu rtogs pa
12b4(sna tshogs): zhes pa'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa rab tu rtog/ sa pa zhes pa bde ni rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba yongasu shes pa zhes po'o// gang la bertan nas chos gang skye ba de
12b5(sna tshogs): nyid la brtan nas chos mang de/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yang dag
12b6(sna tshogs): pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba med par bstan to// mi skye ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ mi 'byung ba mnyam pas de'i pir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes pa'o// gang la skye ba
12b7(sna tshogs): meng ba de la 'gog pa gi la yod de 'gog pa dang mi 'gal ba da ni rngan cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa med pa ste/ skye ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes de'o// gang
12b8(sna tshogs): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni ma byung ba'o// gang ma byung ba nga ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin/ gang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa mo yin/ 
13a1(sna tshogs): lngar thung ba ma yin pa de la 'gog pa med do// gang la 'gog tu med pa de ni mi skye ba shes pa zhes pa'o// gang gis mi skye bar shes pa de ni yang bskyed pa ma yin/ 'gog pa
13a2(sna tshogs): mngon sum du byed pa'ang ma yin no// gang mi skye ba de 'gog pa mi byed de/ skye ba yin na ni 'gog par yang she so// gang mi bskyed pa des chos thams cad 'gog pa nyid du shes shing mthong
13a3(sna tshogs): la rab tu rtogs shing mngon sum du bya ste/ de'i pir 'gog pa mngon sum du rdzobs pa zhes pa'o// zag pa shes pa zhes pa'o// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa mi shes pa zad pa de'i
