39b2(sna tshogs): sdug bsngal ba'i pir ram/ rtag po'i phyir ram/ mi rtag pa'i phyir ra mau/ sdug pa'i phyir ram/ mi sdug pa'i phyir ra ma/ bdag gi phyir rAm/ bdag med pa'i phyir ra mau/ bden pa'i phyir rom/ 
39b3(sna tshogs): brdzun pa'i phyir ramo/ byed pa po'i phyir ram/ byed pa po med pa'i phyir ram/ 'byung po'i phyir ram/ mi 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rAm/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ram/ tsho 'ape'i phyir ma/ 
39b4(sna tshogs): skye ba'i phyir ram/ skyes pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir ram/ skye ba'i phyir rom/ skye ba kun 'byung ba'i phyir ra ma/ tshegs pa'i phyir ram/ mtshogs pa'i phyir ram/ 'dod rags
39b5(sna tshogs): dang btsos pa'i phyir ram/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'i phyir ramo/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i phyir ram/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i phyir ram/ gti mug dang bcos pa'i phyir ram/ 
39b6(sna tshogs): gti mug dang bral ba'i pir ram/ phyin ci log gi pir rA ma/ phyin ci log ma yin pa'i phyir rA ma/ dmigs pa'i phyir ram/ dmigaso ba med pa'i phyir ram/ zad pa'i phyir ram/ mi
39b7(sna tshogs): zad pa'i phyir ram/ sheso pa'i phyir rom/ mi shas po'i phyir ra mo/ dma' ba'i phyir rA mo/ mtho ba'i phyir rama?/ bon pa'i phyir ram/ mi phan pa'i phyir ram/ 'gro ba'i por ram/ mi
39b8(sna tshogs): 'gro ba'i pir ram/ yod pa'i phyir ram/ med pa'i phyir ram/ rjesu chags po'i phyir ram/ khong khro ba'i phyir ram/ snang ba'i bir ram/ mun pa'i phyir ram/ le l-i'i phyir ram/ 
40a1(sna tshogs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phyir ram/ stong pa nyid kyi phyir rab/ stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ ma na pa'i pi 'am/ mtshan pa rang ba'i pi ram/ smon pa'i phyi
40a2(sna tshogs): ram smon pa med pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i phyir ram/ rung ba'i pir ram/ rung ba rang ba'i byir ram/ rig pa'i ping rAm/ rnam
40a3(sna tshogs): par grol ba'i phyir rom/ nye bar zhi ba'i pir ra mi/ nye bar mo zhi ba'i phyir ram/ grub pa'o pir ra mau/ mi grub po'i phyir ro ma/ tshul bzhin gyi pir ra ro// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir
40a4(sna tshogs): ram/ yongasu shes pa'i phyir ram/ yongasu mi shes pa'i phyir ram/ nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ nges par 'byung nga ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ 'dul ba'i phyir rim/ 
40a5(sna tshogs): 'dul ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ tshul khrims kyi phyir ram/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir ram/ rnam par gsang ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par g.yeng ba mo yin pa'i
40a6(sna tshogs): phyir ram/ shes rab kyi phyir ram/ 'chal pa'i shes ra kyi phyir ram/ rnam par shes pa'i por ram/ rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i pir ram/ gnas pa'i phyir ram/ mi gnas
40a7(sna tshogs): de'i phyir ram/ skal ba mo nyam pa'i phyir ram/ skal pa mi mnyam pa'i phyir ram/ 'byung ba'i phyir ram/ 'jig pa'i phyir ram/ thod pa'i phyir ram/ mthob pa'i phyir ram
40a8(sna tshogs): mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ mngon sum du bya ba'i pir ram/ mngon sum du mi bya ba'i phyir ram/ rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ 
40b1(sna tshogs): rab tu rdzogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / bam po gsum pa// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta sde
40b2(sna tshogs): dper na skyes bu rmi lam rmis pas rmi lam gyi rang bzhin bshad pa bstan kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam nyid kyang mngan/ rmi lam gyi rang
40b3(sna tshogs): bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang
40b4(sna tshogs): yang med do// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lnga ste dper na/ rmi lam ni chos gang bstan par yod nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
40b5(sna tshogs): chos gang yang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mthong ba'i skyes bu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bshad
40b6(sna tshogs): pa ston kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gang yang med na sgyu ra'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
40b7(sna tshogs): pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa gang yang med do// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma ni chos gang mngon par 'grub po'i phyir yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// de
40b8(sna tshogs): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam por gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na mig yor
41a1(sna tshogs): mthong ba'i skyes du rig yor gyi rang bzhir ston kyang mig yor gyi rang bzhin gang yang mang na mig yor gyi rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par
41a2(sna tshogs): gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yang med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
41a3(sna tshogs): byin pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa'ang lnga ste dper na mig yor ni chos gang bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du shes
41a4(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na/ smig sgyu mthong ba'i sras bu sdig sgyu
41a5(sna tshogs): bshad pa ston kyang smig sgyu bstan pa gang yang med na smig sgra bstan pa'i rang bzhin lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rdul gyi sa rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha
41a6(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin bsten pa gang yang med do// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na smig sgra ni chos gang bstan par yang
41a7(sna tshogs): nye bar gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin du shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yino// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta snga
41a8(sna tshogs): dper na brag cha'i spyod yul la gnas pa'i skyes bus brag cha'i sgo thos kyi de ni mi mthong ste nam bdag gis sgra phyung ba de'i tshe sgra da thos so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
41b1(sna tshogs): phyin pa bstan pa'i tshig thos par 'gyur yang chos gang bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba med de/ gzhan du na nam mngon par bshad pa de'i tshe kun shes shing / thos pa'i lam du 'gyuraro// rab kyi
41b2(sna tshogs): rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na lbu brjes pa mthong ba'i skyes bu lbu ba rdos pa'i rang bzhin ston kyang lbu brdos pa'i rang bzhin nang dang pi nas kyang mi dmigs na/ de bstan
41b3(sna tshogs): nga'i rang bzhin dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yang mi
41b4(sna tshogs): dmig so// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dpe ra na/ lbu ba rdos pa de ni chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i ra nga bzhin du nye bar mi 'gro'o// rad kyi rtsal gyis rnam
41b5(sna tshogs): bar gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang mngon par 'grub pa'i rang bzhin du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa
41b6(sna tshogs): 'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur mthong ba'i skyes bu chu bur gyi rang bzhin ston kyang chu'i chu bur gyi rang bzhin yang meng na chu'i chu bur gyi rang bzhin bstan pa lta ga la yod/ rab kyi rtsal
41b7(sna tshogs): gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mdo// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na
41b8(sna tshogs): chu'i chu bur ni ches gang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bar nye bar gnas pa ma yino// rab kyi rtsal gyos rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang
42a1(sna tshogs): / mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bar nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'ang lnga snga dbar na skyes bus du shing gi snying po kun tu btsal kyang
42a2(sna tshogs): mi rnyed mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i mdang ma rnams kyis dgos par byed do// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang snying po med mod kyi shes rab kyi
42a3(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas dgos pa yang byed do// rab kyi rtsol gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na skyes bus na mkha' ston par tha snyad 'dogs kyang na mkha' la ni bstan pa
42a4(sna tshogs): yang med do// rab kyi rdul gyis rnam par gnon pa de ba zhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos gang bstan par yang tha snyad gdags par bya
42a5(sna tshogs): med do// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper ni/ na mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos gang ba snyan par yongasu grub cing tha snyad gdags pa mdo// rab kyi
42a6(sna tshogs): rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos gang bstan par tha snyad du gdogs pa med do// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon
42a7(sna tshogs): pa 'di lta ste dper ni grib ma dang nyi logs shes tha snyad 'dogs kyang 'di gnyis ni chos gang yongasu grub pa'i phyir yang nye bar mi gnas la snang ba yang mngon no// rab kyi rdul
42a8(sna tshogs): gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa'i tshig tu 'gro yang chos gang bstan par yang tha snyad kyi tshig tu yang mi 'gro la chos rnam
42b1(sna tshogs): snang bar yang byed ngo // rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che sbyangs pa ni snang ba chen por nye bar gnas par gyur kyang snang ba de nang ngam phyi rol na med do// 
42b2(sna tshogs): kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snang ba'i bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas kyang / snang ba da ni nang ngam phyi rol tu mthong bar nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab
42b3(sna tshogs): kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'di lta ste/ dper na yungs mar gyo mar me bus na de'i 'od 'phro ba yud tsam yang mi gnas mod kyi snang bar yang byed do// snang ba des gzugs rnams
42b4(sna tshogs): kyang mthong bar 'gyuraro// rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang la yang mi gnas mod kyi chos rnams kyi snang ba'i bya ba yang byed de/ sna
42b5(sna tshogs): banges 'phags pa rnams chos thams cad yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
42b6(sna tshogs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa bstan pa ngo mtshar lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
42b7(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu dang bzhin no// gzugs yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
42b8(sna tshogs): pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byang rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// ma rig pa
43a1(sna tshogs): yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yo sum grub pa'o// 'du byed yongs su ma grub pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu ma grub pa dang / ming dang
43a2(sna tshogs): gzugs yongasu ma grub pa dang / skye mched drug yongasu ma grub pa dang / reg pa yong su ma grub pa dang / tshor ba yongasu ma grub pa dang / sred pa yongasu ma grub pa dang / len pa yongasu
43a3(sna tshogs): ma grub pa dang / srid pa song su ma grub pa dang / skye ba yongasu ma grub pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid che
43a4(sna tshogs): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// khams dang skye mched yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
43a5(sna tshogs): phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bodag med pa dang / zhi de dang / phyin ci lo ga dang / sgrib pa dang / lta ba rnam par spyod pa dang / srog pa
43a6(sna tshogs): dongag nye bar srog pa yongasu ma grub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin
43a7(sna tshogs): ba yongasu ma grub pas shes ra kya pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol
43a8(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa yong su ma grub pa'o// kun 'byung ba dang / nub pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las
43b1(sna tshogs): skyes dang / shed bu dang / bang pa po dang / byang du 'jug pa dang / slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes par byed pa dang / shes par bang du bcug pa yong su ma
43b2(sna tshogs): grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub bo// bden pa dang / brdzun pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / 'gro ba dang / mi 'gro ba dang // mthithong ba dang bcas pa
43b3(sna tshogs): dang / mi mthong ba dang / nang dang po yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu mi grub pa'o// sa ring / chu dang / ma dang / rlung dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
43b4(sna tshogs): med pa dang / na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa dang / chos kyi khams yongasu mi grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu pa grub po// las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / rgyu dang / rkyer dang / 
43b5(sna tshogs): chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / bi ma'i mtha' dang dbus dang / tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / 
43b6(sna tshogs): bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang la lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g.yang po dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par
43b7(sna tshogs): shes pa dang / de ma thag pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
43b8(sna tshogs): dang / dbang po dang / stongs dang / byang chub kyi yan log dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms pa
44a1(sna tshogs): 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong bzhid dang / ma rin ma med pa dang / smod pa med pa dang / dge bdang yi dge ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa
44a2(sna tshogs): med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma bas dang / lung du bstan pa dang / lung
44a3(sna tshogs): du ma bstan pa dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / dkar nag ma yin pa dang / gtogs pa dang / mi gtogs pa dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dang 'brang dong 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 
44a4(sna tshogs): gti mug dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye brag byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rlom sems dang / gnas pa dang / rnam par rdzogs pa dang / dped pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang
44a5(sna tshogs): dmigs pa dang / rgyu dang / phrag dog/ dang / ser sna dang / 'du ba dang / gnyis kyi mtshan nyid dang / ma skyes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lcug mothong dang / 
44a6(sna tshogs): rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang / bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / phung po thams cad nges par 'dor ba da // 'byung ba dang / kun rdzob dang / don dam pa dang / 
44a7(sna tshogs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i yas
44a8(sna tshogs): dang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / nyan thos kyi dog bdun dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshad med par gtogs pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i
44b1(sna tshogs): chos kyi se shes dang chos 'ams ca kyi ji lta bzhin bstan du dang ba dang / chos thams cad shes pa dang / mthong ba yong sum 'gru pas shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa so sum thu // 
44b2(sna tshogs): bsil bar gyur pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba yongasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub pa'o// sems can yongasu smin par bya ba yongasu ma grub pas shes
44b3(sna tshogs): ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong sur grub bo// mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas
44b4(sna tshogs): kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad yongasu ma grub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma grub bo// mya ngan las 'das pa yengasu ma grub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
44b5(sna tshogs): yongasu ma grub bo// dge ba dang / mi dge pa'i chos thams cadakyi bar du yong su ma grud pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang su ma grub ste/ de bzhin du thams cad
44b6(sna tshogs): la yang rgyas par sbyararo// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha' ni gzugs med/ bstan du mang / dngos po med de yongasu ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
44b7(sna tshogs): pa yang gzugs maud / bstan du rang / dngos pa rang de yongasu ma grub pa'o// shA rI'i bu 'di lta ste dper na 'ja' na chen gyi rnam pa sna tshogasu kun tu snang yang de la tshon gong
44b8(sna tshogs): yang yongasu grub pa mang de mi dmig so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bstan pa sna tshogasu nye bar gnas mod kyi de la bstan po pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigaso// 
45a1(sna tshogs): shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste bar nan mkha' la sor me lnga yongasu grub par sngon nas yang sus kyang ma mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
45a2(sna tshogs): ba yongasu grub pa'i rang bzhin sngon nam yang sus kyang ma mthong ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus 'di skad ces gsol to/ 
45a3(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthong bar dka' ba lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar su la yang mthong bar nye bar mi 'gro'o// gsol pa/ 
45a4(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khong du chud par dka' ba lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'di la ni gang mngon par rdzogs pa yongasu
45a5(sna tshogs): grub pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bstan du ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
45a6(sna tshogs): 'di ltar chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa lagaso// bka
45a7(sna tshogs): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhon med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
45a8(sna tshogs): bzhin med do// khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung po rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa rang bzhin med do// phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa
45b1(sna tshogs): dang / lnga bar gyur pa dang / sred pa rnam par spyod pa rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / 
45b2(sna tshogs): skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shes las smras pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tsher ba po dang / tsher bar
45b3(sna tshogs): bi pa rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha'i dang / rnam par shes pa dang / chos kyi khams rang
45b4(sna tshogs): bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin ma dado// 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha
45b5(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bas
45b6(sna tshogs): gang na dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
45b7(sna tshogs): chos rnams rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
45b8(sna tshogs): bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / tinge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa rang bzhin med do// rig pa dang / rnam par
46a1(sna tshogs): grol ba rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa rang bzhin med pas
46a2(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// mi skye ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// mya ngan lnga
46a3(sna tshogs): 'das pa rang bzhin med pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / sangs rgyas kyis rang bzhin rang bas shes rab kyi
46a4(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin medado// don dam pa shes pa bstan pa dang / kun rdzob rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// chags pa med pa'i yis dang / 
46a5(sna tshogs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang bzhin med pas she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
46a6(sna tshogs): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang yongasu grub pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags/ 
46a7(sna tshogs): 'gog pa'i snang du ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu 'dre ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang skye ba'i phyir ram/ yo suM grub pa'i phyir ram
46a8(sna tshogs): 'gog pa'i phyir ram/ bdag med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di ni chos gang la yang dmigs pa'i
46b1(sna tshogs): tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ltar chos nyid kyang mang na gang la dmigs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad dmigs pa med do// 
46b2(sna tshogs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang 'bri ba 'am 'phel ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
46b3(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang 'dri bar 'gyur ba 'am 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes
46b4(sna tshogs): dwa kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di ni chos gang las yang dag par 'da' ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes pab kyi pha rol tu
46b5(sna tshogs): byin pa ni yang dag par 'drar bar ba bi'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'dra ba
46b6(sna tshogs): 'am sogs pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni grang bri ba 'am sogs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang
46b7(sna tshogs): yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'du ba'am/ 'bral ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal
46b8(sna tshogs): ba shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba 'am/ kun tu mi sbyor ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigaso// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes
47a1(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi tshul ma tshul ma lags pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47a2(sna tshogs): phyin pa ni chos gang bkur po dang / rnam par bkur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang phan pa dang / 
47a3(sna tshogs): gnod pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la yang phan pa'im gnod par bya ba'i chos gang yang mi
47a4(sna tshogs): dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang 'thung ba'am mi 'thung ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
47a5(sna tshogs): bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshe su gang 'byung ba 'am mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi derig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pa
47a6(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang lo yang sbyor ba'am mi sbyor ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
47a7(sna tshogs): chos gong sbyor ba'am mi sbyor ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang dang yang gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa'i
47a8(sna tshogs): slad du nye bor gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gnas par byed pa'am/ gnas par mi byed pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs
47b1(sna tshogs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang 'jug pa'am ldog pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu di ltar shes rab kyi
47b2(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang 'jug pa'am ldog pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi ba ba'am/ byed pa'i slad du nye bar
47b3(sna tshogs): gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gi bya ba'am byed par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dimago so// gsol pa/ bac+doMs shes
47b4(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gi mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma log so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
47b5(sna tshogs): ches gang mnyan po dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang sdud pa 'am/ kun
47b6(sna tshogs): sdud pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang bsdu bar bya ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi
47b7(sna tshogs): dmis so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba gang gis kyang nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'od ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
47b8(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa ni chos gang ba ba med pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
48a1(sna tshogs): gzugs zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pas shes
48a2(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// ma rig pa zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa
48a3(sna tshogs): dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang
48a4(sna tshogs): 'khrug pa zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// phyin ci log zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// sgrib pa lnga zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
48a5(sna tshogs): bzang bo// lta ba zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// bdug zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// sems can zab pas shes rab kyi pha
48a6(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa zab po// spros pa zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// spros pa med pa zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// tshul khrims dang / 'chal
48a7(sna tshogs): pa'i tshul khrims zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes
48a8(sna tshogs): rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / phyin ci log ma log pa dang
48b1(sna tshogs): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
48b2(sna tshogs): da ltar thung ba dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid za pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// mi 'jigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / mngon par shes pa zab pas shes rab kyi
48b3(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa zab po// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzab bo// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 
48b4(sna tshogs): dge bdun zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa dang
48b5(sna tshogs): 'dod chags dang bral ba zab pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// sgrib pa zab paso shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho na rgya
48b6(sna tshogs): che zhing zad ste/ dpag tu med do// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rgya che zhing zab ste/ dpag tu med do// shA rodwa ti'i bu zab ces bya ba ni chos rin po che dpag tu red pa ngas sra
48b7(sna tshogs): bar gyur pa gang gting mi rnyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ri'i bu zab ces bya ba de la 'gro ba mi rnyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu zab ces bya ba ni der yon tan gyi mtha' mi rtogs pa'o// shA radwa ti'i bu
48b8(sna tshogs): 'di lta ste dper na mtsho chen po rgya mtshon/ rin po che thams cad bsags pa rin po che dpag tu med pas gang ba rin po che chen pos rab tu gang ba'o// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
49a1(sna tshogs): phyin pa yang chos rin po che thams cad bsags pa chos rin po che chen po bsags pa chos rin po me dpag tu med pa bsags pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes
49a2(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang bstan par yang nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang bstan pa'i chos gang yang
49a3(sna tshogs): dmigs par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang 'tshal ba 'am/ ma 'tshal bar nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka
49a4(sna tshogs): skul pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos pa 'am mi shes par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
49a5(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang bsrung ba' ma/ sba ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
49a6(sna tshogs): ni chos gang bsrung ba 'am sba bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang kun tu sdud pa 'am/ yongasu
49a7(sna tshogs): sdud pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa mo lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos gang kun tu bsdu ba 'am/ yongasu bsdu bar bya ba'i chos gang
49a8(sna tshogs): ying mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi gon su yang nye bar gnas bai ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
49b1(sna tshogs): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la gnas bca' ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi
49b2(sna tshogs): gnas sam/ gzhir yang nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la gnas sam gzhir bya ba'i chos gang yang mi
49b3(sna tshogs): dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mngon par zhen par nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di
49b4(sna tshogs): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la mngon bar zhen por bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
49b5(sna tshogs): ni chos gang la yang lhag par zhen pa nye bar gan sa ba ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ni chos gang la yang lhag par zhen pa
49b6(sna tshogs): bya ba'i chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang dang yang gnas pa 'am mi gnas par nye bar
49b7(sna tshogs): gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang dang lhan cig tu gnas pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom
49b8(sna tshogs): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi mtshams sbyar ba 'o mo mtshams sbyar bar lags par yang nye bar gnas pa la lags/ bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu
50a1(sna tshogs): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang mtshams sbyar bar bya ba 'am/ mtshams sbyar ba bya ba ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcwas
50a2(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la yang 'dod chags sam/ 'dod chags dang bral bar nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pa
50a3(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa ni ches gang la chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ mi chags par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
50a4(sna tshogs): ni chos gang la yang zhe sdang ngam zhe sdang ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gong la zhe
50a5(sna tshogs): sdang dang bcas pa'am/ zhe sdang med pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la yang gti mug
50a6(sna tshogs): gam/ gti mug dang bral bar nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la rmongs pa'am rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i
50a7(sna tshogs): chos gang la mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi shes pa po 'am shes par bgyid pa ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa
50a8(sna tshogs): ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang shes pa 'am chos gang shes par byed par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
50b1(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi rang bzhin nam/ rang bzhin ma lags par nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50b2(sna tshogs): byin pa ni chos gang gau rang bzhin nam rang bzhin ma yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gi
50b3(sna tshogs): dag pa'am rnam par dag par yang nye bar gnas pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang sbyang po 'am rnam par sbyong ba'i
50b4(sna tshogs): chos gang yang yang dag par rdza su mi mthong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa lag so// bka' stsal po/ 
50b5(sna tshogs): ri'i bu gzugs yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa yongasu dgo/ shA ri'i bu tshor bo dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs
50b6(sna tshogs): su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// ma rig pa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// 'du byed yongasu dag pa dang / rnam par shes
50b7(sna tshogs): pa yongasu dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongasu dge ba dang / skye mched drug yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / srang ba dang / 
50b8(sna tshogs): len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'tsho ba yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
51a1(sna tshogs): ba dang / yid mi bad nga dang / 'khrug pa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / lta bar gyur pa yongasu dag pas
51a2(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dge/ bdag dang / sems can dang / 
51a3(sna tshogs): srog dang / gso dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shad bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa dang / slong ba po dang
51a4(sna tshogs): kun nas slong ba po dang / mthong ba po yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dog/ chad pa dang // rtag pa yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dge/ 
51a5(sna tshogs): mtha' dang / mtha' med pa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo// sbyin pa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo/ tshul
51a6(sna tshogs): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu da'o// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
51a7(sna tshogs): yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// byas so pa dang / 
51a8(sna tshogs): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi su dgo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par sbeng ba yong su dog pas shes
51b1(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo// phyin ci ma log pa yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam
51b2(sna tshogs): yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo/ mngon par shes pa yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo// lam yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol
51b3(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa yong su dag go// nyan thos kyi so yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag go// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
51b4(sna tshogs): dag go// sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag go/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha
51b5(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo// 'das pa dang / ma'o/ ngas pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo/ thogs
51b6(sna tshogs): pa med pa'i ye shes yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51b7(sna tshogs): yong su dag go// 'dod pa'i khams yongasu dag pa dang / gzugs kyi khams yong su dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51b8(sna tshogs): yesu dag go// sa'i khams yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo// chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52a1(sna tshogs): yongasu dgo/ sems can gyi khams yo su dag pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongasu dag pa dang / na mkha'i khams yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52a2(sna tshogs): yongasu dgo/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
52a3(sna tshogs): pa rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa ngo mtshar lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu na mkha' yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
52a4(sna tshogs): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs ma mchis/ bstan du ma mchis pa lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos
52a5(sna tshogs): gang gi gzugs yongasu grub pa las bstan par nye bar ga nus pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis
52a6(sna tshogs): pa lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la thogs pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan
52a7(sna tshogs): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma bgyis pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
52a8(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par 'du 'a ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang dang lhan cig 'du bar 'gyur ba
52b1(sna tshogs): chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gangagasu ma mchis pa la gso// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
52b2(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang gis gdags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thun mong ma lag so// 
52b3(sna tshogs): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang dang thun mong du 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang mi dmig so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
52b4(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshon nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
52b5(sna tshogs): phyin pa'i don snang ba ma mchis pa la gso// bka' stsal pa/ snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom lnga na 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
52b6(sna tshogs): mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu gzugs mtha' yas ngas pha rol tu phyin pa 'a di mtha' yaso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
52b7(sna tshogs): rnams dang / rnam par shes po mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// phyin ci log mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// sgrib pa mtha' yaso
52b8(sna tshogs): bas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'du byed rnams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / ming dang gzugs mtha'
53a1(sna tshogs): yas pa dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nab dang / 'ching dang / mya ngan dang / sna
53a2(sna tshogs): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yaso// lta bar 'gyur ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'dod chags
53a3(sna tshogs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mtha' yas pa dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa mtha' yas pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'i mu mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// phyi ma'i mtha'i
53a4(sna tshogs): mu mtha' yas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// sbyin pa mtha' yas pa dang / tshul khrims mtha' yas pa dang / bzod pa mtha' yas pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha'
53a5(sna tshogs): yas pa dang / bsam gtan mtha' yas pa dang // shes rab mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma tha' ya so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa dang / 
53a6(sna tshogs): yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa dang / phyin log pa mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa
53a7(sna tshogs): 'di ni mtha' yas pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang // snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// dmigs po mahA
53a8(sna tshogs): yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'od mtha' yaso// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang
53b1(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas kyis mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yaso// nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
53b2(sna tshogs): mtha' ya so// bdag dang / sems can mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// 'dod pa'i khams mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yaso// gzugs kyi
53b3(sna tshogs): khams mtha' yas pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang / sgrib pa mtha' yas pas
53b4(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas// 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ye shes mthong ba mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa nga mtha' ya so// chags pa med
53b5(sna tshogs): pa mtha' yos pa dang / namakha' mtha' yas pa dang // chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' ya so// shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
53b6(sna tshogs): thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs so// gang gis kyang mi dmig so// shA radwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas mu med pa'o// 'di lnga ste dpar ni na mkha'
53b7(sna tshogs): mtha' mi dmigs pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' yang mi dmig so// sa'i khams mtha' yas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par lta'o// 
53b8(sna tshogs): chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang / ma'i khams mtha' yos pa dang / rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mthayas pas shes rab kyi pha rol
54a1(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa mtha' yas par khong du chud par bya'o// shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' med/ dbus med/ ru med par khong du chung bar bya'o// shA ri'i
54a2(sna tshogs): bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnaso// shA'i'i bu gzugs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu rnyed par rig par ba'o// de
54a3(sna tshogs): bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byeng rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi med par rig par bya'o// mo rig pa ru
54a4(sna tshogs): med pa nas/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / sma sngags 'don pa dang // sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i bar du mi med pas/ shA ri'i bu shes rnyed kyi pha rol tu
54a5(sna tshogs): phyin pa ni mu med par rig par bya'o// phyin ci log mu med pa dang // sgrib pa mu med pa dang / lta bar song ba mu med pas shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par
54a6(sna tshogs): rig par bya'o// bdag mu med pa dang / sems can mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// sbyin pa mu med pa dang / tshul khrims mu med pa dang / bzod pa mu med pa
54a7(sna tshogs): dang / brtson 'grus mu med pa dang / bsam gtan mu med pa dang / shes rab mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu mod par rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dge pa'i
54a8(sna tshogs): spong ba mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bosam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin
54b1(sna tshogs): dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mu mad
54b2(sna tshogs): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu mngon par shes pa mu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba mu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
54b3(sna tshogs): ba mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos mu med pa dang / nyan thos kyi chos mu med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mu
54b4(sna tshogs): med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig por bya'o// shA ri'i bu rig pa mu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba mu med pa dang / rnam par
54b5(sna tshogs): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mu dmig su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54b6(sna tshogs): phyin pa mu med pa zhes bya'o// mtha' dmigs su med pas mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' med pa zhes bya ba da ni mu med pa'i tshig go/ shA ri'i bu bdag ma
54b7(sna tshogs): skyes pas chos thams cad mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu na mkha' mtha' yas pas chos thams cad mtha' yas mu med par rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka'
54b8(sna tshogs): stsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu dag gi yul du gyur
55a1(sna tshogs): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyang mi dmigs na chos ma yin pa lta ci smos/ 
55a2(sna tshogs): lam yang mi dmigs na lam ma yin pa lta ci smos/ tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs shing rlom sems su mi byed na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims lta ci smos te/ khams gsum
55a3(sna tshogs): thams cad du yang mi gtogs/ srid par 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'phro ba dang / skye ba thams cad du yang mi gtogs/ lus dang srog la yang mi chags na/ phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams
55a4(sna tshogs): la lta ci smos te/ 'khor ba'i rgyud mthar byas pa srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las brgal ba/ yul chen po las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di dag gi yul dang
55a5(sna tshogs): bgrod pa yin no// yul thams cad yul ma yi na par gang gis yongasu shes pa de dang de dag ni rnam pa de lta bu'i skyes bu dam pa dag ste/ yul thams cad la mi
55a6(sna tshogs): chags pa de dang de dag ni seng ge chen po'o// yul thams cad la ma zhum pa de dang de dag ni rnam pa de lta bu dgo// yul thams cad kyis mi gos pa de dang de dag ni yul ma 'dras
55a7(sna tshogs): pa'o// yul thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba de dang de dag ni ded dpon chen po ste/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di ni de dag gi yul dang bgrod pa yin no// shA ri'i bu 'khor 'di na
55a8(sna tshogs): gang chos 'di lam mos shing yul du gyur pa 'am gang chos rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la som nyi dang bcas pa'am the tshom dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang ngas
55b1(sna tshogs): ma mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu 'khor 'di ni chos 'di la the tshom med do// nem nur med do// yid gnyis med do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni chos 'di la yid gnyis mdo/ 
55b2(sna tshogs): shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa 'di dag ni sems can thams cad kyi yid gnyis yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir gnas pa'o// shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni 'di lta bu'i chos la som ni med
55b3(sna tshogs): de/ so mnye las yang dag par 'das pa'o// shA ri'i bu gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na chos bstan pa 'di nyan pa de dag kyang chos thams cad la the tshom med par gnas te/ 
55b4(sna tshogs): sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad pa'i phyir zhugs par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams ni chos 'di la mos par ngas ma bshad do// chos 'di
55b5(sna tshogs): la de dag ni go skabs med de 'di ni de dag gi nor ma yin no// shA ri'i bu chos bstan pa 'di gang dag gi rna la ma du thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu
55b6(sna tshogs): dang ldan pa ma yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bad pa lta ci smos te/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos
55b7(sna tshogs): la nges par lung bstan te/ ji ltar da ltar nga sang ga'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra dang / skyes bu chen po'i sgra dang / rang byung gi sgra sgrogs pa bzhin du de dag kyang seng
55b8(sna tshogs): ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyuraro// gang dag zan chos 'di la dad pa bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdun pa bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ches bstan
56a1(sna tshogs): / pa yang de nyid yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag chos zab mo thos nas dga' ba bskyed cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mos pa bskyed pa de dag shin
56a2(sna tshogs): tu rung bar draka'o// shA ri'i bu de dag kyang sems can gang chos zab mo thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing mos pa bskyed do dag pa chen po dang
56a3(sna tshogs): ldan pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas klog pa dang / mos pa dang / dga' ba dang / 
56a4(sna tshogs): yid bde ba chen po bskyed pa dang / phyir zhing nyan pa'i phyir chos 'di la 'dun pa bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang 'khor ba chen por zhugs par ngas ma bshad na/ lung nod pa dang
56a5(sna tshogs): kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan la ston pa lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dras par gyur par ma zhugs shing ma nges pa ni ngas bla na med
56a6(sna tshogs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// shA ri'i bu chos kyi mchog 'di la chos chung ngu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi go skabs ngas ma mthong ngo // shA ri'i du
56a7(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas kyi byang chuba'i don rgya chen sems can ni phal cher dman pa la mos shing chos chung ngu dang ldan te/ 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo chags pa med pa la dge bar ma byas shing
56a8(sna tshogs): mi mkhaso// shA ri'i bu 'di ni sems can gang dag rgya che zhing chos rgya chen po la mos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dgos pa shin tu yongasu rnyed pa/ go cha chen
56b1(sna tshogs): po shin tu bgos bdod legs par rnam par rdzogs pa/ lam chen po drang zhing nyam nga ba med pa/ tshang tshing med pa/ mnyam pa/ smyig ma dang cher ma med pa/ ngam grog dang g.yang
56b2(sna tshogs): sa med pa/ gtsang ga gnod pa med pa/ gya gyu med pa/ yon po ma yin par zhugs pa dang / shA ri'i bu gang dag 'jig rten la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la bde ba dang / 'jig rten
56b3(sna tshogs): la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ snang ba byed pa/ sems can rnams kyi mu stegasu gyur pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
56b4(sna tshogs): phan par snying brtse ba/ pan par 'dod pa/ bde bar 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa/ sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar bar nye bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems
56b5(sna tshogs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gi nor chen po yin no// shA ri'i bu sems can chen po de dag ni chos po// ni mchog 'di tshol ba ste/ 'i do ni de dag gi nor da
56b6(sna tshogs): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu sems can bsod nams mkhas pa/ dman pa la mos pa/ dad pa rab tu nyams pa rnams ni chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di la mos pa mi skye'o// 
56b7(sna tshogs): shA ri'i bu ngas de la dgengs te sems can dman pa la mos po rnams kyang dman pa la mos pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa rnams kyang rgya chen po la mos pa khams so so
56b8(sna tshogs): sbyar zhes pa sha // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul gang lag
57a1(sna tshogs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
57a2(sna tshogs): pa'i yul dang spyod yul ni mtha' ya so// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na rlung gi khams kyi yul dang spyod yul ni mtha' yas so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
57a3(sna tshogs): nga'i yul dang spyod yul yang mtha' yas so// shA ri'i bu 'di lta sde dper na na mkha' ni rlung gi khams kyi yul dang spyod yul lo// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
57a4(sna tshogs): byin pa'i yul dang spyod yul ni na mkha'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams kyi yul dang spyod yul ni mtha' yaso// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
57a5(sna tshogs): phyin pa'i yul dang spyad yul yang mtha' ya so// shA ri'i/ bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni gang na yang mi snang zhing chos gang
57a6(sna tshogs): mngon par grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang la yang mi snang zhing chos gang
57a7(sna tshogs): mngon par grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar gnas pa ma yino// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni gzung du med cing yongasu ma grub pas kha
57a8(sna tshogs): dog gi mtshan ma'i grangs su mi 'gro'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzung du med cing yongasu ma grub pas kha dog dang mtshan ma gang gis kyang
57b1(sna tshogs): gang gi grangs su yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni chos gang yongasu grub par mthong bar nye bar 'gro ba
57b2(sna tshogs): ma yin no// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang yongs su grub par mthong bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
57b3(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid med do// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i kha
57b4(sna tshogs): dang / rlung gi khams ni chos gang gi yongasu grub pa'i mtshan nyi du yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos gang
57b5(sna tshogs): yongasu grub pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar 'gro ba ma yin// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// shA rI'i
57b6(sna tshogs): 'di lta ste dper na na mkha'i khams ni gang du yang mi chag so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gang du yang mi tshogs te/ de'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mang
57b7(sna tshogs): nyid ces pa'o// shA ri'i bu chags pa mang ba la ni mtshan nyid ci yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyi zhes
57b8(sna tshogs): bde ni tha snyad kyi tshig go// shA ri'i bu chags pa med pa la ni mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma med de/ de cing mtshan nyid med par bstar to// shA ri'i bu chags pa med pa zhes
58a1(sna tshogs): ba de'i chags pa ye su shes pa'o// da ni chags pa mi dmig so// de ni chags pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin no// de chags pa'i phyin ci ma log pa yongs su
58a2(sna tshogs): shes pa'o// shA ri'i bu chags pa la chags pa med de/ nga'i phyir chags pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid dang / chags pa mi dmigs pa'i chags pa med pa zhes bya'o// 
58a3(sna tshogs): ri'i bu ye shes bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshogs pa mang ba'i mtshan nyid do// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de chos gang
58a4(sna tshogs): mtshan nyid gang yin pa da mtshan nyid meng ba ste/ chos gang yang mtshan nyid mngon par grub pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gang la mtshan nyid med pa de ni mtshan nyid med pa
58a5(sna tshogs): zhes bya'o// gang mtshan nyid med pad la chags pa me da do// gal te chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig yod na ni chos thams cad la chags par yang 'gyur na/ gang gi phyir chos
58a6(sna tshogs): thams cad mtshan nyid med pa de'i phyir de dag la chags pa med de/ des na chos thams cad chags pa meng ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no// gang chags
58a7(sna tshogs): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni brjod par mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ med pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// dben pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// mi dmigs pa'i
58a8(sna tshogs): phyir chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// shA ri'i bu chos gang chags po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos gang yin pa de ni mthong ba cir yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin zhing mi mthong bar
58b1(sna tshogs): bar yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang de sems can rnams la chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bstan pa pa'o// shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid
58b2(sna tshogs): med pa ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ni mtshan nyid kyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin gyi/ shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa ni pin ci log gis nye bar gnas pa'o// phyin ci log gang yin pa
58b3(sna tshogs): de ni mtshan nyid nga'o// gang mtshan nyid med pa de tha snyad kyis kyang mtshan nyid med de de mtshan nyid med pa kho na'o// shA ri'i bu rnam par byang ba gang yin pa de yang mtshan nyid nang
58b4(sna tshogs): nga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu kun nas nyon mong sa pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid mang ba rnam par byang ba lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongasu shes pa ni
58b5(sna tshogs): yang dag bI ji lta ba bzhin te/ de la kun nas nyon/ mongs pa ci yang med mod kyi/ sems can rnams ni phyin ci log pas kun nas nyon mong so// gang phyin ci log pa de yang
58b6(sna tshogs): dag pa ma yin no// grang yang dag pa ma yin pa de yang dag par yongasu grub pa 'am mtshan nyid mad do// shA ri'i bu gang de ltar shes pa de ni rnam par byang ba zhes pa'o// kun nas
58b7(sna tshogs): nyon mongs pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid med na rnam par byang ba lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni mtshan nyid med cing
58b8(sna tshogs): yongasu ma grub pa'o// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med cing yo su ma grub pa ste/ de ni chags pa med pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i mtshan ring
59a1(sna tshogs): ces bya ba ni chos thams cad chags pa med pa yin na/ shA'i'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni chags pa med pa 'a chags/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni chos thams cad
59a2(sna tshogs): chags pa med pa'i mtshon nyid de ye shes kyi spyod yul zhes bstan to// shA ri'i bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yulo// chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes kyi spyod
59a3(sna tshogs): yul ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas zhes bya'o// gang tshogs pa med pa de'i yul dang spyod yul mtha' ya so// shA ri'i
59a4(sna tshogs): bu spyod yul zhes bya ba de ni skyed yul med pa'i tshig bla dwag so// shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyod yul bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis phye ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu
59a5(sna tshogs): yul zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad yul med pa'o// / da ni yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid dang ji lta ba bzhon pa'o// med pa'i phyir chos thams cad yul mod de chos rnams de ltar
59a6(sna tshogs): yongasu shes pa de ni yul dang spyod yul zhes bya ste/ ji skad du brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin no// gang chos rnams de ltar yongasu shes pa ni gang la yang chags pa med de chags pa med
59a7(sna tshogs): pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta bu'i chos 'di la grogs mang du ma rnyed do// 'di lta
59a8(sna tshogs): bu'i chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa'o// shA ri'i bu chos 'di la bden
59b1(sna tshogs): ba mthong ba'i nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag par mi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par grogs gzhan gang
59b2(sna tshogs): yang med de/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa chos 'di la spyod pa de dag kyang the tshom du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o the tshom med pa lus mngon sum du gyur pa rnams chos 'di
59b3(sna tshogs): la bzod pa thob par 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu bis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi lag tu
59b4(sna tshogs): 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bas pa
59b5(sna tshogs): de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni sems can gang dag dge bi'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsam pa dge ba/ sangs rgyas btsam
59b6(sna tshogs): ldan 'das rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ byang chub kyi phyir sa bon bskyed pa sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas pa/ tshul
59b7(sna tshogs): bzhin kun 'dri ba de dag gi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ni gang dag bzod pa 'thob pa dang nye bar gyur pa dang / bzod pa thob pa de dag gi lag tu
59b8(sna tshogs): 'gro bar 'gyur// gang dag lung bstan pa de dag kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ smon lam gyi dbang gis ni
60a1(sna tshogs): / pa gtogs so// gang dag lung ma bstan pa dag kyang myu du mngon sum du lung bstan pa thob par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsub yong su ma
60a2(sna tshogs): smin pa'i rna lam du mdo sde 'di thos par gyur pa da dag kyang lung bstan pa nyid du rig par bya na/ gang mdo sde 'di rnyed pa dang / yi ger bri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha
60a3(sna tshogs): ton byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa lnga ci smos/ shA ri'i bu sems can gang dag dag pa'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa de dag gis mdo sde 'di mnyan pa dang / yi gar bring
60a4(sna tshogs): dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa de ni gnas mdang / shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsub 'bar ba rnams kyi lag tu 'gro bar 'gyuraro// 
60a5(sna tshogs): shAri bu khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can nam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma
60a6(sna tshogs): des chos 'di rnyed na spro ba chung ba dang / le lo dang / gnyid che ba dang / shes bzhin med pa dang / dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang / sems g.yang ba dang / zang zing la chags pa dang
60a7(sna tshogs): brkam pa dang / mu tsor smra ba dang / smyon thabs dang / kha byir dang / dbang po phal par mi bya'o// shA ri'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa dag kyang mi slu'o// byang chub sems dpa'i chos
60a8(sna tshogs): 'di rnyed nas bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dong / mos pa dang / le lo med po dang / dbang po bsdams pa dang / mu cor mi smra ba rab tu bston par bya'o// dran pa nye bar
60b1(sna tshogs): gzag pa dang / mang du thos pa la sbyor bar bya'o// brtson 'grus brtsams la 'di lta bu'i yon tan 'di dag yongasu bsrang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lnga ngu'i chos thos pa'i 'bras
60b2(sna tshogs): bu ni 'di ma yin te/ gang dang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos 'di lta bu'i chos thos na bag dang par mi 'gyur ba dang / yin rton par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dun pa yong su nyams
60b3(sna tshogs): pa dang / brtson 'grus bri ba dang / ma grims pa ston pa dang / gnod sems mang du 'gyur ba doni thos pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no// de dag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di zos pa ma yin no// 
60b4(sna tshogs): shA ri'i bu thos shes pa ba nga ni yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi tshig bla dwags te/ log pa'i nan tan gyis ma yin no// shA ri'i bu log par zhugs pas ni chos 'di thos pa mi 'gyur ro// 
60b5(sna tshogs): shA ri'i bu thos nas khyod don la mkhas shing nan tan gyis gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bu log par zhugs pa rnams la rjesu mthun pa'i bzod pa yang mang ngo // shA ri
60b6(sna tshogs): bu gang ji skad bstan pa'i chos 'di la log par ma sgrub pa de ni chos 'di la nan tan byed pa zhes pa'o// shA ri'i bu bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag nan tan la gnas
60b7(sna tshogs): pade dag ni phyir ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ myur du chos 'di yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam la yid brtan par mi bya ste/ chos 'di
60b8(sna tshogs): yeng sum grub kyi bar du brtson pa mi gtong bas kyang ying brtan par mi bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang chos 'di la bslabs pa dang / yongasu grub pa dang / bzong po theb pa de ni phyir ngan
61a1(sna tshogs): song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mi byed do// da ni phyir le lo dang / 'bri ba la brten par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyuraro// de lhod par
61a2(sna tshogs): yang mi 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yongasu shes pa yin no// des chos thams cad ni byin ci log las byung ste yang dag
61a3(sna tshogs): pa ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba yin no// de ltar yang dag po mthong ba de ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// nges pa dang tshig nyung ba dang / tshul
61a4(sna tshogs): khrims rnam par dag pa la gnas pa dang / cho ga dang spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / sdom pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu sems can de lta bu la lha rnams kyang
61a5(sna tshogs): mos par 'gyur na/ mi rnams lta ci smos/ sems can de lta bu la lha rnams kyang dga' bar 'gyur na mi rnams lta ci smos/ de dag gi nang du lha rnams kyang 'gro bar
61a6(sna tshogs): 'gyur na/ mi rnams lta ci smos/ de dag la lha rnams kyis kyang bkur bsti bya bar 'os pa yin na mi rnams lta ci smos/ de dag la lha rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur na mi rnams lnga
61a7(sna tshogs): ci smos/ de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / na mkha'i lding dang / dri za rnams kyang de dag la bsrung bar 'gyur/ de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbeng pa'i
61a8(sna tshogs): phyir 'bad par 'gyur// dnga'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / bam po bzhi pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
61b1(sna tshogs): smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ston pa yang 'di na mngon sum du gyur/ 'khor 'di yang chos zab mo bstan pa'i snod du gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'khor 'di ni dag cing
61b2(sna tshogs): zab mo'i chos zos par 'dod na khyod ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te spobs par mi byed pa cang mi smra bar 'dug/ de skad ces smos pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
61b3(sna tshogs): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kho bos ni gang lo brnams te spobs par bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos na
61b4(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / byang chub sems dpa' dang / spobs pa dang / gang spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis spobs par 'gyur ba
61b5(sna tshogs): dang / gang las spobs pa yang mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
61b6(sna tshogs): po dang / gang spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis spongs par 'gyur ba dang / gang las spobs par 'gyur ba dang / gong la spobs par 'gyur ba ma mithong na ji skad du bstan par bya/ 
61b7(sna tshogs): kho bos gang la brtsams te spobs par bya/ shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha snyad med pa/ smrar med pa/ brjod du med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab
61b8(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni smra ba 'am/ bstod pa 'am/ brjod par mi nus ste/ gang de ltar lan 'debs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi
62a1(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i gu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni 'das pa'i mngon nyid
62a2(sna tshogs): ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtshan nyid du bstan par mi nuso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha snyad ma yin te mtshan nyid med pa'o// 
62a3(sna tshogs): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'das pa'i
62a4(sna tshogs): mtshan nyid dam/ ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ da ltar zung ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'a
62a5(sna tshogs): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'das pa'i mtshan nye da dang / ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / da ltar byung po'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
62a6(sna tshogs): phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de
62a7(sna tshogs): bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
62a8(sna tshogs): 'du bye salas rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
62b1(sna tshogs): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
62b2(sna tshogs): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan mu yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid de ni gdams pa 'am/ tshig gi las
62b3(sna tshogs): kyis brjod pa ra ma/ bslad par ram/ lan gdab par mi nuso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
62b4(sna tshogs): byin pa rdog so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa ni chos gang bstan pa'i mtshan nyid du yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin te/ gzugs bstan pa'i mtshan nyid
62b5(sna tshogs): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam por shes pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid du nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan
62b6(sna tshogs): nyid du nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / bdag gi mtshan nyid dang / sems can gyi mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du ba'i
62b7(sna tshogs): mtshan nyid dang / 'bral ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dang / sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang / bde ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / skye
62b8(sna tshogs): ba'i mtshan cing dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid dang / kun rdzong
63a1(sna tshogs): mtshan nyid dang / don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid dang / brdzun pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'pho ba'i mngan nyid dang / 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid du nye bar
63a2(sna tshogs): gnas pa ma yin no// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe'am/ 
63a3(sna tshogs): 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe 'am/ 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe 'am/ 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes de su yis mthong bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan
63a4(sna tshogs): pa shA radwa ti'i bu chos gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i chos de kho bos yang dag par N+ye su mi mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
63a5(sna tshogs): phyin pa ni chos gang nges par bstan par yang nye ba ra 'gro ba 'am/ nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
63a6(sna tshogs): pa ni gzugs nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin// 
63a7(sna tshogs): mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba mo yin no// khams rnams nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin/ rten cing
63a8(sna tshogs): 'brel par 'byung ba nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin/ rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba nges par bstan par nye bar 'gro ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang
63b1(sna tshogs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab nges par 'byed par 'gro ba yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par bstan par nye bar mi 'gro'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta snga chos gang nges
63b2(sna tshogs): par bstan par yang 'khar mi 'gro ba'i chos de ji ltar brjod cing nges par bstan par 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi tshul de ltar rab tu shes pa
63b3(sna tshogs): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par rag tu sheso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par
63b4(sna tshogs): yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// tshor
63b5(sna tshogs): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bstan par nye bor gnas pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye
63b6(sna tshogs): bar gnas pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba bstan pa dang / 
63b7(sna tshogs): nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ pin ci log rnams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams
63b8(sna tshogs): bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnos pa ma yin/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar
64a1(sna tshogs): gnas pa ma yin/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ 
64a2(sna tshogs): tshul khrims dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / 
64a3(sna tshogs): bsam gtan dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
64a4(sna tshogs): dang / yang dag pa spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshad med pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa
64a5(sna tshogs): dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang // mngon par shes pa bstan pa dang / nges par bstan/ par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ bden pa dang / lam dang / 
64a6(sna tshogs): 'bras bu bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa dang / nges par bstan par
64a7(sna tshogs): nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa dong / nges par bstan par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ chos
64a8(sna tshogs): shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / bstan pa dang / bstan du med par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ mi skye ba shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / 'gog par shes pa bstan pa'am/ bstan
64b1(sna tshogs): pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa 'am/ bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ chos gang bstan
64b2(sna tshogs): pa 'am/ bstan pa ma yin par yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa de'i tha snyad bstan par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang bstan pa 'am/ 
64b3(sna tshogs): bstan pa ma yin par nye bar gnas pa ma yin par bstan pa 'di lta bu khong du chud ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yang
64b4(sna tshogs): sheso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang sbyor ba'am/ mi sbyor bar nye bar gnas pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
64b5(sna tshogs): ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzug sa la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed/ kun tu mi sbyor ba ra yang mi byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
64b6(sna tshogs): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes po la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed// kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byed do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun tu sbyor ba yang mi byed/ kun tu mi sbyor bar
64b7(sna tshogs): yang mi byed do// 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed/ kun tu mi sbyor bar yang mi byung ngo // sa'i
64b8(sna tshogs): khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed/ kun tu mi sbyor ba yang mi byed do// sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi
65a1(sna tshogs): khams dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / nam kha'i khams la kun tu sbyor bar yang mi byed/ kun tu mi sbyar bar yang mi byed // tshul khrims dang / 'chal pa'i tshul
65a2(sna tshogs): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / gnod sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab la kun tu sbyor
