183a6(sna tshogs): spyod pa yin/ byang chub sems mkhas rig pa gang gi dus kyi tshe// skye meng rnam par bsams te 'di ltar spyod byed cing // snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can
183a7(sna tshogs): 'du shes na/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes bskyeng // 'gro ba rnams kyi don pa sdug
183a8(sna tshogs): bsngal spang snyam ste// bdag dang sems can yongs brtag byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol pin mchog spyod pa yin// bdag ci 'dra bde dra
183b1(sna tshogs): sems can thams cad shes// sems can thams cad ci 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes// skye ba med dang skye ba gnyi kar mi rtog pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin
183b2(sna tshogs): mchog spyod pa yin// 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed yongs brjod pa// kun la skye ba dang ni yang dag 'das spangs nas// ye shes 'chi med dam pa de las gzhan
183b3(sna tshogs): med theg// de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rigs med de lngar spyod / shes rab ldan te mnyam nying gnas par shes par bya
183b4(sna tshogs): chos rnams rang bzhin meng par yongasu shes gyur pa/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor la mi gnas
183b5(sna tshogs): shing // gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems dpar mi gnas la// rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyi nga gnas pa ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol par
183b6(sna tshogs): mchog spyod pa yin// rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag mang de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin stong // 'bras bu thob dang dgra bcos so la ma
183b7(sna tshogs): gnas shing // rang rgyal sa dang de bzhin sangs rgyas ser mi gnas// ji ltar 'dren pa 'dus ma byas khams mi gnas shing // de bzhin 'dus byas la yang mi gnas med spyod
183b8(sna tshogs): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas/ gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas par gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs nyan
184a1(sna tshogs): 'gyur 'du ba skam dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin chos rgyal 'gyur 'dod pa// bzod pa 'di la ma brjer theb par mi nus te// rab ngan pa rol tu
184a2(sna tshogs): rol 'gro ngogs ma mthong bzhin// chos 'chang ba dang nyan dang bshad pa gang yin pa// 'bras bu thob dang rkyen rgyal de bzhin 'jig rjer mgor// mkhas pa
184a3(sna tshogs): gsal bas thob pa'i mya ngan 'das gang yin// de kun sgyu ma lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// gang zag ba'i po 'di dag nga la mi skrag snga// rgyal sras bdun la
184a4(sna tshogs): mkhas dang par mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom drim bis li cing som ni spangs pa dang // bzhi pa dag pa'i bshes kyi sa yengasu zar pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
184a5(sna tshogs): mkhas rig de ltar spyod pa ni// dgra bcom sa la mi slob rkyen rtogs sa la min// thams cad mkhan nyid cheng du sangs rgyas chos rjes slob// gang 'og srib mi slob la
184a6(sna tshogs): mi slob la9/ gzugs 'phel yongasu nyams dang yongasu gzung pir min// chos rnams sna tshogs yongasu gzung por mi slob par// sleb cing thams cad mkhyen pa
184a7(sna tshogs): nyid kyang yongs 'dzin la// nges 'byung gang yin pa 'di ni yon tan dga' ba'i slob// gzugs ni shes rab ma yin gzugs la shes rab meng // rnam shes 'du shes
184a8(sna tshogs): tshor dang sems pa 'di dag ni// shes rab ma yin 'di dag la yang shes rab med// 'di ni na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs te tha dad meng dmigs pa rnams kyi ring ba'i
184b1(sna tshogs): de ni pha mtha' med// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang pha mtha' med// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i shes rab de
184b2(sna tshogs): yang pa mtha' med// 'du shes tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongasu bsgrags// 'du shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro/ gang dag 'du shes bral ba
184b3(sna tshogs): 'di ni rjes thob pa// de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te sten pas kyang ni gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// skal par zhugs te sems can zhes sgra
184b4(sna tshogs): yongs bsgrags kyang // bzod nas dag pas sems can skye bar ga la 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab pha rol pa ni mchog spyod pa yin// gang che nga ni pha rol phyin pa'i
184b5(sna tshogs): mchog 'di dang // mthun par smra gyur de sngon gyi skyes mchog gis// ma 'ongs pa yi dus na sangs rgyas la gyu ro zhes// nga lung bstan par gyur ces
184b6(sna tshogs): rgyal bas de skad gsung // shes rab pha rol phyin po gang la mgon spyod pa// 'di ni gang zhig gus byas 'dzin dang / chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me
184b7(sna tshogs): ngang chus mi zhugs// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis klags kyang rnyed mo 'gyur// lnga las bde gshegs yongasu mya ngan 'das pa yis// mchod rten rin cher bdun
184b8(sna tshogs): las byas shing mchod bang la// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang gA yi// bye ma snyed kyis bye ba phrag stong zhing bkang ste// yongasu brtag bzung zhing rnams
185a1(sna tshogs): bya ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis// las gzhan mi byed lnga yi me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal
185a2(sna tshogs): pa 'am de bas lhag mchod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di glegs bam la bris te// 'chang zhing ma
185a3(sna tshogs): tog byug pas bsti stang byed 'gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni cher mi phod // rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che// sems can
185a4(sna tshogs): khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed/ gang ngag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla red
185a5(sna tshogs): 'gyur// gang dag phan dang snying rjer bcas pa'i spyad spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg/ 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang
185a6(sna tshogs): yin pa// bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung ba rig par bya// sa bon btab nas sa la gnas te 'byung 'gyur ba// tshogs pa rnyed nas rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par
185a7(sna tshogs): skye/  pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba// lam
185a8(sna tshogs): de nyid nas rin tshon bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro// de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal bas
185b1(sna tshogs): brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol ba// gal te gang+ga'i bye skad sangs rgyas zhing gyur la// de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byung bur gtams gyur kyang // bdag ni shes rab
185b2(sna tshogs): pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags// 'on kyang shes rab yongasu bsgoms pas mchod bgyid de// dper na rgyal po rten mo rim gro
185b3(sna tshogs): 'thob pa ltar// sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin tang med// gab che gang du stsal ba de ni phyag bgyi 'os// 
185b4(sna tshogs): de phyung gyur kyang gang tshe la ni dga' bgyid te// yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de yi lags// de bzhin shes rab pha rol pan mchog yon tan gyis// rgyal ba mya ngan 'das
185b5(sna tshogs): kyang ring bsrel mchod pa brnyas// de ltas gang zhi ga rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des// shes rab pha rol phyir blang 'di ni thar pa lags// sbyor ba sbyin
185b6(sna tshogs): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhi no// dge chos chung mi gzan phyin yongasu 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni chos rnams thams cad
185b7(sna tshogs): tshul gi cig ston par byed// dper na 'dzum+bu gling na shing rnams bye ba stong // rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma gzugs mang ba// grib mar gyur pa'i grangasu brjod pa ma gdog
185b8(sna tshogs): par/ grib ma sna tshogos med cing bye brag yong ma yin// de bzhin rgyal ba'i pha rol pa ni lnga 'di dag kyang / shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mang nyid thob par 'gyur// thams
186a1(sna tshogs): cad mkhyen pa nyid pir yongasu bsngos byas nas/ byang chub zhes par drug po 'di kun ro gcig 'gyur// yang chub sems dpa' gal ta rab tu mi shes bzhir/ 
186a2(sna tshogs): gzugs dang 'du shes tsher dang sems pa rnam par shes/ mi rtog yongasu ston pa bcos la spyod pa ste// mkhas pa nom yang chos rnams 'jig par mi byed do// gang la
186a3(sna tshogs): gzugs min tsher min 'du shes mi dmigs shing // rnam par shes pa ma yin sems pa mi dmigs la// chos kun skye mang stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa/ 'di
186a4(sna tshogs): ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// la las gang+ga ri klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams na// sems can ji srid 'a khong kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas// glang gis
186a5(sna tshogs): shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te// sem/ sa can mchog la glegs byin bsod nams khyad par 'a pags// ci pir zhe na sgra mchog de dag 'dir bslab
186a6(sna tshogs): nas/ chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir sngon byed// de dag nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reb
186a7(sna tshogs): gu med par 'jig rten sdong byung yong med na// de la yul 'dab me tog 'bras bug lnga 'byung // byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yong med ni// 'bras
186a8(sna tshogs): bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed // de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa'i
186b1(sna tshogs): shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan// dper nam dros pa'i klu bdag med gyur na// 'jam+bu gling 'di
186b2(sna tshogs): chu klung 'bab pa ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na me dog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang thang du
186b3(sna tshogs): med bde bar gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun kyang ga la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas
186b4(sna tshogs): chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na snang byeng srog chags ji sred pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'o nga rnams byung ba bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer
186b5(sna tshogs): gcig phyung ces mchog ste// snang byed tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phong // nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dang
186b6(sna tshogs): rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams chags bskyed pa'am// byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu yi rang sems gcig la// nyan thos tshogs rnams bsod nams phung pos char mi phod/ 
186b7(sna tshogs): 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang // zhing mang mtha' yas bye stong dag na gang bzhugs dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgo bo rnams// sdug
186b8(sna tshogs): bsngal zad par bya pir rin chen chos ston pa// dang po byang chub mchog tu sems skad bskyed pa nas// rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus// de bar rgyal ba de dag ba
187a1(sna tshogs): / nams gang yin pa// pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni can thos dang / sleb dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas
187a2(sna tshogs): zag meng pa// bsdus dang byang chub sems dpa' rjesu yi rang zhing // 'gro ba'i den rgyu byang chub phyir ni thams cad sngo// yongs sngo gal te semasu 'du shes 'byung 'gyur
187a3(sna tshogs): zhing / byang chub 'du shes yang so so sems can 'du shes na// 'du shes phyir ni lta gnas sems ni gsum la chags// dmigs pa yod pas yongasu bsngos par chung ma
187a4(sna tshogs): yin/ gal te 'di ltar chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yingasu bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyi sa la nam yang mi sde shes gyur na// de ltar rab tu
187a5(sna tshogs): shes pas yongasu bsngos pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsnga ma yin// ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub sngo ba yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang
187a6(sna tshogs): za ga/ dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltas 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ba bslab pa ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge ba de mkhyen pa// rnam pa gang yin
187a7(sna tshogs): 'byung gang yin nyid yin la// n+de su yi rang de lta de ltar yongasu bsngo// de ltar bsod nams byang chub yongasu sngo byed na// dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra// de ltar
187a8(sna tshogs): yongs sngo dpa' bo 'jig rten dmigs can gyis// byang chub ses dpa' ji snyed thams cad zil gyis nan// dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams// lam yang mi
187b1(sna tshogs): sa phreng khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga ni// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyi sa ni rab tu zin
187b2(sna tshogs): gyur pa/ tshe mig rang gyur cing 'di'i ming thob po// dper na ri mo'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// ji srid maug ma bris par rngan pa ma thob bzhin// gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas
187b3(sna tshogs): dang dkar nag chos/ shes rab rnam par bshig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe// 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol byin grangs 'gro/ namakha' gang la'ang cung zad m-i garas de dang 'dra/ 
187b4(sna tshogs): gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod bya zhing // sa ni sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang dgrol sems// sems can 'du shes yongs rtogs byang chub sems dpa'
187b5(sna tshogs): ste/ de ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe// pha rol pin 'ding spyod pa mkhas paso som ci med// thos
187b6(sna tshogs): ma thag tu de ni sten pa'i 'du shes skyed// des na byang chub zhi bu myur du rtogs par 'gyur// sngon chad chen sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang // rgyal ba'i shes rab pa rol par
187b7(sna tshogs): la ma dad na// thos nas bye chung des yis 'di ni spong byed de// spangs nas skyabs med gyur pa de ni mnar med 'gro/ de lta bas gal de sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ rag par 'dod na rgya
187b8(sna tshogs): ba'i yum 'dir dad par gyis// dper na tshong pa rin chen gling du song nas ni// zong zad slar log lta bur gyur na mi rung // gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu dag par rig par ba 'bras bu
188a1(sna tshogs): gzugs dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dag par gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa// na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa da bar yang gcad du mang
188a2(sna tshogs): dpa' bo gar spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis// khams gsum yang dag 'das la rnam par grol ba'ang min// nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed// rga dang na dang 'chi ba meng
188a3(sna tshogs): kyang 'chi 'pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dgi ming dang gzugs kyi 'angam la chags// rlung gi 'khor lo lte bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bar khyam/ 'gro ba 'khrul ba ri dgas rgyar chung 'drar shes
188a4(sna tshogs): nas/ shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod bu yongs dag gang zhig gzugs la mi spyod cing / rnam shes 'du shes tshor ba sems par mi spyong ma// nga ltar spyad
188a5(sna tshogs): pa chags pa thams cad yongs spong zhing // chags las rnam grol bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa'i bang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba/ chags pa bcad
188a6(sna tshogs): nas 'gro la chags pa med par 'gro// cim sgra gcan gza' bral ljang nger 'dug pa dang // me btang rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal sreg pa bzhin// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag cing yo
188a7(sna tshogs): dag par/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin lta na// byed pa po yang mi dmigs chos kun mi dmigs te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// rgyal ba la ni lnga
188a8(sna tshogs): rgyal brgya byin gyis nus pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab spyod pa ji ltar brtson// phung po khams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed cing // phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub se btsun
188b1(sna tshogs): gang zhing chos 'di sbrul dang sgyu ma 'drar shes nas// somanyi meng cing slong la phyir zhing sbyor byed pa// sems can de ni ring nas thag chen zhugs rig bya// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag
188b2(sna tshogs): byas yin// dgon pa'i lam ni dpag tshad mang por zhugs pa'i mis// gnag rdzi mtshams kyi nags tshal phun sum tshogs mthong na// ba sozo grong khyer nye ba'i rtogs snyam sde dbugs
188b3(sna tshogs): phyir rnyed par gyur cing chom rkun 'jigs pa med// de bzhin byang chub yongs tshol tsha rgyal rnams kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di mnyan pa gang thob pa// de ni dbugs pan thob par
188b4(sna tshogs): gyung cing 'jigs med// dgra bcoms la ma yin rkyen rtogaso sa la min// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni balnga phyir 'gro ba yis// gal te shing dang nags chal rimathong nga rung ring // ji snga
188b5(sna tshogs): rdegs ma mthong na rgya mtsho chen po ni// nye bar gyur to snyam na de la so nyi mang // de ltar byang chub dam par rab zhugs rgyal ba yi/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di
188b6(sna tshogs): rig par bya// rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum lung bstan ma gyur kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub ring por mi thogs bdag reg 'gyur// dpyid dus bzang la sdong po lo ma lda
188b7(sna tshogs): b+hur ra/ yal bas ring po mi thogs lo 'bras me tog skran// shes rab pha rol pon 'di su'i lag thob pa// ring por mi thogs 'dran pa rnams kyi ngang chub 'thob dpar
188b8(sna tshogs): bud med sbrum pang sdug bsngal nyen gyur na// da ni de'i btsi' ba'i dus la bab shes bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab nyan// dpa'i deng 'dun pa sbyang
189a1(sna tshogs): myung du byang chub dag/ shes rang pos phyin mchog skyed tshanal byor pa/ gzugs kyi 'phe ba dang ni yong su 'grib mi mthong // gang zhig chos dang chos mi dngos
189a2(sna tshogs): mi mthong zhing // bya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rdeg ste// stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bang chu bzhi mi rdog/ rnam par
189a3(sna tshogs): mi nog rngog bral bar gyi brlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyong pa yin// smra ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byer nus// yan 'an dga' ba rnams kyi bang du
189a4(sna tshogs): gcod gang lags// spen pas bka' stsal bar du gaHnga par 'gyur mang ste// nga las re shig cung zad tsam zhig yongasu brjed// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol pan 'di yig 'a
189a5(sna tshogs): tshe/ spabs pa tha dad rnam bdum 'byung 'gyur shing / 'gro ba'i don mabs par klog bzhin myung du yang // ye su nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni 'dud kyi las// 'di
189a6(sna tshogs): bshad tshe na kha cig sem nyi za 'gyur te// 'dren pas 'di'i bdag gi ming yang yongs ma brjod// rigs dang sa dang rus kyang yongasu ma brjod ces// de ni nyan par mi 'gyur spang
189a7(sna tshogs): 'gyur bdud kyi las// de ltar mi shes de dag rtsab bor nas ni// rmongs pas yal gdag dang 'dab ma tshol bar 'gyur// glang po rnyed kyang glang ba'i rjes ni tshol ba ltar// shes rab
189a8(sna tshogs): pha rol phyin thos mdo chol de bzhin no// dper na la la ro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la// zas mchog rnyed nas zas ngan rol bar byed pa ltar// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol pan
189b1(sna tshogs): ba 'di rnyed nas/ dgra bcom sa yis byang chub tshol byed nga bzhin no// sti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing rnyed pa 'dod 'gyur dang // lha dang bcas pa'i sems kyis khyim 'dris byed ldan zhing // ches
189b2(sna tshogs): btang nas ni chos min byang spyod 'gyur ba// lam ngor lam gol 'gro ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// gang dag de'i tshe na 'dun cing dang gyur nas// chos kyi dam pa 'di ni nyan du song ba
189b3(sna tshogs): las// de dag gis ni chos sku bya ba ldan rig nas// dga' ba med cing yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'gro/ de'i tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// de tshe gang dag gis ni dge
189b4(sna tshogs): slob mang dkrugs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin la ji 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i// bar du gcod pa rnam mang gA zhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur// rin chen rin tang
189b5(sna tshogs): mang ba rnyed gyur gang dag yin// de dag dkon la dus rnams rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ rin chen chos kyang
189b6(sna tshogs): dkon la rtag 'tshe ba'ang mang // theg pa gsar du zhugs pa'i sems can blo chung ba// gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni ma rnyed na// de la bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur
189b7(sna tshogs): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag yongasu 'dzin la sbyor// ma zhig na bar gyur la bu ni mang yod pa// de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim gror byed// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig
189b8(sna tshogs): rnar khams kyi sangs rgyas kyang // yum gyur shes rab dam pa 'di la dgangs pa mdzad// gang dag 'dis dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang dang // ma 'ongs dus na 'bru
190a1(sna tshogs): 'gyur de dag 'di las 'byung // 'jig rten ston pa rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum/ sems cad gzhan dang sems kyi spyod pa sben par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin
190a2(sna tshogs): nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid // drang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal sras de bzhin nyid// gcig pa cing de dnges bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid// shes rab pha rol byin pa de bzhin gsheg
190a3(sna tshogs): pas mkhyen// mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung // chos nyi skyon med chos rnams stong pa 'di gnas te// byang chub sems dpas de'i don nyid 'di rjesu rtogs// 
190a4(sna tshogs): de phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs rgyas mtshon gsol to// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dga' tshal la rten pa// stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te/ sen
190a5(sna tshogs): sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'dodan kyang // de dag nams kyang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med kang de/ ra ni seng ge ri su la brjer ras 'jigs med bar// ri
190a6(sna tshogs): drags phra mo mang skrag byed cing sgra sgrogs ltar// mi'i seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas// mu stegs can mang skrag byed 'jig rten sgra yang sgrogs// dper na na mkhar gnas
190a7(sna tshogs): pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston// de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyir rten pa// sred pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab
190a8(sna tshogs): ston// gzugs rnams mi thong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing // 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing // gong la rnam par shes dang sems yid mthong med pa// 'di
190b1(sna tshogs): ni ngos bzong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// na mkhar mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa// namakha' ji ltar mthong sde don 'di brtags par gyis/ de ltar
190b2(sna tshogs): mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// mthong ba dper gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin// gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong // rgyal po bdang snyoms
190b3(sna tshogs): 'jug cing blon po kun ba ltar// sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji skad pa// de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa deng // rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi
190b4(sna tshogs): 'gro bar// rang gi yul na 'du ba thams cad sdud ba ltar// byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi 'a grolo// sangs rgyas sa'i yon tan gang yin thams
190b5(sna tshogs): cad sdud// gang la bad gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang portan yod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la bsam sbyor ba/ nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shin du 'a
190b6(sna tshogs): byas nas// zil gyis mi nor rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du 'thob// dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i glu ni chag gyur la// mi gang ro 'am zlo 'am shing ni mi 'dzin par// rku dbus 'jigs
190b7(sna tshogs): par 'gyur te ngogasu yin mi 'gyur// gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de ltar dang ldan dang ba thob pa gang zhig ni// shes rab pha rol phyin yum rjesu mi 'jug
190b8(sna tshogs): min// de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs zin na// mchog tu rmad byung ba gshegs byang chub myur du rag/ dbang na la la rdza som padang na skyed ra/ 1ra chung phyir ni myar du
191a1(sna tshogs): // 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yis// 'jigs pa med cing bang bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dad pa
191a2(sna tshogs): gyur kyang // shes rab rnam par nyams shing myur du ma rungs 'gyur// dad pas shes rab de ni yongs zin gyur na// sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos
191a3(sna tshogs): legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas shing tshong par bcas te 'jig par 'gyur// gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na// mi 'jig nor dang bcas
191a4(sna tshogs): par ngog su phyin par 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs sgoms kyang / shes rab meng na byang chub la sa ni myu nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pa rol byin
191a5(sna tshogs): pa mchog ldan na// ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin to// 
191a6(sna tshogs): de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi yis bsten byas nas// 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bad blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung bas// rab tu
191a7(sna tshogs): zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu nyams par gyur// de nyid thabs dang shes rab mchog gis yongs zin na// mi nyams de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems
191a8(sna tshogs): dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ slob ma bzang po bla ma gus ldan de dag gis// bla ma mkhas pa rnams la rtag
191b1(sna tshogs): tu bsten par bya// ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung // de dag shes rab pha rol byin pa rjesu ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la bstan to zhes/ yon pan
191b2(sna tshogs): kun gyi mchog mang nga rgyal ba de skad gsungs// spyir dang tshul khrims bzod cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab bang chub yongasu bsro bar bgyis// bang du
191b3(sna tshogs): phung por zhen nas mchog 'dzin ma byed ces// dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs mtsho sla ba'i zla ba rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung nyon dang ni gnas
191b4(sna tshogs): yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren 'dod pa// gsal bang sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs yin// grags chen ldan rnams pa dka'i go mgyon bang de// phung po
191b5(sna tshogs): khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min// thag gsu mo 'du shes bral zhing yongasu bzung ba min// mi ldog pa/ yo bi mang cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin// de dag
191b6(sna tshogs): de 'dri'i tshes dang ldan zhing spros pa med// the tsom som nyi yid gnyis bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg cing mi
191b7(sna tshogs): ldeg rig par bya// 'dran pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par gyur med pa// de phyir pan mdzad brtser ldan byang chub
191b8(sna tshogs): brnyas nas 'a // sems can tshogs sus shes snam thugs khrul chung bar mdzad// sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul dmas 'dod// 'dzin la gnas
192a1(sna tshogs): shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob pa bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de// des na 'jig rten dag dang rung pa 'thung ba yin// ram kha'i khacwa
192a2(sna tshogs): ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pa mtha' yas// steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod// tha dad gyur pa med cing
192a3(sna tshogs): bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang mi phyin de bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom do shin nyid / chos ku yo 'gra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kyi de bzhin nyid
192a4(sna tshogs): 'di thams cad bye brag med// bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig theb 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab
192a5(sna tshogs): pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa'i shes rab mo ngan thob par 'gyur ma yin// bya zhigo lus tshe dpag chad brgya rtsa lnga bcu par// gyur la 'dab ga shog zang
192a6(sna tshogs): nyam rtsal yod min na// de yis sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'jam gling 'dir// bdag nyid mchongs na deng ni nyam nyes 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga
192a7(sna tshogs): 'di yang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing // smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag brjen kyang // thabs med shes rab bral ba nyan thos
192a8(sna tshogs): nyid du ltung // sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang // 'gro ba kun la'ang sems snyoms pa mi'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid
192b1(sna tshogs): kyis brtul bya zhing // tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa// yon tan rgya mtsho nyon mongs ma mchis rtags
192b2(sna tshogs): brtan gsol// mthu che bdag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan pogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dad 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra// 
192b3(sna tshogs): dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed// mkhas pa dus rnams rtag par ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson// zang zing med
192b4(sna tshogs): par 'gro la chos ni rjesu ston// chos la gcig tu dga' zhing rtag tu tshig 'jam ldan// 'gre 'chag nyul dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shing
192b5(sna tshogs): gang tsam lta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dben zhing ngag/ rlud 'dod ma yin khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa/ 
192b6(sna tshogs): bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan dang mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris meng // khir
192b7(sna tshogs): par gyur na rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags// 'tshe ba'i phyir ni yangs longs spyod tshe la mi bad// drag shul spyod sngags mi byang bud med sbyor sngags min// 'dod pa'i
192b8(sna tshogs): las can po mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed// rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol byin mchog brtson// 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brda// kun
193a1(sna tshogs): mkhyen 'dod cing bstan la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan// mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye bo yul mtha' rnam par spangs// rang gi sa la dogs med rtag tu ri rab
193a2(sna tshogs): 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson// mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin por shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam
193a3(sna tshogs): shes rnams// zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing rab zhi ba// dper na mda' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol ba ltar// shes rab kyis ni brtags na phung po'i gting
193a4(sna tshogs): mi rnyed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar zab gyur cing // theg pa don dam tshogs med gang la phung po dang / khams dang skye mched yod min ches 'di rtogs pa de'i
193a5(sna tshogs): bsod nam so yang dag 'grub pa de las ci zhig yod// / dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni// nyin gcig
193a6(sna tshogs): sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa// de skad bskal par byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye sdong du// dgra bcom
193a7(sna tshogs): rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul khrims srung byed kyang // gang ni gau shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos// brjod pa'i legs pa bzhi dang tshul khrims char mo pod/ byang
193a8(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te// de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur sngon/ dgo de
193b1(sna tshogs): dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med// bsod nams de dang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gso ba dang yam brla dang sring po med shes pa// de ltar bang gshegs rnams kyi shes
193b2(sna tshogs): rab spyad spyod na// spyod ro bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs 'dzin// sangs rgyas kyis bshang rab tu spyod cing rab bstan pa'i// chos 'di thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes
193b3(sna tshogs): bskal ba bya ba khrag khrig mang por brjed byas kyang // chos kyi dbyangs la zad pa med cing 'brel ba med// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol pan ces bya ba gang // res de rnams
193b4(sna tshogs): kyang ming cal tu ni yongasu bsgrags// yongs sngo rlom sa mas med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// 'bru ma
193b5(sna tshogs): sring po 'bar ba 'phrang ba dang po yis// sring po tshig min de med par yang di mi rig/ me lce brang ba thams snying po tshig min la// me lce tha ma med pa'i sring po rig min ldar// 
193b6(sna tshogs): sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la// de med par yang de la reg par nus ma yin// tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi pa thob min la// de med par yang de 'theb nus par
193b7(sna tshogs): yin no// sa par les ni myu gum tog 'bras bu 'thung // de yang 'gags la shing yang med pa de mir ltar// de bzhi ni dang po'i sems kyang bang dub rgyu yin te// nga yong 'ag
193b8(sna tshogs): la byang chub med pade mi yin// rku'i thigs pas bum pa dang po tha ba'i bar// rims kyis chas dus de yongs 'gangs pa ltar// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang bang chub pa
194a1(sna tshogs): rgyu ste// rims kyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'ang chub 'gyur// stong pa mtshan med smon pa red bar chos sbyad cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan par
194a2(sna tshogs): spyod pa// dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa par 'gre tshur 'gro yang // mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin// de ltar spyod pa'i bang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
194a3(sna tshogs): bdag/ stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub reg 'gyur rlom sems med// 'di la ci yang med ces bang rkub bsgrag pa med// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa
194a4(sna tshogs): yin// 'jig rten mgon pa'i lom dang / mu ga nang bcas par// mthong nas skrag pa meng cing de nas go gyon te// phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes
194a5(sna tshogs): nas// yongasu skyo ba'i yid ni rdul tsam skyeng mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing // phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes
194a6(sna tshogs): mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la snying rje 'dug/ bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams// dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan dang
194a7(sna tshogs): ldan zhing // stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas rgyu rtsal cho ga shes// 'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma sgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa'ig/ 
194a8(sna tshogs): pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas pa yongs bsdus nas// dgra byed mang po dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de yis dpa' zhing dri rdul pong skyes bu mang sprul te// bad
194b1(sna tshogs): song zhing phyir sang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin de tshe bang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang // sems can khams rnams kun tu snying rje che bskrad cing // bdud bzhi dag dngas
194b2(sna tshogs): gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// ting 'dzir mchog lo gnas shing byang dub rag mi byed// mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten// de las chen da brten de la 'gro
194b3(sna tshogs): ba brten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste// na mkha' gang la gnas yin don 'di bsam par gyis/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gnas pa// 'gro
194b4(sna tshogs): la sems can shes pa'i smon lam brjen can gyi/ bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma sngon byed cing // mya ngan 'das la mi rig stong par gnas pa med// gang gi tsher bang
194b5(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sa 'di spyod pa/ bar skabs der ni mtshan ma rab tu sgom mi byed // mtshan ma med par
194b6(sna tshogs): gnas shing zhi la rab ni spyong // bar snang 'phur ba'i ba la gnas yod ma yin to// de na gnas pa ma yin sa la lhung mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam
194b7(sna tshogs): thar sgor spyod pa/ mya ngar 'das la mi rag mtshan mar sbyong ma yin/ dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du mang 'phangs te// mnga' gzhan drag ni phyi bzhir brgyud
194b8(sna tshogs): mar long btags nas// snga ma'i mngar des la ldang ba'i skabs mi bad// mi de 'dod na mda' ngas la ltung bar 'gyur// da ltar shes rab pa rol par pa mchog spyod pa// 
195a1(sna tshogs): shes rab thabs sdebs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam spyong pa// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de sing sdong cing dam pa de ni theb mo byed// dpe ra ngag slong
195a2(sna tshogs): 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ nam khar gnas te gcig char cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug pa ston// de ni skyo ba med cing de la dung
195a3(sna tshogs): pa med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol son la gnas pa meng // 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas stan
195a4(sna tshogs): skal pa bye bar skyo ba med cing dub pa med// dper na mi 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing // lag pa gzhi gas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing na mkha' la// 'tshang bar
195a5(sna tshogs): byed cing g.yang sa chen por lus bor na// ltung bar mi 'gyur ji srid der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa sring rjer gnas/ 
195a6(sna tshogs): thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs na yongs bzung ste// chos rnams stong pa mtshan mang smon pa med rtog cing // mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la nges kyang mthong // 
195a7(sna tshogs): dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ongs 'gyur ba// der ni dad dpon 'ba' zhig bde bar 'tsho byed cing // gnyen ba shes
195a8(sna tshogs): tshogs yid mi bder 'jog pa min pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong nyid rin chen gyi// gling du song ste bsam gtan dbang po stobs theb pa// mya ngan 'das
195b1(sna tshogs): la reg pa 'ba' zhig mngon dga' zhing // sems can sdug bsngal yid du 'jog par 'gyur ma yin// dper na don gnyer tshong pa rgyus shes bya ba'i ying / bar gyi grong
195b2(sna tshogs): khyer grong brdal gang yin bde bar 'gro/ der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang mi gnas la// rigs pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas por 'gyur// de bzhin dang
195b3(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' gsal de nyan thos dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi shes pa rnam grol kun la mkhas// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// 'dus pa bsol
195b4(sna tshogs): mi gnas lam gyi tshul shes yin// gang che 'gro la byams pas rje su 'brel byas nas// ting 'dzin stong pa mtsha na med smon pa med spyod pa// de ni mya ngan 'das po thob par
195b5(sna tshogs): 'gyur zhe 'am// 'dus byas yin par gdags nus da ni gnas med do// dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing // doni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus
195b6(sna tshogs): pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyong pa// de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa yin// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dril la// byung
195b7(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i chos// yongasu mi ston phyir mi ldog pas yi chos// mi 'chang da ni lung ma bstan pa yin rig bya// dgra bcom sa dang rkyen gyi
195b8(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam du bang po 'dod cing // sangs rgyas rnams mthong 'gro la chos kyang ston byeng la// da ni mi ldog lung bsngan yid
196a1(sna tshogs): par rig par bya// rmi lamar ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcod smon lam 'dabs/ bden pa'i bya
196a2(sna tshogs): gyi brlabs kyis me yi phung po'o// de ri mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// me yi 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon deng nang mang ba// phan dang snying brdar ldan pa'i
196a3(sna tshogs): bden pa'i byir gyis ni// 'or kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa// nga ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya/ ci sta ni bden pa'i byin brlabs sna
196a4(sna tshogs): tshogs dag/ 'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems 'byung ba 'am// gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis lung bstan rlom// rlom sems gnas
196a5(sna tshogs): ba de ni blo dung shes par bya/ ling gi gzhi las bdud na nye bar 'ongs gyur na// 'di skad smra ste 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes brgyud kyi
196a6(sna tshogs): bar gyi ming yin zhing // gang tshe khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming 'di yin// sbyang sdom rnal 'byor ldan pa ci 'drar 'byung 'gyur la// khyod sngon yod ta ma dul
196a7(sna tshogs): yang 'di 'dra zhes brjod de// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongasu brlang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben pa'i grong
196a8(sna tshogs): grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu bstan byed cing // bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongasu brlang
196b1(sna tshogs): zing blo dung rig par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grong brdal gnas byed cing // sems can srid byed byang chub brtson pa ma gtogs par// de ni dgra bco
196b2(sna tshogs): rang rgyal 'dod pa gzhar mi bskyed// 'di ni bde bar gshegs par sras kyi dben par gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri yaM su la// sbrul gyis
196b3(sna tshogs): gang bar lo yang bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub
196b4(sna tshogs): sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang / stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin thob de la 'di ni dgon dben spyod pa mir skam brdas byed
196b5(sna tshogs): pa/ de ni bdud kyi spyod yul gnas shes rgyal ba sa gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral bang chub
196b6(sna tshogs): mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' drod nyom du ni bdag nyid nyams// de lta bas na byang chub dam pa che
196b7(sna tshogs): ba yi// bsam pa drag ldan mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom ste// nad pa'i tshogs kyis gso phyir sman pa bstan pa ltar// g.yel ba meng par dge pa'i bshes gnyen
196b8(sna tshogs): bsten par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag/ pha rol phyin dang bcas te dge pa'i ba shesu bstan// de dag rdzasu ston bang 'di ni
197a1(sna tshogs): pa yi// rgyun pa gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub myur du rdzogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin
197a2(sna tshogs): 'di yin gzhan ma yin// pha rol phyir 'di byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang snong dang ston mchog yin zhes bshad// ji ltar shes rab pa
197a3(sna tshogs): rol par pa ra na nyid stong // chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid de dang 'drar shes shing // chos rnams stong zhing mtshan ma med par rang shes na/ de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes
197a4(sna tshogs): rab spyod pa yin// sems can yongasu rtog pas zas la 'dod byed cing // 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi ches
197a5(sna tshogs): gnyis yang dag min stong ste// byis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la 'dud pa bor// dper na ngogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug blangs pa// dug pa khong du
197a6(sna tshogs): song ba med kyang brgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gir khas len pa// bdag der 'du shes yang dag min rtog skye zhing 'chi/ ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar
197a7(sna tshogs): kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byang bar gsungs// 'di la gang yang nyon mongs rnam dag 'gyur med par// byang chub sems
197a8(sna tshogs): dpes shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs// 'dzum+bu'i gling na sems can ji skad ma lus pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// lo stong bye ba mang po
197b1(sna tshogs): sbyir bu zir byas la/ kun kyang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngo yang / gang zhig shes rab pa rol phyin la mngor 'artson pa/ tha na bi ma gcig cig rje su mthun pa
197b2(sna tshogs): ngal sbyir ba'i phung pos bsod nams char mi pang // ngo por g.yel med dag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// srang
197b3(sna tshogs): chen po bskyad cing sems cad 'du shes med // de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi spyir gnas 'gyur// rtag tu yul 'khor bsod snyoms don yod yongasu spyong // byang du
197b4(sna tshogs): sems dpa' gang 'dir yun rings 'brel ba yis// lha mi ngan srong gsum gyi sems can dgrol ba'i phyir// lam yangs pha rol sems can khams la dor 'dod
197b5(sna tshogs): pa cir ma ra shes rab pha rol phyin la brjen par ba// ri zhig sngar chang ma rnyed pa yi rin rar mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur dga' ba las/ rAng
197b6(sna tshogs): ma thag tu bag reng gyur te stor na ni// stor bas rir cher mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsnga'o// de ltar bang dub mchog zhugs rin chen lta bu yi// shes rab pha rol par
197b7(sna tshogs): rnal 'bor ngor mi bya// ring par rlung nas blangs te rab tu 'arjor bkris nas/ myur du 'gro bar byeng pa'i bar 'gyur ba bzhin// nyi ma sbyin dang bral ba'i 'ong zang du
197b8(sna tshogs): ca tshur nag thibs po'i mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba// srin bu me khar sreg chags 'thung po thams cad dang // srar ma'i tshogs dang zla 'i 'od
198a1(sna tshogs): gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pa rol phyin// mchog spyod sdong pa dang ni mtshan ma reng spyod pa/ mkhas pas lnga ba'i thabs pa
198a2(sna tshogs): bcom nas 'gro kun dang // dgra bco mo rang rgyal byang chub sems mang zil gyis gnod// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor ster ngon 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur
198a3(sna tshogs): mngon par 'gro bya'os// 'di ni da ltar na yang sems can mang dga' byed// thabs thob gyur nga rgyal srid gnas na smos ci dgos// de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub
198a4(sna tshogs): sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni da ltar na yang sems can meng phan brtson// chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur
198a5(sna tshogs): nas spos ci dgos// de yi tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngan nyams thag sdug bsngal yid bde nyam chung ba// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'od
198a6(sna tshogs): yid nur 'gyur zhes// 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs rnams bsreg cing skar mnga' gtong // gang che mkhas pa de dag bsam pa rab ldan zhing // nyin mtshan shes rab pa
198a7(sna tshogs): rol phyin pa mchog don lnga// de tshe lus sems ngag ni mkha' 'gro'i bye ltar gyur// nag po'i rtsa lag rnams kyis klags rnyed ga la 'gyur// gang tshe bang chub sems
198a8(sna tshogs): dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing // phan tshun mi mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa// de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu thams bder 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i
198b1(sna tshogs): ye shes las ni ring gyur stsa pa// de gnyis ring du gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur// gnyig rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzang dang bral la
198b2(sna tshogs): rub ga la yod// de re bdud rnams pogs dang bcas te dga' bar 'gyur// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// lung bstan theb la samra
198b3(sna tshogs): khris rjod pa rtsom bang na/ tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi sku cig ji snad ba// de srang bskal par gzhi nas go cha 'go dgos so// sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas
198b4(sna tshogs): byang chub reg/ sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing // so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sngo ma byed la// dga' bar mi byed 'di ni sangs rgyas
198b5(sna tshogs): sa 'dir slob// gang zhig slob tshe bslab pa gang ya nga khas mi len/ slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing // bslab dang bslab
198b6(sna tshogs): ma yir 'di gnyis mi rtog pa// de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'ding slob// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lnga'i bslab 'dri shes// de
198b7(sna tshogs): yang bslab nyams tshul khrims 'tshal mi 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas chos brjes bya phyir 'di la slob// de ni bslab la mkhas sde de'i dmigs pa med / 
198b8(sna tshogs): pa 'od byed rnams kyis shes rab de ltar slob// dge ba ma yin sems cig tsam yang bskyod mi bang // ci ba mkha' la 'gro ba'i zer gyis zil gnodan pa'i mang
199a1(sna tshogs): bar snang la ni mun pa mi gnas bzhin// shes rab pha rol phyin la bslang pa bas rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir raM 'dus par 'gyur 'jig
199a2(sna tshogs): tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'du ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par gsungs// dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po gzhan// gang dag
199a3(sna tshogs): ji snyed yod pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'das par gsungs// byung
199a4(sna tshogs): chub sems mkhas nyan thos yon gang dag dang // de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob byed cing // de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed de// 'di ni bdag
199a5(sna tshogs): gis bslab pa yin snyam de phyir slob// mi ldog byang chub mchog lnga rab tu zhugs pa yi// sems pa skyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yid rang ba// stong gsu
199a6(sna tshogs): ri rab srang l-i gzhal bar tshad bzung rung // rje su yi rang dge ba de ni de lta min// dge ba don gnyer phan 'dod sems can ji snyed pa// kun gyi bsod nams phung po la
199a7(sna tshogs): yang yid rang 'gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
199a8(sna tshogs): mi rtog chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs shes pa// de ni shes rab gnyis kyis byang chub tshal mi byed// rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pa
199b1(sna tshogs): rol phyir mchog brtsor// namakha'i khams de dang ni na mkha' der 'gal ba// yod pa ma yin gang gis kyang ni da ma thob// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems
199b2(sna tshogs): dpa' yang // na mkha' lta bu yin te nye bar zhi ba spyong // skye bo'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'ang snyam du/ skye bo 'di mgu bya snyam mi sems nga yang byed/ rdzu 'phrul sde
199b3(sna tshogs): rab tu ston par byed mthong yang // de la lus medo sems mang ming yang yod ma yin// de bzhin shes rang spyod pa nam yang 'di snyam du// byang chub rdegs nas 'gru
199b4(sna tshogs): yongasu dgrol mi sems// skye ba sna tshogs dang ni bya ba mang ldan pa// sgyu ma lta bur ston kyang rnam par mi rtog sbyong // dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas
199b5(sna tshogs): mdzad ba byed// byed pa de la dregs pa cung zad skyong mi 'gyur/ nga'i nin shes rang spyod mkhas byung rkub sems dpa' yang // sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du
199b6(sna tshogs): ba thams cad ston// shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang // 'dra ba'i bzo bos de yang bro ba thams cang byed// de bzhin shes rab sbreng mkhas par rgyu
199b7(sna tshogs): sems dpa' yang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar spyod mkhos rnams lo lnga tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba btung nas phyag kyang
199b8(sna tshogs): bar byed// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji sring pa'ung // yon tan bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba yongasu brjod par mdzad// gang+gA'i klong pa'apa
200a1(sna tshogs): ra sems can ji skad pa// de kun yongs su brtag par bzung sna bdud gyur la// bsdu nyag re las kyang bsring sprul pas kyang // nga dag kun gyis mkhas la
200a2(sna tshogs): chang ba mi rus// rgyu rnam bzhi yis rang rkub sems dpa' mkhas stobs ldan// bdud ba'i thub par dka' zhing bskyod par mi nus te// stong par gnas dang sems can yongs pa
200a3(sna tshogs): gdong dang // ji skad smras bzhir byeng dang bdag shegs bin brlabs can// de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di// 'chang dbang chub sems dpa' rang
200a4(sna tshogs): zhig mos byed cing // bsam pa thag pas bsgrub par mngon bar brjod byed na// nges pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid la zhugs rig pa// chos dbyings nga bzhin nyid la gnas
200a5(sna tshogs): par mi 'gyur zhing // dper na bar snang sprin bzhin gnas pa med par gnas// rig sngags 'chang ba gnas med mkha' rgyu gnas 'dod pa/ sngags mthus
200a6(sna tshogs): dus min me tog ldan zhing byiran gyis rlob// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// rtogs par beng dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur
200a7(sna tshogs): 'chad par byed dang chos 'dod lta bar byed mi dmigs// 'di ni zhi 'dod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin// dgra ba tsam rnam thar de bzhin gshegs kyis ma gtogs pa
200a8(sna tshogs): gnas pa 'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal bcos pa yi// gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi ba ldan pa// ji snyed kur gyi mchog dang gong na rang ba yi 'dab chags mkha' la
200b1(sna tshogs): gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma yin/ 6 raM chu la gnas kyang 'tshubs 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs ngag gi/ pha rol son pa stong
200b2(sna tshogs): gnas mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur// sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog tu 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg dang // chos kyi sbyin pa
200b3(sna tshogs): rab mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang // par mdzad rnams kyi gnas mchog 'di la brjen par gyis// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa// bslab pa ji srod kur gyi
200b4(sna tshogs): mchog dang gong na maung // mkhas pa gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyir 'dir slobs// 'di ni chos gter mchog
200b5(sna tshogs): dang ros mdzod dam pa yin// sangs rgyas rigs yon 'gro ba'i bde dang skyid pa'i mdzad// 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgor po rnams/ 
200b6(sna tshogs): de dag 'di las 'khrungs kyang chos dbyings zad mi 'gyur// shing dang 'bras bu mo tog nags tshal ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad sa las yang dag 'byung zhing 'thar
200b7(sna tshogs): 'on kyang sa la zad pa meng cing pal ba maud/ yongasu mi 'ams rnam par mi rtog skye ba mang // sangs rgyas sras dang nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams dang / 'gro bkur gyi rang
200b8(sna tshogs): sgying chos rnams ji sred pa/ de kun shes rab pha rol phyir ba mchog las byung / shes rab rnams kyang zad pa med cing 'phel ba rang / sems ca
201a1(sna tshogs): dang mchog gyur ji srad ba// de kun ma rig las byung bang bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen rnams tshogasar sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'byung / 
201a2(sna tshogs): ma rig 'khrul 'khor 'di'i zad rang 'phel ba reng // ye shes dul sgo thabs dang rtsa ba ji srid pa// dkur shes rab pha rol phyin pa ma chog las byung / rkyer rnams
201a3(sna tshogs): tshogs nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rag tu 'byung // shes rab pha rol phyin la zang mang 'jal ba meng // byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rngan cing 'bral 'byung
201a4(sna tshogs): la skye med zad pa med par shes rab 'ang / sa te/ nyi ma sbyin rang 'od zer 'phro bas mur 'asal wAr/ ma rig thibs po bcom nas rang 'byung
201a5(sna tshogs): thob par 'gyur// mthu chen ldan pa bsam gang / bzhis kyang gnas bad la// rjed par byed pa ma yin pa/ sa par byed pa medang // 'od kyang bsam gang
201a6(sna tshogs): yan lag bcas pa bzhi po 'di// byang chub dpa pa mchog thob pa yi rdor du 'gyur/ shes rab mchog thob bsam gautan dag la gnas pa ni// gzugs
201a7(sna tshogs): med ting 'dzin dam pa bzhi yang nyam su myong // bsam gangan 'di dag byang chub dab pa marog la par// byang chub sems dpa' zag pa zad phyir slob pa min/ 
201a8(sna tshogs): 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmed byung ste// bsapa gdan ngeng 'dzin le gnas nas mtshan ma med/ de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhog gyur nas/ 
201b1(sna tshogs): bsam pa rdzi bzhi 'ded pa'i khang su yang skya'o// dper na 'jam gling mi zhig sngor chang lnga yul gyi// lnga yi grong khyer mchog tu ma phyir phyis song ste// nga ri yo su
201b2(sna tshogs): bzung ba'i yul de rnams mthong nas// phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyur na chags par mi bang ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog 'chang ba// rnal 'bor
201b3(sna tshogs): brtson te bsam gdan ting 'dzin la gnas nas// par yang 'dod pa'i khamasu gnas te chags pa med // rku yis pad+ma bzhin du byis pa'i ngos mi gnas// bdag nyid tshan
201b4(sna tshogs): po sems can yongs smin pa dang / zhing sbyang pha rol par rdzogs don byed kho nar zad// byang chub yon tan pha rol par nyams 'gyur 'ong zhes// gzugs mang 'am
201b5(sna tshogs): su skye bar dor du gzir po dang // dpar ri mo zhig rin chen gter rnams rjed gyur nas// de la 'dod pa'i blo ni bskrang pa mkhas la/ nges kyang dus ga
201b6(sna tshogs): nig nang ngag yongs blangs shing // blangs ras khyim du song ste chags par mi beng ltar// de bzhin bang tub sem sa dpa' mkhas po dga' ba dang / 'ang sbyin
201b7(sna tshogs): bsam gangan ting 'dzin ni ba bzhi thob nas// bsam gung rabade ldan pasam gangar ting 'dzir thob pa dang ste// 'gro la sring brtser ldan pa'i phyir yang 'dong khams
201b8(sna tshogs): 'jugs gal dbang dub sems dpa'i ngang 'dzir bas ma 'ican gnas// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i tho skyong nas// pams par lo bams tshong tshangs
202a1(sna tshogs): g.yengs gyur pa snga/ sangs rgyas yen 'an yengs nyams ma'am pa gru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra ngang de bzhin dri dang reg pa
202a2(sna tshogs): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la brtson gyur kyang // dgra bcom rang rgyal theb bral bang chub sems dpa' na// dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam bzhag yin par shes par bya// se
202a3(sna tshogs): gang zag gzhan phyir sems dpa' rnam dag pa/ brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la mngon brtson rnam par spyod// dper na brang mo chu rkun dbang med ngo bo'i dbong
202a4(sna tshogs): bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang gis 'gro/ skyo ba bas sam 'on te rtag tu brdeg kyang rung bran mo rdzob la ni 'azlogs tshig mi s+tha yi// 'di yis
202a5(sna tshogs): bdag ni bsad par 'gyur du 'ong snyam nas/ shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs bcas zil gyis gno na/ de bzhin byang chub chang du byang chub mchog zhugs
202a6(sna tshogs): pa 'gro ba kun la brar gyur bzhin du gnas par bya// 'di las byang chub 'thob cing yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur// rtsu dpo shing las me byung bas ni de nyid bsreg
202a7(sna tshogs): bdag gi bang po bdang nas rab med sems kyis// sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson/ bu gcig pa la ma ni rim gro byed pa ltar// bsapa
202a8(sna tshogs): pa zab pas rnam par skyo meng gnas par gyis// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig yun ring 'khor 'dod cing // sems can don dang zhing sbyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ 
202b1(sna tshogs): skye ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur na// de ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ldan g.yal ba mang / byang chub sems dpa' mi mkhas skal pa de bgrang // gal te ring
202b2(sna tshogs): bar du shes sdug bsngal bang chub sgrub/ yang dag chos sgrub bang tshe yuni rang sdug bsngal 'gyur// des ni brtson 'grus pa rol pin nyams la lo can// byang chub
202b3(sna tshogs): mchog tu sems bskyed dang po nas bzung ste/ byang chubo bla na med pa thob par gyur gyi bar// nyin mtshan gcig tsam du ni yid lo sems byung na// mkhas pa gsal ba
202b4(sna tshogs): brtson 'grus brtsams par rig par bya// g.yo te 'ga' zhig 'di skad ri rab rib shig pa'i// rjes la byang dub mo chog thob 'gyur zhes smra ba las// ci sde sro
202b5(sna tshogs): ba'i blo skyang tshad kyang sems byed na// de chu bang chub sems dpa' le lor gyur pa yin/ ci ste de ni 'di tsam tsheng lnga ci dga' zhes// skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar
202b6(sna tshogs): brlags sems bskyed // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas brtson 'gres brtsams pa ste// ring por mo thogs 'dren pa'i bang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ 'grub
202b7(sna tshogs): yongasu smin par byas nas don pa zhes// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byung na// bdag tu 'du shes gnas pas lo lor gyur pa ste// thams cad mkhar
202b8(sna tshogs): pa nyid la ring 'gyur gnams bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes rnam par log nas gnyi su med chos spyod/ 'di ni byang chuba'i bar
203a1(sna tshogs): nyams mchog 'dod pa'i// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs// gal te gzhan las ngar brjod tshig nub thos gyur/ 
203a2(sna tshogs): bdag bde yin zhes byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dga'// su smra sus thos gang gis gang zhig gang gi phyir// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa 'dzangs pa yin
203a3(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig slong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal
203a4(sna tshogs): phul byas la// sbyin pa'i phung pos de la bsod nams char mi phod// bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongasu dag 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang mthu stobs
203a5(sna tshogs): pha mtha' yas// sems can rnams la chos rab stong pa sgrogs par byed// 'di na bzod ldan de la 'gro ba dgar 'gyur mkhas// gal te sems
203a6(sna tshogs): can la las tsan dan phur ma blangs// rab gus byang chub sems dpa' la ni nyug byed la// gzhan zhig me mngag mgo la 'thor byed gnyi ka la// de yis mnyar
203a7(sna tshogs): zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni bskyed par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas// sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngos na// dpa'
203a8(sna tshogs): bo 'jig rten kun la bzod pas dgra bcom dang // rang rgyal sems can khams kyi ji snyed zil gyis gnon// bzod bod 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyed pa ste// sems
203b1(sna tshogs): dumal dud 'gro ga shin rje'i 'jig rjen sdug bsngal yang // 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis dbang meng ba nod myong na// byang chub ched du ci phyir nga bzong mi bya swa pa/ ldag dab
203b2(sna tshogs): mngon rang bsang dang bcing dang brdeg pa dang // mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang log sna gcod dang // 'jig rjer sdug bsngal ji sbeng bdag gis bzod sam pa
203b3(sna tshogs): bang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol yin la gnas// tshul khrims kyis ni zhi ba 'dod rnams 'phags par 'gyur/ spobs bca'o spong yul gnas
203b4(sna tshogs): la khrims nyams pa rang / sdor pa'i ba ba ji sna dkun gyi rjesu 'jug/ sems can kun la par phyir de yang bang chab bste// gal dang rgyal pa
203b5(sna tshogs): bcom bang chub rag 'dod ra// tshul khrims 'am lazhing mi mkhas de bzhin spyong pa nyams/ ci snga byang chuba'i bo ra ga tu yongs bsngo na/ 'dod
203b6(sna tshogs): yon brjor yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas chos gang nges pa'i bang chub yon ngan 'byung 'gyur bo// de ni yon par chos ldan rnams kyi rdul khrims pa
203b7(sna tshogs): ngos gang par byeng rnams kyi bang chub yongs 'ams pa// 'di ri rul khrims 'chal ces rnam par 'dran pas gsungs gal tu 'ang rang sems dpa'
203b8(sna tshogs): 'dod yor lnga spyod kyang / sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun srabs song sde/ sangs rgyas 'grub pa snyam pa pa 'ar yang bang @
204a1(sna tshogs): tshul khrims pha rol phyir gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal pa bye brar dge ba'i las las bcu// spyod kyang rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'angang bskyang/ 
204a2(sna tshogs): de re tshul khrims skyor byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyed de ni pos pham pas kyang shin tu lce// tshul khrims srung zhing bang chub mchog tu yongs
204a3(sna tshogs): bsngo la// de yis rlom sems med cing bdag bstod mi bang la// nga yi 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongasu spangs// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pha rol phyin
204a4(sna tshogs): gnas brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di dag khri mas ldan 'di dag khrims 'tshal ces// sna tshogs
204a5(sna tshogs): 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'chal// tshul khrims nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrim sa med// gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can
204a6(sna tshogs): med// 'du shes 'dod chags bral lnga sdom min ga la yod// gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom sems med// 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam par 'dren pas
204a7(sna tshogs): gsungs// sems can dag pa gang zhig de ltar khrims ldan pa// sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin/ mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems
204a8(sna tshogs): kyang med// bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma brlang shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gtong la zhum pa'i
204b1(sna tshogs): sems med na/ nga che phyi rol dngos po gdong ba smos ci dgos// gal te sar sna byed pa nga ni gnas med do// bdag tu 'du shes dngos la bdag gir 'dzin pas
204b2(sna tshogs): dwags// blun po rnams la gdong ba'i blo lta ga la yod// sar sna can ni yi gas gnasu skye bar 'gyur// ci sde mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur// 
204b3(sna tshogs): nga che bang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul shes nas// gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gdong / gling po ni legs par brgyan pa mchil
204b4(sna tshogs): pa'i thal ba 'dra/ bin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de lta min/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyi// sems can ji skad
204b5(sna tshogs): de dag kun la sbyin pa'ong / byin par gyu ra cig sum du sems nas sbyin gyur la// de rang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ sbyin pa
204b6(sna tshogs): bir ras dngos la gnas par byed pa meng // de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba phreng / de ltar gdong ba mkhas pa thams cang gtong ba snga chu ngu bang
204b7(sna tshogs): la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur// srid pa gsum na sems can ma lus ji srid pa// yongasu brtag pa bzung sde de dag thams cad kyis// 'jug
204b8(sna tshogs): rder mkhan pa sangs rgyas ngagra bcom rang rgyal la/ skal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos lags tshol na// bang chub sems dpa' bakhas pa thabs ra
205a1(sna tshogs): gang zhig gis// de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la yi rang nas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na/ yongasu bsngo bas 'dre/ 
205a2(sna tshogs): ba thams cad zil gyis gnon// nor bu 'ching bu'i phung por gyur pa yang // rin chen bai DUR+Ya gcig de kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun// rAsu
205a3(sna tshogs): yi rung byang chub sems dang su zil gyis gnon// gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byin nas// de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po 'phangs med na// de las dge ba'i ru
205a4(sna tshogs): rgya chen 'phel 'gyur te// sprin rang 'od ldan zla dkyil yang gyi ngo bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pas yi drags 'gro ba gcod// dbul ba dang ni de bzhin ngon
205a5(sna tshogs): mongs thams cad gcod// spyod ra longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur// sbyin pas sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can yongs smin byed// khrims kyis dud 'gror
205a6(sna tshogs): 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo dang // mi khom brgyad spong de yis dal ba rtag tu rnyed// bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te// gser mdog sdug cing 'gro bas
205a7(sna tshogs): blta ba'i 'os 'gyur// brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur// ye shes mtha' yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis
205a8(sna tshogs): ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smang ba 'dor// rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas// khams gsum pa
205b1(sna tshogs): lus pa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur// mi yi khyu mchog 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas nas// sdug bsngal zad par ba phyir 'gro la chos kyang sten// chos 'di yongs rdzogs
205b2(sna tshogs): bas nas byang chub sems dpa' de// yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongasu 'dzin// sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongasu 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang
205b3(sna tshogs): chos kun yongasu 'dzin// 'gro ba'i nang bso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog gyur pas// shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam ldan 'di gsungs te/ ming ni yon tan rin chen sdud pa
205b4(sna tshogs): byang chub lam// lam 'di sems can kun gyis thob par bya par bshang // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdud pa tshigasu bcad pa rdzog s+ho// 
205b5(sna tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra ts+tshe di ka rA pa pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa
205b6(sna tshogs): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
205b7(sna tshogs): mngon du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol mtshon me zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab mo// dge slong stong cis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
205b8(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang ches gos bgos
206a1(sna tshogs): bzang bsnams nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nga nas bcom ldan 'das pas cad kyi grong chu na
206a2(sna tshogs): snyoms kyi phyir gshegs ras bsod snyoms kyi zhal zas mjug tu gsol te/ nal zas kyi bya ba mdzang / lhung bzang dang chos gas par gnas 'bas bsil
206a3(sna tshogs): gang ba shoms pa la dkyil me dkrungs bcas nas sku drang po'i bsrang ste/ dran pa mngor du banog nas bzhu gso// de ras dge slong dang po bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong snga
206a4(sna tshogs): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bos pag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // yang nga'i tshe tshe dang ldan
206a5(sna tshogs): pa rab 'byor 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor sngar la sa langs te/ bla gos drag pa gcig tu bzar nas
206a6(sna tshogs): pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal po sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
206a7(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phar gdags pa'i dang
206a8(sna tshogs): pa ji snyed pas phan btags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
206b1(sna tshogs): yongs su gtad pa'i dam pa ji snyed pas yongs gtang pa'i bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so// bang bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lag so// bcom ldan 'das
206b2(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ji ltar sems rab tu bzung bar 'gyi de skad
206b3(sna tshogs): sa gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal // rab 'bor legaso lagaso// rab 'byer ring ba'i ro/ 
206b4(sna tshogs): ngang bzhin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas bang rkub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la par ga dgas pa'i dam pas par bdags nga bar
206b5(sna tshogs): pas 'ang chub sems dpa' sems dpa rin po rnams la yongasu gdang pa'i dam pas yongs su ga dang ngo / rab 'byor nga'i pir nyon lags par rab
206b6(sna tshogs): yid la zung shig dang dang chub sems dpa'i thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar gnas par byang dang ji ldir bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar
206b7(sna tshogs): sams rab tu bzung bar ba bangs med la bshang ngo // bcom ldan 'das nga ba'i ra ro zhes gsol nas/ ro dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyar pa
206b8(sna tshogs): ma par 'das kyis 'ang srad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'khor 'di la bang chub sems dpa'i thes pa la yang dag par 'bros pas 'di sam pa bdag gis kyi
207a1(sna tshogs): sems can bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa 'ar/ mngal ras skyes pa 'am drang ba shing las sbas pa 'am/ brdzus basmras pa 'a
207a2(sna tshogs): bzugs can ra gzugs med pa 'ar/ 'du shes car ram/ 'du shes med pa'am 'du shes meng 'du shes mong min dang / sems can gyi khams
207a3(sna tshogs): ji tsam sems can du gdags pas ba gas pa de dag thams cad phung po lhag pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o// de ltar
207a4(sna tshogs): sems can tshad mang po yongasu mya ngan la sa bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongasu ngan las bzlos par gyur pa ring skal du sa pas bskyang ba
207a5(sna tshogs): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems ca 'du shes 'jug na/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes dri ba ba'i phyir
207a6(sna tshogs): de ci'i phyir na na/ rab 'bor gang sems can du 'du shes 'jug 'am/ srog tu 'du shes 'jug 'am/ gang zag tu 'du shes 'jug na de byang chub
207a7(sna tshogs): sems dpa' zhes mi bya ba'i phyir ro// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas dngos po la mi gnas par sbyin pa spyir ro// chos gang la yang mi gnas par
207a8(sna tshogs): sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs la'ang mi gnas par sbyin po spyon par bya'o// sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos la'ang mi gnas par spyir ba sbyin no// rab 'byor
207b1(sna tshogs): ci nas mtshan marang 'du shes pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ltar byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa spyir no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo ru byang chub sems dpa' gang mi
207b2(sna tshogs): gnas par sbyin pa sbyin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ rab 'bor tshang gzung bar sra ba pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
207b3(sna tshogs): phyogs kyi namakha'i tshang gzung bar sla 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
207b4(sna tshogs): pa me dang rub dang / bang dang sdang dang 'og gi pogasau dang / phyogs mtshams dang phyogs bcu'i ra mkha'i tshang bzung sra 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
207b5(sna tshogs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa pa lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
207b6(sna tshogs): gang mi gnas pa'i srid pa sprin pa de 'i bsod rnams kyi phung po yang dang bzung bar sra ba ma yin re//  ba 'bar 'di ji sdom du sems/ r-i tA phun sum rdzogs
207b7(sna tshogs): pas nga bzhin gshegs par blta 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags da / mapar pur sum rigs pas de bzhin shegs par
207b8(sna tshogs): mi lnga'o// de ci'i slad du na de bzhin ga/ las pas mthan phun sum tshogs par gang gsungs pa del par sum tshogs pa ra mchis pa'i srang du'o// de skad
209a1(sna tshogs): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ la tan phun sum
209a2(sna tshogs): tshogs pa de tsam du brdzud ro// ji tsam du matran phun sum tshogs pa med pa de tsam du mi brdzun te/ da ltar nga bzhin gshegs pa lo mtshan dam pa per blta'o// de skad ces
209a3(sna tshogs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya za la la ma pa'i ros rab
209a4(sna tshogs): tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na sems can gang la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes bskrad par 'gyur ba lta mchis
209a5(sna tshogs): sam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor khong 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba
209a6(sna tshogs): sems can gang la la ngag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam zhes ma zer cig/ yang rab 'bor
209a7(sna tshogs): ma 'ongs par dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa
209a8(sna tshogs): shes rab dang ldan pa dag 'byung ste/ rab 'bor bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag kyang sangs rgyas gcig la bslan bkur byas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig la
209b1(sna tshogs): bsrer bkur bas pa la yin/ sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur bas shing / sangs rgyas brgya sdong du
209b2(sna tshogs): ma la dge bo'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'byung ngo // rab 'bor gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i rig ba shad pa 'di la sems dang po gcig
209b3(sna tshogs): tsam rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag ni rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// rab 'bor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs da rab 'byor sems can de dag thams
209b4(sna tshogs): sang ni bsad rams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bsrung cing rab tu sdug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' seras dpa' chen po dang
209b5(sna tshogs): ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing // sems can du 'du shes pa ma yir srog tu 'du shes pa ma yin te/ gang zag tu'ang 'du shes 'jug pa
209b6(sna tshogs): mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'bor bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag cho su 'du shes pa dang / chos med par yang 'du shes mi 'jog ste/ de dag ri dang
209b7(sna tshogs): shes dang / 'du shes med par yang 'jug par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ rab 'byir gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngag ngosu 'du shes 'jug
209b8(sna tshogs): rade nyid nga ngag gi bdag tu 'dzin bar 'gyur zhing / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gal te chos med par
210a1(sna tshogs): 'jug na yang de nyid de dag gi bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyung zhing / sems par du 'dzin pa dang / sreg tu 'dzin pad gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur
210a2(sna tshogs): ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir 'ar/ yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chos kyang log par gzung bar mi bsnga chos pa yin pa yang mi gzung ba'i phyir re/ 
210a3(sna tshogs): bas na de las dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs gzings lta bur shes pa rnams kyis chos rnams kyang spang bar ba na/ ces ma yin pa rnams lnga
210a4(sna tshogs): smos zhes gsungaso// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
210a5(sna tshogs): bzhin gshegs pas gang bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang yong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs
210a6(sna tshogs): pas chos gang yang bston tam/ de skad ces bka' sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
210a7(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'di bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
210a8(sna tshogs): par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchi so// de bzhin gshegs pas gang bstan pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
210b1(sna tshogs): chom kyang yang 'angon par rdzogs pa sasangs rgyas pa 'am bstan pa der gzung du ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis te/ don kyang ma lags ma pa
210b2(sna tshogs): lags pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni 'dus pa bgyis kyis rab tu bye ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
210b3(sna tshogs): 'ber 'di rje sam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis reg ga
210b4(sna tshogs): bar bas de sbyin pa ban na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bsrang ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ya
210b5(sna tshogs): bang por gshegs pa mang lpags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi nga lus bsad nams kyi phung po mang du bskye // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'a
210b6(sna tshogs): bsod rnams kyi phung po de zhing phung po ma mchi sa po'i slad du s+t+waM/ des rang bzhir gshegs pas pra song nams kyi phung po bsod nams kyi phung ba 'as
210b7(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna badrar gyis
210b8(sna tshogs): rab tu gang ba bas te sbyin pa zin pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha ra tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs bcad pa gcig tsam gzung nas gzhan dag la yang 'a 'i seng ya
211a1(sna tshogs): 'chang cing yang dag par rab tu stor na/ de gzhi de las bsod rams kyi phung po ches rang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bar nga ba'i
211a2(sna tshogs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub ni 'di las byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom lngar 'das
211a3(sna tshogs): rnams kyang 'di las skyes pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyis chos de dag med par de ba'i
211a4(sna tshogs): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sem sa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun
211a5(sna tshogs): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ci la'ang
211a6(sna tshogs): zhugs pa ma mchis par slad du ste/ des na rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// gzugs la'ang ma zhugs/ sgra la ma lags/ dril ma lags/ ro la ma lags/ reg pa la ma
211a7(sna tshogs): lags/ chos la'ang ma zhugs te/ ngas na rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa de 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
211a8(sna tshogs): thob po snyam du sems par gyur na/ de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lag so// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur
211b1(sna tshogs): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'di snyam du bdag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po snyam du
211b2(sna tshogs): sems sar/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba nyid du zhugs pa'i chos de gang yang pa la chis
211b3(sna tshogs): pa'i slad du ste des na lan cig par 'ong ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'di snyam du bdag gis pir
211b4(sna tshogs): mi 'anga'i'i 'bras bu thob po snyam du seras sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma log so// de ci'i slad du zher/ gang par mi 'ong ba nyid du zhugs pa'i
211b5(sna tshogs): ches de dang sang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ nges ra phyir ro/ 'ong ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
211b6(sna tshogs): dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob po snyar du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// de ci'i
211b7(sna tshogs): sdang dugang dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du bdag gis ngag bco
211b8(sna tshogs): med thob pa ska du sems par 'gyur na/ de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang
212a1(sna tshogs): par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ri de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nyen mongs pa rang ga
