212a2(sna tshogs): pa rnams kyi ma chog tu bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod chags dang bral ba dgra bcom pa lags kyang / bcom ldan rangs bdag 'di snyam du bdag ni dgra bco
212a3(sna tshogs): pa'o snyam du mi sems lag so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob po snyam du sems par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas
212a4(sna tshogs): bdag la rigs kyi bu rab 'bor ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog yin te/ ci la'ang mi rnams pas na 'o/ mongs pa meng par gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa
212a5(sna tshogs): med par gnas pa zhes lung mi bston lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas de bdir
212a6(sna tshogs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las gang blangs pa'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
212a7(sna tshogs): ldan 'das nga ni ma lags te/ nga bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las gang blangs pa'i
212a8(sna tshogs): chos de gang yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis zhing bkod pa rnams bskub
212b1(sna tshogs): par bya'o zhes zer na/ de ni ma bden par smra ba'o// de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhing bkod pa rnams zhing bkod pa rnams shes bya ba ni bkod pa de dag med par nga bzhin ga
212b2(sna tshogs): pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na zhing bkod pa rnams zhes pa'o// rab 'bor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar mi gnas par sems
212b3(sna tshogs): bskyed par bya'o// ci la'ang mi gnas par sems bskyed par ba'o// gzugs la'ang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang rag bya dang / ches
212b4(sna tshogs): la'ang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// raba'o byor 'di lta sde dper na/ skyes bu zhig lus 'di lto bur gyur te/ 'di lta ste ri'i rgyal po par
212b5(sna tshogs): du gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ lus de che ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lda na'adas lus de che ba lagaso// bde bar gabye
212b6(sna tshogs): pa lus pa che lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas de dngos po ma mings par gsungs pa'i slang du ste/ des na lus zhes bgyi'o// de rengs pa pa
212b7(sna tshogs): mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des na lus re zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor 'di ji snyam du sems/ badz+ra
212b8(sna tshogs): klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa gad+hI'i klung yang de skad khor nar gyur na/ de dag gi bye ba gang yin pa dngag mang ba yin nam/ rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ la na 'das pa
213a1(sna tshogs): de dag nyid kyang mang lags na de dag gi bye ma lnga spos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor khong nges pa
213a2(sna tshogs): du chud par bya'o// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skyes pa 'am bud meng gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna 'dun gyis rab tu gang bar byas
213a3(sna tshogs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes pa 'am bung med da gi zhi de las bsad
213a4(sna tshogs): nams mang du bskyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ ba com ldan 'das mang lagaso// bang bar gshegs pa mang lags te/ skyes pa 'am bud med de gzhi nga las bsod
213a5(sna tshogs): nams mang du bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams de sbed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas pa
213a6(sna tshogs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs
213a7(sna tshogs): bcad pa tsam gzung nas/ gzhan dag la yang bshad de yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ de nyid de'i gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu mad pa
213a8(sna tshogs): bsgya // yang rab 'byor sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad ba tsam 'don tam/ bton pa'i sa phyogs de lnga dang mi dang lnga
213b1(sna tshogs): ma yid du bcas pa'i 'jig rjeran gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na/ su zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bang pa dang / dul
213b2(sna tshogs): bzhin du yid la byed pa de ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par gyur pa lta ci smos/ sa phyogs de na ston pa yang bzhugs te/ bla ma'i gnas gzhan dag kyang gnaso// de skad ces bka' stsal
213b3(sna tshogs): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar bzung bar bgyi
213b4(sna tshogs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di shes rab
213b5(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa ste/ 'di de ltar zung shi ga/ de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gsungs pa
213b6(sna tshogs): de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir te/ des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa'i
213b7(sna tshogs): des de gang yang yod dang/ rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa'i chos de dag gang yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das
213b8(sna tshogs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rjer gyi khams ra sa'i rdul phra rab ji snyed yang ba deraper ra
214a1(sna tshogs): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i rdul de mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so// de ci'i slad du zhwar bcom ldan 'das sa'i rdul
214a2(sna tshogs): lags pa de rdul ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ nges na sa'i rdul ces bgyi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gang lags pa khams pa mchis
214a3(sna tshogs): bar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des na 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyal du sems/ sras bu
214a4(sna tshogs): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu lha 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
214a5(sna tshogs): de ni ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsung sa pa dedag mtshan ma mchis par de bzhin ga
214a6(sna tshogs): pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis shes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ yang rab 'bor skyes pa 'am
214a7(sna tshogs): bud med gang gis lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongasu btang ba bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa tsam bzung ste/ gzhan dag la
214a8(sna tshogs): yang bstan na/ de gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma phyung ste/ nges
214b1(sna tshogs): mchim phyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das de mtshar lags// bde ba
214b2(sna tshogs): gshegs pa ngo mdang lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ye shes skyes tshun chad bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon nam yang ma thos so// bcom ldan 'das mang bshad pa
214b3(sna tshogs): 'di la gang dag yang dag par 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
214b4(sna tshogs): 'du shes pa gang lags pa de nyid 'du shes ma mchis pa'i sla ste/ de bas na yang dag par 'du shes yang dag par 'a du shes shes de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs// / 
214b5(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshang ba la rtog cing mos pa'i bdag la mos pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma lasen
214b6(sna tshogs): gang rab chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de dag ni ngo mtshar rangab dang ldan par 'gyur lag so// yang bcom ldan 'das de dag
214b7(sna tshogs): bdag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur/ sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur lagaso// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bac+doMs bdag
214b8(sna tshogs): 'ang shes pa dang sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa gang legs pa de dag nyid 'du shes ma mchis pa'i srad
215a1(sna tshogs): / zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// nga skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
215a2(sna tshogs): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// deng bzhin te/ mdo 'di bshad pa 'di la gang dag mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag
215a3(sna tshogs): ni rol ra rab dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir 'an/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma pa gang dag
215a4(sna tshogs): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ ngas dpag tu med pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'i phyir te/ nges na pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa zhes bya'o// yang
215a5(sna tshogs): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de nyid pha rol/ tu phyin pa medo// de ci'i pir zhe ni/ rab 'bor gang gi tshe ka ling ki'i rgyal pos nga'i yan
215a6(sna tshogs): lag dang nying lag rnam par bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe nga la bdag tu 'du shes sam/ sems can du 'du shes sam/ srog tu 'du shes sam/ gang zag tu 'du shes kyang ma byung
215a7(sna tshogs): nga la 'du shes ci yang meng la/ 'du shes med par gyur pa yang ma yin pa'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir na ni/ rab 'byor gal te de'i che bdag tu 'du shes byung na ri bo che gnong sems kyi 'a
215a8(sna tshogs): shes kyang 'byung la/ sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa byung na/ de'i tshe gnod sems kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung ba'i phyi// 
215b1(sna tshogs): rab 'byor ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus dang ma rabs lnga brgyar bzod par smra ba zhes bya ba'i drang srong du grus na yang / ngal bdag tu 'du shes ma byung / sems can du 'du
215b2(sna tshogs): pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa ma byung ngo // rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs te bla
215b3(sna tshogs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// gzugs la mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang rag pa dang / chos la'ang mi garas
215b4(sna tshogs): par sems bskyed par bya'o// chos med pa la 'ang mi gnas par semos bskyed par bya'o// ci la'ang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i per zhe na/ gnas pa gang yin pa de
215b5(sna tshogs): nyid mi gnas pa'i pir te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ska du byang chub sems dpas mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsung so// yang rab 'bor byang chub seMd/ 
215b6(sna tshogs): 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi par sbyin pa yongasu btang bar bya'o// sems can du 'du shes pa gang yin pa de nyid kyang 'du shes med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ser
215b7(sna tshogs): thams cad ces gang gsungs pa de dag nyid kyang med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsung ba bden pa gsung ba de bzhin nyid du gsung
215b8(sna tshogs): ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i phyi ro// yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ bstan pa la
216a1(sna tshogs): bden pa yang meng / brdzun pa yang mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig dang ldan pa'i mi ning mun par zhugs na ci yang mi mthong ba bzhin du gang dngas pa
216a2(sna tshogs): bas sbyin pa yongs gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpar blta'o// rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper na nam langs te nyi ma shar nas mig dang ldan pa'i mis gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag
216a3(sna tshogs): mthong ba de bzhin du gang dngos por ma lhung bas sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpar lta'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sa chos kyi rnam grangs
216a4(sna tshogs): 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
216a5(sna tshogs): mkhyen/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// yang rab 'byor skyes
216a6(sna tshogs): skyes pa 'am bud meng gang zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus yongasu gtong la/ phyed kyi dus dang / byi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang lus gang+gA'i klung gi bla ma sring
216a7(sna tshogs): yongasu gtong ste/ rnam grangs 'di lta bur skal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lus yongasu gtong ba bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi spong ra/ 
216a8(sna tshogs): nyid gni de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed na/ gang gis yi ger bris nas len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par 'ang
216b1(sna tshogs): pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rag sben pa lnga ci smos yang rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khab cing mtshungs pa med ngo // ches
216b2(sna tshogs): kyi rnam grangs 'di ni theg pa mchog la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / theg pa phul du phyin pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams
216b3(sna tshogs): kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsung so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bang pa dang / gzhar dag
216b4(sna tshogs): la yang rgya cher yang dag par rag tu ston pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can de dag thams cad
216b5(sna tshogs): ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ring pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po ba sam gyis mi khab pa dang / mtshungs pa meng ba dang / gzhal
216b6(sna tshogs): du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad nga'i byang chub phrag pa la thogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i pir ni na/ rab 'bor dam
216b7(sna tshogs): bral mos parnalas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan bar mi nus te/ bdag tu lnga ba rnams kyis ma yin/ sems can du lnga ba rnams kyis mi yin/ srog tu lnga ba rnam
216b8(sna tshogs): kyis ma yin zhing / gang zag tu lta ba rnams kyis macan pa dang / blang ba dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / kun rdzob par mi nus te/ de de gnas meng pa'i phyi ra
217a1(sna tshogs): yang rab 'byor sa phyogs gang na mdo sde 'di ston pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mched par sa par 'phru
217a2(sna tshogs): sa phyogs de phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / bskor ba bya bar nges par yang 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de ni mchod rten lnga bur 'gyuraro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
217a3(sna tshogs): mo gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig 'di dag len pa dang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ni mnar bar 'gyur/ shin tu ma nar bar 'gyur/ 
217a4(sna tshogs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can de ngag gis tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge pa'i las ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba gang dge byas pa dag ci 'dri nyid la man
217a5(sna tshogs): tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba'i las de dag byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ngos mngon par shes te/ 'das
217a6(sna tshogs): pa'i dus skal pa grangs med pa'i yang chos grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi pha rol gyi yang
217a7(sna tshogs): ches pha rol na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum pag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang dag byung ba ngas mnyes par byas te/ mnyes par byas nas thugs ma phyung bar byas te/ rab
217a8(sna tshogs): 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ngas mnyes par byas nas thugs byung bar ma byas pa gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa ni/ mdo sde 'di lan
217b1(sna tshogs): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa gang yin pa las/ rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phung po 'di las bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char mi
217b2(sna tshogs): po stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang zla dang rgyar mo bzod do// rab 'bor gal te de'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
217b3(sna tshogs): mo dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ngas brjod na/ sems can rnams myo myo
217b4(sna tshogs): por 'gyur te/ sems 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// yang rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab
217b5(sna tshogs): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i
217b6(sna tshogs): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rag tu gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
217b7(sna tshogs): stsal pa/ rab 'bor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
217b8(sna tshogs): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o// de ltar sems can rnams yongs mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yang yongs ma ngan las bzlas
218a1(sna tshogs): par 'gyur ba yang sngam du sems bskyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyi zhan/ rab 'byor gal te bang dub sems dpa' sems can du
218a2(sna tshogs): sems dpa' zhes mi ba la/ gang zag gi bar du 'du shes 'jug na yang de bang dub sems dpa' zhes mi ba ba'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir nan/ rab 'byor gang bang chub sems
218a3(sna tshogs): dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos dgang yang meng po'i pir ro// rab 'byor 'ad rje sa ma du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas ngo ba'i rnye ga sa
218a4(sna tshogs): bamar me mdzad las gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang yod snyam 'am/ de skad ces bka'
218a5(sna tshogs): stsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mang sde mdzad
218a6(sna tshogs): las gang bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de yang ma mchi so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
218a7(sna tshogs): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la'ang skad ces bka' stsol to// rab 'byor nga de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de'izhin gshegs pa mangs mdzad las gang bla na ma
218a8(sna tshogs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang med do// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gang mngon par rdzogs
218b1(sna tshogs): par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa par ma mdzad kyis ngal bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus rang bzhin gshegs pa dag
218b2(sna tshogs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung mi ston pa zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag
218b3(sna tshogs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang med pas nga'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mar re mdzad kyis nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs
218b4(sna tshogs): pa'i dus na nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin
218b5(sna tshogs): pazhes pa pa ni yang dag pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dwags yin pa'i phyi ro// rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
218b6(sna tshogs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso zhes zer na/ de log par smra ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
218b7(sna tshogs): nga bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang med pa'i phyi ro/ rab 'byor nga ba'i
218b8(sna tshogs): gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la bden pa yang mang / brdzun pa yang med de/ de bas na de bzhir gshegs pa ches thams cad sangs rgya
219a1(sna tshogs): kyi chos so nas gsung ngo // rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni de dag thams cad chos med pa yin/ de bas 'ches thams cadas rgya
219a2(sna tshogs): kyi chos shes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpar na mi zhig lus dang ldan zhing lus chen por gyur pa bzhin ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
219a3(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mi zhig lus dang ldan zhing lus chen po zhes gang gsungs pa/ deng bzhin gshegs pas lus ma mchis par
219a4(sna tshogs): gsungs te/ des na lus dang ldan zhing lus chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
219a5(sna tshogs): gang 'di skad du bdag gis sems can rnams yongs mya ngan las bzla'o zhes zer na/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
219a6(sna tshogs): gang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
219a7(sna tshogs): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa'o zhes gsung // rab 'byor bang chub sems
219a8(sna tshogs): dpa' gang zhig 'di skad du bdag gis zhing bkod pa rnams bsgrub pa zhes zer na/ de yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhing bkod pa rnams
219b1(sna tshogs): zhes bya ba ni da dag bkod pa rang par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ nges na zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'ber bang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
219b2(sna tshogs): chos rnams ri bdag med pa'o// chos rnams ni bdag med pa'o zhes mos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bang
219b3(sna tshogs): rkub sems dpa' bang rkub sems dpa'o zhes brjod do// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shi'i spyan mnga' 'am/ rab 'bor gyis gsol pa
219b4(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das de de lta legs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sha'i spyan mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'ong ji snyam du sems
219b5(sna tshogs): nga bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i sbyar mnga' 'am/ rab 'bo ra gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i spyan menga'o// 
219b6(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ rab 'bor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi spyan yangar 'am/ rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ 
219b7(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das deng lta lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi spyan mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji
219b8(sna tshogs): ma du sems nga bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi spyan mnga' 'am/ rab 'bor gyis gsal pa/ bcopa lngan 'das dang lnga gas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
220a1(sna tshogs): ras kyi spyan mang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ sul la/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems nga bzhin gas pa la rgyas
220a2(sna tshogs): rab rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das dang lnga lags te/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi sbyar mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'aka' stsal pa
220a3(sna tshogs): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma ji skad pa/ gang+gA'i klung yang de skad du gyur la/ de dag gi bye mi ji snyed pa de skad kyi 'jig rdar gyi khamasu gyur na
220a4(sna tshogs): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ci mang ba yin nar/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang lta lags te 'jig rten gyi khams de ngag mang ba lags// bco
220a5(sna tshogs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'a jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji skad yod pa de dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems kyi rgyun ngas dag
220a6(sna tshogs): sheso/ de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud ces bya ba ni de rgyun med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir// des na sems kyi rgyun ces bya'o// deco
220a7(sna tshogs): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i sems kyang dmig suM med/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmig su med/ dra lngar byung ba'i sems kyang dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// 
220a8(sna tshogs): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu gang bar bas te sbyin pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
220b1(sna tshogs): rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so// bcom ldan
220b2(sna tshogs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor nga de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyeng ngo // rab 'byor
220b3(sna tshogs): gal de bsod nams kyi phung po bsring rnams kyi phung por gyur na/ bsod nams kyi phung po bsod nams kyi phung po zhes de bzhin gshegs pas me gsung ngo // rab 'bar
220b4(sna tshogs): 'di ji snyam du sems gzugs kyi sku yosu gru ba pas de bzhin gshegs par lta snya ma 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
220b5(sna tshogs): lags te gzugs kyi sku yongasu grub pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lnga'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku yongasu grub pa/ gzugs kyi sku
220b6(sna tshogs): yongasu rdzogs pa des 'gyi bi ra yongasu grub pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na gzugs kyi sku yongasu grub pa zhes 'gyi
220b7(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems mtshan phun sum tshogs pas/ nga bzhin gshegs par lta snyim 'am/ rab 'bor gyis
220b8(sna tshogs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma la gso la pa na phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lnga'o// de ci'i srang du de bzhin gas pa
221a1(sna tshogs): mtshar phur sum rigs par gang gsungs pa de mar pur sum tshogs pa la mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dungs pa'i slad du swa/ nges
221a2(sna tshogs): mtshan phur sum rogs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di ji skad du sams/ de ba gshegs pa 'di sna dungs ro
221a3(sna tshogs): bstan to zhes dgongs sngar rab 'byor nga lngar mi lnga sde de bzhin gshegs pas gang bstan pa'i chos dgang yang mang ngo // rab 'byor su'i 'angs
221a4(sna tshogs): du de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to zhes zer/ rab 'byor de ni mdu pa dang / log par zir pas ngal skur par 'gyur// bci'i phyir
221a5(sna tshogs): rab 'byor chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dmigs par 'gyur/ ba'i cho sa bstan pa chos bstan pa zhes pa bde gang yang meng pa'i phyir ro// nga nas bcom ldan 'das la
221a6(sna tshogs): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mang
221a7(sna tshogs): par yid ches par 'gyur ba mchis sar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngag sems can pa yin/ sems cad rang pa yang ma yin
221a8(sna tshogs): nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can rnams shes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas de dag sems can mang par gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des ra sems can rnams
221b1(sna tshogs): shes pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems// nga bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang
221b2(sna tshogs): gang yang yod da / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
221b3(sna tshogs): par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de chos cung zad kyang med cing mi
221b4(sna tshogs): dmigs pa/ ngasar bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o// yang rab 'byor chos de ni mnyam pa ste/ de la mi mnyam pa gang yang meng pas ngas na
221b5(sna tshogs): bla na mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni bang ga med pa dang / sems can meng ba dang
221b6(sna tshogs): srog rang ba dang / gang zag mang par mnyam pa ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'bor dge ba'i chos rnams dag pa'i
221b7(sna tshogs): ros rnams shes pa ba ni de dag de bzhir gshegs pas chos med pa nyid du gsungs te/ des ra dag pa'i chos rnams shes pa'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi
221b8(sna tshogs): bu mo gang la la 'ag gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na re'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag ji snyed yod pa de tsam gyi rin po che sna bdar gyi phung po mngon pa
222a1(sna tshogs): bsdus de sbyin 'byin pas/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad bcam gzung nas/ gzhan dag pa ya
222a2(sna tshogs): bstan na/ rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po lnga ma ngas brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi bzod ngo do// rab 'byor 'di ji sa
222a3(sna tshogs): du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sems can rnams bkrol lo zhes dgong so snyam na/ rab 'byor de de lnga mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'iny+tsa
222a4(sna tshogs): gshegs pas gang bkrol ba'i sems can de dag gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang la la zhig bkrol
222a5(sna tshogs): bar gyur na/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog/ tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
222a6(sna tshogs): rab 'byor bdag tu 'dzin ces bya ba ni de 'dzin pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na de yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis gzung // rab 'bor bris pa so so
222a7(sna tshogs): skye bo rnams shes bya ba ni de de dag skye bo med pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ deso na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor di jimam
222a8(sna tshogs): du mams/ mtshon phun du ma tshogs pas de bzhin gi shegs par bas snyam 'am/ rab khyor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'daso ni ma lags so// ma
222b1(sna tshogs): phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi bal+la'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor deng bzhin te/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas nga bzhin
222b2(sna tshogs): gshegs par mi blta'o// rab 'bor gal te mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta bar gyur ra/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang nga bzhin
222b3(sna tshogs): migs par 'gyur te/ de bas na mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lnga'o// de ras bcom ldan 'das la cha dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
222b4(sna tshogs): 'di tha nas gas do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na mtshan phur sum tshogs pas de bzhir gsha
222b5(sna tshogs): mi lnga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa'ang ngag bka' stsal to// ga nga dag nga la gzugasu mthong / gang dag pa la sbya
222b6(sna tshogs): log par spong bas zhugs pa ste/ skya bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta// 'drar ba rnams ri chos kyi sku chos
222b7(sna tshogs): sa par ba mer pas// de ni rnam par shes mi nus// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
222b8(sna tshogs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso snyam du 'dzin da/ rab 'byor khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ rab 'bar mtshan phun sum tshogs pas nga ba der bshegs padag
223a1(sna tshogs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med ra
223a2(sna tshogs): 'byor 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos la la zhig rnam par nga shig gam/ chang ngur btags pa snyam du 'dzin
223a3(sna tshogs): rab 'byo lnga mi lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos gang yang rnam par bshig pa 'am
223a4(sna tshogs): btabs pa med do// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna 'dun gyis rab tu
223a5(sna tshogs): gang bar byas te/ sbyin par byin pa pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos rnams bdag med cing skye ba med pa la bzod pa thob na/ de nyid gzhi las
223a6(sna tshogs): bsod nams kyis phung po che sa mang du bskyed do// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi phung pau yongasu gzung bar mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
223a7(sna tshogs): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu gzung bar mi bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
223a8(sna tshogs): rab 'byor yongasu gzung mod kyi/ log par mi gzung ste des na yongasu gzung ba zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa
223b1(sna tshogs): b.rung nga/ bon tam/ bzhengs sapa/ bzhugs sam/ brnal ba mdza'o zhes de skad zer na dngas bshad pa'i don mi shes// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin
223b2(sna tshogs): shebs pa zhes bya ba ni gar yang ma bzung / gang nas kyang ma byon pa'i phyir te/ dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
223b3(sna tshogs): yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'ami rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nasa'i rdul rnams ji snyed yod pa de dag 'di lta ste dpe
223b4(sna tshogs): rdul phra rab kyi tshogs bzhin du phyi mar bas na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab kyi cho gas de mang ba yin nam/ rab 'bar gyis gsol ba
223b5(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das dang lags te/ rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de mang ba lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te tshogs shig mchis par gyur na/ 
223b6(sna tshogs): ma ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogs shes bka' mi stsal pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogs shes gang
223b7(sna tshogs): gsungs pa de tshogs ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na rdul phra rab kyi tshogs shes bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pas spang
223b8(sna tshogs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams shes gang gsungs pa de khams ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
224a1(sna tshogs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal de khams shig mchis par gyur na/ nga nyid ril
224a2(sna tshogs): 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i skad du'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ril por 'dzin par gsungs pa de 'dzin pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des
224a3(sna tshogs): ril par 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ril por 'dzin pa nyid ni tha snyad de/ chos de ni brjod du med pa yin na/ de
224a4(sna tshogs): yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis gzung ngo // rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'ad skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bdag tu lta bar gsungs/ de bzhin gshegs
224a5(sna tshogs): pas sems can du rdzo ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta bar gsung so zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de yang yang dag par smra bas smra ba
224a6(sna tshogs): yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ri ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa do ni ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
224a7(sna tshogs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag tu lta bar gang gsungs pa de lnga ba ma mchis pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na bdag tu lta ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom
224a8(sna tshogs): ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad shes par bya/ blta bar
224b1(sna tshogs): bo/ mos par ba ste/ ci nas chosu 'du shes pa la yang mi gnas pa de ltar mos par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chosu 'du shes cho su 'du shes shes bya ba ni
224b2(sna tshogs): 'du shes med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na chosu 'du shes shes bya'o// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224b3(sna tshogs): gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin par byon pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
224b4(sna tshogs): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha na tshigasu bcad pa tsam blangs nas 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgyu
224b5(sna tshogs): cher rab tu ston na/ de nyid bzhi de las bsod nams mang du grangs meng dpag tu med pa bskyed do// ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston can/ ji ltar yang dag par rab tu
224b6(sna tshogs): mi ston pa de bzhin du bya ste/ des na yang dag par rab tu ston pa zhes pa'o// skar ma rib rib mar me dang / sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / rmi lam klog dang sprin lnga ba
224b7(sna tshogs): 'dus pas de ltar blto bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems
224b8(sna tshogs): dpa'i de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lho ma yin dang / 
225a1(sna tshogs): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'gas pa shes rab kya pha rol du phyin
225a2(sna tshogs): rdorje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta nA ya a d+yar+dz+dza sha ti ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags
225a3(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
225a4(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams
225a5(sna tshogs): cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de
225a6(sna tshogs): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud pa/ sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams
225a7(sna tshogs): cad kyi rab thams cad yongasu skong ba'i las mdzad pa thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtog pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang gsung da
225a8(sna tshogs): thugs thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu smras pa
225b1(sna tshogs): bya/ nges par bste/ ci nas cho su 'du shes pa la yang mi gnas pa de ltar mos par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chosu 'du shes cho su 'du shes shes bya ba'i
225b2(sna tshogs): 'du shes med por de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na chos 'du shes shes bya'o// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225b3(sna tshogs): gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin por sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin par byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
225b4(sna tshogs): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha ni tshigasu bcad pa tsam blangs nas 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya
225b5(sna tshogs): cher rab tu ston na/ de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams mang du grangs mang dpag tu med pa bskyed do// ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston ca na/ ji ltar yang dag par rab tu
225b6(sna tshogs): mi ston pa de bzhin du bya ste/ des na yang dag par rab tu ston pa zhes bya'o// skar ma rib rib mar me dang / sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / rmi lam klob dang sprin lnga pa
225b7(sna tshogs): 'dus pas de ltar blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems
225b8(sna tshogs): nga'i de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / l-I pa yin dang
226a1(sna tshogs): zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
226a2(sna tshogs): gcod pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i ma rdzog s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta nA ya a d+yar+dz+dza sha ti ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
226a3(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
226a4(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam patha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tham
226a5(sna tshogs): cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhi
226a6(sna tshogs): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud pa/ sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams
226a7(sna tshogs): cad kyi rab thams cad yongasu spong ba'i las mdzad pa thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtog pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la thezhugs pa/ sku dang gsung dang
226a8(sna tshogs): thugs thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu smras pa
226b1(sna tshogs): dang bdan kha dag sna tshogs dril du brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan phreng dang chur 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes pa
226b2(sna tshogs): byas pa/ de bzhin du thams cad bzhugs pa shes pa bstod pa na/ byang dung sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lnga ste ba du
226b3(sna tshogs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po leg na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gizugs dbang phyug dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal ngo
226b4(sna tshogs): sems bskyed ma thag tu ches kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / na mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu
226b5(sna tshogs): 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig ste/ yongasu bskor tsong mdun gyis bltas ras/ 
226b6(sna tshogs): chos ston te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba theg mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mang dge pa/ 
226b7(sna tshogs): don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa yongasu byang ba/ yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar ra
226b8(sna tshogs): tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas pa ni 'di lnga ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// 'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam 'i gas de ni 'ang la
227a1(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// rag pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sa pa'i gnas sgrub pa'i 'cha
227a2(sna tshogs): nga rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang po rnam par dag par gnas de ni 'di lnga ste/ 
227a3(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas ngan
227a4(sna tshogs): 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sems pa rnam par
227a5(sna tshogs): dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
227a6(sna tshogs): yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag po'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas da ni 'di lta ste/ byang
227a7(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i
227a8(sna tshogs): gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'od lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// dri rnam par dag pa'i/ 
227b1(sna tshogs): gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ 'di lnga
227b2(sna tshogs): sde chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// lag na
227b3(sna tshogs): rdo rje su la la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i ba
227b4(sna tshogs): du sgrib pa thams cad dang / chod pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang / sems can
227b5(sna tshogs): dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyuraro// su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin ra
227b6(sna tshogs): zhig klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de/ tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting 'dzin thob pas chos thams
227b7(sna tshogs): cad la dbang bar 'gyu ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
227b8(sna tshogs): tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa'am rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rdeg pa
228a1(sna tshogs): pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
228a2(sna tshogs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
228a3(sna tshogs): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg sde 'bar bar lha la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing rgod pa mchab gtsigs
228a4(sna tshogs): nas rkang pa g.yon po brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dri smraso// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nga bzhin gshegs pa
228a5(sna tshogs): bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam po nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha
228a6(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag por 'gyuraro// dri ma thams cad
228a7(sna tshogs): rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag
228a8(sna tshogs): bar 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje sul la shes ra
228b1(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / 
228b2(sna tshogs): dri ma rnams dang glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
228b3(sna tshogs): bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum mul te/ pad+ma'i
228b4(sna tshogs): 'dab mkha 'byed pas 'dod tshogs la sogs de'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing / pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs shes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// hrIHde nas bcom
228b5(sna tshogs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyis dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po
228b6(sna tshogs): zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams
228b7(sna tshogs): cang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro/ chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam po nyid thob par 'gyur// zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad
228b8(sna tshogs): ba par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po gzhin rab tu 'dzum mul te/ rang gi go la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur
229a1(sna tshogs): chen po mngon par rdzogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog/ khams gsung ma lus pa mtha' pa/ 
229a2(sna tshogs): na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba dor thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems
229a3(sna tshogs): can du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ gzhi ni rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thob ma'i rdo rje cha
229a4(sna tshogs): po gsang nas/ rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di spos// hUM/ 
229a5(sna tshogs): nga nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par
229a6(sna tshogs): byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rgyu mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
229a7(sna tshogs): chub chen poradon gcog pa'i phyir don gyi mnyim pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i pir chos kyi
229a8(sna tshogs): mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub yi byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par bya
229b1(sna tshogs): nub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgor ba de sdig pa thams cad spyong
229b2(sna tshogs): kyang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang rku ba mngon par
229b3(sna tshogs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyuraro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing
229b4(sna tshogs): bzhin rab tu 'dzum mul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di smraso// a// de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das
229b5(sna tshogs): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos tha kyi ma yid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad nga
229b6(sna tshogs): 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid // gti mug spros pa
229b7(sna tshogs): meng pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa'ing ngo // chos thams cad kyi spros pa meng pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par ba
229b8(sna tshogs): lab na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa ngos 'dul ba'i dbang gi khams gsapa du ska
230a1(sna tshogs): pa'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher sngor te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras/ tra~M/ nganas
230a2(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs
230a3(sna tshogs): brtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin
230a4(sna tshogs): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi
230a5(sna tshogs): phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting 'dzin thams cad
230a6(sna tshogs): thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i
230a7(sna tshogs): dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyuraro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung
230a8(sna tshogs): 'bog pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus
230b1(sna tshogs): dang ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a
230b2(sna tshogs): rgya bar 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzir pas don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te
230b3(sna tshogs): gzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing / rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// AHde nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros
230b4(sna tshogs): pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ger bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i
230b5(sna tshogs): rdul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
230b6(sna tshogs): smin pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
230b7(sna tshogs): gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston to// bzhin 'dzum bzhi ral gri ngas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
230b8(sna tshogs): nga'i snying po mchog 'di smra so// a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i nga ba'ir gshegs pas 'khar lo
231a1(sna tshogs): la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa na de bzhin gshegs pa
231a2(sna tshogs): cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'khor le la 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
231a3(sna tshogs): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyuraro// thams cad kyi mnyam pa cing la 'jug pa
231a4(sna tshogs): ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor la bskor ba
231a5(sna tshogs): chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing / gzhin 'dzum nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo bas pa ni de rdo rje'i 'a khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras
231a6(sna tshogs): hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mdzad pa thams cad kyi chog rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bye ba shes ra'i kyi
231a7(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chog rgyas pa'o// semos can gyi khams
231a8(sna tshogs): thams cad mo su skyob pa ni de bzhin go shegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
231b1(sna tshogs): la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod
231b2(sna tshogs): ba dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas
231b3(sna tshogs): pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ra mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzur zhing las thams cad dor yod pa'i
231b4(sna tshogs): dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ya shes kyi khu
231b5(sna tshogs): tshur yong su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na po'i tshul 'di ba shad de/ sems
231b6(sna tshogs): can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do// sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad
231b7(sna tshogs): chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rjenyi ngo // de ci'i pir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni 'ang
231b8(sna tshogs): rkub po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ gzhin rag tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyog
232a1(sna tshogs): dang rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo shes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras// 5/ de nas ldan 'das par rna
232a2(sna tshogs): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa yong chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ thams cad mnyal pa nyid pas
232a3(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngar nyid ngo // thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
232a4(sna tshogs): chos nyid// thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje nga bzhir gshegs pa
232a5(sna tshogs): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ras
232a6(sna tshogs): long pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems
232a7(sna tshogs): can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po thams
232a8(sna tshogs): cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gaushegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams
232b1(sna tshogs): yang rdo rjer sring pobaro// drag bams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ri chos kyi sring po can// sems can thams cad kyi ba 'byed pa la sbyor bas sems
232b2(sna tshogs): na thams cad ni las kyi snying po cano// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang
232b3(sna tshogs): phyag cher pos rang gi de kho ro'i snying po 'di pu lo// hrI/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung
232b4(sna tshogs): bai dang gzhig pa dang / bsgrub pa dam tshig ces bya bar rang gi de kho na'i sring po 'di phulo// b+h+yo/ de nas sbrang rtsi byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan
232b5(sna tshogs): 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ ri gran gcig tu rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smra so// sra de nas sring mo bzhi sau bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi
232b6(sna tshogs): kho na'i sring po 'di phul lo// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pa la mthar thug cing / mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang reg
232b7(sna tshogs): 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
232b8(sna tshogs): byin pa'i tshul 'di'i shad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nying ngas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol
233a1(sna tshogs): phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du gnyid pas chos thams cad du ra cing do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a2(sna tshogs): phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 
233a3(sna tshogs): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad
233a4(sna tshogs): zang nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di den yod pa dang // thog
233a5(sna tshogs): pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag 'ardo rdul leg so zhes bya ba byin no// sems can chen po legaso legaso// bde ba chen po la gso legs/ 
233a6(sna tshogs): theg pa chen po legs legaso// blo gros che po lnga gso lags// cho go 'di ni legs par smras// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i
233a7(sna tshogs): mchog/ rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyi// de dag mi song mi tshug so
233a8(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring po mi thogs thob par 'gyur// de skad
233b1(sna tshogs): gsungs nas gsung 'grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshang ba la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das
233b2(sna tshogs): de bzhir gshegs pa rnam par mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ ros thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba dran po rdo rje'i ngo
233b3(sna tshogs): yod pa'i ngang rig ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgor chog dang po thog ma dang thal dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di
233b4(sna tshogs): gsungs so// bang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam sa kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po'i pos grub
233b5(sna tshogs): dab par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ri de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bang chub chen po dngos grub dam par
233b6(sna tshogs): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa 'i bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms
233b7(sna tshogs): pa dngos grub dam mer 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum thams
233b8(sna tshogs): cad kyi dbang phyug ren po des grub dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dang pa ni pha
234a1(sna tshogs): lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongasu sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang chags shing na dru bya du sems dpa
234a2(sna tshogs): chen po rnams kyi ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongasu bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog shin tu bad ba chen pa
234a3(sna tshogs): dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe// de srid brdungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed
234a4(sna tshogs): par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gnasu bsgrubs pas na// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yong su dag par 'gyur// chags la sogs
234a5(sna tshogs): pas 'dul ba ni// 'khor ba'i bar du dag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba srang du bdag nyid 'bul// ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang // tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ 
234a6(sna tshogs): de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la migs// 'did gas chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba che'i nir rtsa la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas ra// sen don rnams
234a7(sna tshogs): brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 
234a8(sna tshogs): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// bod ba chen ze rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la tho
234b1(sna tshogs): bar 'gyur// de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog kyang grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// de nas 'a
234b2(sna tshogs): ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi chog ni nyi shu rtsa lnga po
234b3(sna tshogs): 'di rnang so// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gag pa med pa/ oM skya ba bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ 
234b4(sna tshogs): oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems/ hU~M oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ oM ngo bo
234b5(sna tshogs): rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM las rnam par sbyong ba/ hUM au nges par gno nga mdzes rdo rje can/ phaT au 'dod pa la 'dod dgas/ ai spong
234b6(sna tshogs): ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dal ba/ oM hrI oM AHzhes bya ba'i sgo/ oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ a baM hUM oM a oM de ba'i na gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
234b7(sna tshogs): mchog/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje/ oM a sdig pa'i bcing ba thams cad chom
234b8(sna tshogs): shig/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar par gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje/ hUM tra Ta sdig pa thams cad gzhim pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin pa
236a1(sna tshogs): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ dngos grub dam pa/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyu'o// lagan rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
236a2(sna tshogs): bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par 'gyuraro// 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am/ yi gar bri ba 'am/ yi ger 'brir gzhug pa 'am
236a3(sna tshogs): klog pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ bisti sdang du bya ba 'am/ ri mor bya bo'am/ mchod par mi nuso// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdul gyi cha
236a4(sna tshogs): kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yig 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems can ngo dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas meng po la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin// mtha' dag rdzogs pa lnga
236a5(sna tshogs): ci smos/ lagar rdo rje gang la la ngag sangs rgya sa bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur bsti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma bas pa dang / bsti sdang ma
236a6(sna tshogs): byas pa dang / mchod pa ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nuso// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i
236a7(sna tshogs): sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyuraro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnasu 'gyuraro// de skal pa bya
236a8(sna tshogs): bamang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / 
236b1(sna tshogs): ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin du 'bring bar 'gyuraro// yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// mjed/ 
236b2(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi/ ngas phyogs tsam
236b3(sna tshogs): nga brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams
236b4(sna tshogs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
236b5(sna tshogs): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kra na bod skad du
236b6(sna tshogs): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya ru brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ 
236b7(sna tshogs): rgyal ba gang lags de kun gyi// yum ni dge ma khong legs to// khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas yum gyur de'i mtshan// dge ba
236b8(sna tshogs): bdag gis brjod par 'gyi// 'bor par 'dod pas mnyan par gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam gyis rnam pa ralen pa nyid dang / rnam
237a1(sna tshogs): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mnor ba de bzhin nying dang / gzhan ma yin pa de ba'in sang dang / bdan pa dang / de 'i'ang
237a2(sna tshogs): yang dag pa dang / phyin cim log pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po meng pa'i de ba 'ang
237a3(sna tshogs): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid med pa nyid
237a4(sna tshogs): dang sen med pa nyid dang / srog med pa nyid dang / gso ba med pa nyid dang / skyes bu med pa nyid dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang / brjod par bya ba dang / brjod par byab ma yin pa
237a5(sna tshogs): dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / rgyags pa med pa dang / spros pa med sa
237a6(sna tshogs): dang / spros pa dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
237a7(sna tshogs): bskyed pa dang / nyan thos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskrun pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs zod mi shes pa bsags pa dang / 
237a8(sna tshogs): ye shes 'bab pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang / lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / lha'i rna ba rab tu dang bar mdzad pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes par mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi
237b1(sna tshogs): gnas rje su dran par mdzad pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsrungs pa dang / dran pa
237b2(sna tshogs): bar gnag pa la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i shugs dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / stobs mdzad
237b3(sna tshogs): dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang / nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang / 'bagaso pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa
237b4(sna tshogs): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ston par mdzad pa dang / dbang bcu sgrub pa dang / sa bcu lnga gnas par mdzad pa dang / stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa
237b5(sna tshogs): dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcus mdzes par byas pa dang / shes pa bcu sgrub pa dang / bag la nyal ba bcur dgra 'jigs par mdzad pa dang / bsam gtan rnams
237b6(sna tshogs): bsgrub par mdzad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang / shes
237b7(sna tshogs): pa thams cad mdzad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / spong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong po nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
237b8(sna tshogs): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma pas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / do ba med pa spong bcing dang / rang ba'i sgo
238a1(sna tshogs): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid steng pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / nga pe nyid sdang ba nyid dang / de
238a2(sna tshogs): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa meng pa dang / dor gcig pa ma yin pa dang / der tha dad pa ma yin pa 'a
238a3(sna tshogs): med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par sgom pa dang / rab tu brtag par bya pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang gni med pa dang
238a4(sna tshogs): mtshan nyid med pa dang / brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma 'ji ga pa med par mdzad pa dang / g.yo ba med par mdzad pa dang
238a5(sna tshogs): gnyis med pa dang / gnyis med po ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / blo 'jug po rnam par spangs pa dang / gnyen po med pa dang ma gos pa dang / na mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang / yod
238a6(sna tshogs): pa dang med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang / rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang / 'gal me bskor ba dang 'dra ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do// su zhig shes
238a7(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'ing 'don pa de ngan sring thams cad las rab tu thur bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyuraro// byang chub
238a8(sna tshogs): thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyuraro// de ri gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par dran par bya'i// 
238b1(sna tshogs): ma'aphags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma mos pa la byabasam/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yis kyis rnam par mkhyen du cing / 
238b2(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phag bzhes pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lnga ste/ oM prad+d+ha ma ha prad+d+he a ba b+ha se/ a lo ka ka re/ ang dz+nyA na pi d+ha ma na/ sing d+he su
238b3(sna tshogs): sid d+ha/ sid d+ha pa na/ b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ba sun d+ha ri/ b+ho ga ba te/ bad sa len/ pra sa ri ta ha ste/ sa mA shwa sa ka ri/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA/ kam be ka ma ba/ tsa la tsa la/ rA ba rA ba/ gar+b+ha gar+b+ha/ 
238b4(sna tshogs): a ga tsA a ga ts+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ mAn mA bi lam pa swA hA/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum gzung bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas
238b5(sna tshogs): brjod bas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'bya nga par 'gyuraro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid bzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med
238b6(sna tshogs): par 'gyuraro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ma lus pa gzung bar 'gyuraro// gsang sngags dang rig sngags thams cad kyang gzung bar 'gyuraro// 
238b7(sna tshogs): 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid bzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshar brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs
238b8(sna tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya g+ha ga bi ti prad dz+nyA ar+d+ha sha ti ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa/ sangs
239a1(sna tshogs): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'ang lo// 'di srang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan las rgyal po'i khang bached du
239a2(sna tshogs): po'i ril dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byir dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rjen skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyir dang
239a3(sna tshogs): dri za dang / lA ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'ape chen po dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma da / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ngag dang yang
239a4(sna tshogs): thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor gang la la nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pa dang / rang
239a5(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par ba/ gzung ba rU ba/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ 
239a6(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub semaso pa'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyishese rab kyi
239a7(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par brtson par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
239a8(sna tshogs): du bya ba sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid du rgya cher bstan pa'i bar ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
239b1(sna tshogs): nga'i bang rku ba la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar te/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// bang chub
239b2(sna tshogs): sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas dang / bang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de nyid
239b3(sna tshogs): la brtson par bya'o// de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'bor da bya ba sangs rgyas dang / 
239b4(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid du rgya cher bstan pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogos kyi chos rnams dang
239b5(sna tshogs): nyin thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams da nga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag yin pa de dag
239b6(sna tshogs): thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing / 'dus te 'u ba la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
239b7(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya// rnal 'byor du bya ste/ nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par 'dod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
239b8(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang mnyan par bya/ gzung bar ba/ bsang 'ar ba/ klag ba ba/ ku
240a1(sna tshogs): chub par bya'o// dge pa'i chos bang dub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bang ru
240a2(sna tshogs): sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag yin pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing / 'dus te'u ba la yang dag par ga'al
240a3(sna tshogs): ba yin zhes bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor 'di lta ste/ smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
240a4(sna tshogs): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas mo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang sna
240a5(sna tshogs): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pi nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pas stong pa nyid
240a6(sna tshogs): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin sdong pa
240a7(sna tshogs): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
240a8(sna tshogs): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang
240b1(sna tshogs): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
240b2(sna tshogs): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgra
240b3(sna tshogs): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
240b4(sna tshogs): spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / bams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen bo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa
