240b5(sna tshogs): bco brgyad dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dong / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang bang dug nyid
240b6(sna tshogs): dang thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos bang chub kyi phyogs kyis rnams
240b7(sna tshogs): dang nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag lags pa
240b8(sna tshogs): ngag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing 'das te'u ba la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams yin no// rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang
241a1(sna tshogs): ltar dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos
241a2(sna tshogs): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag lags pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing / 'dus te 'u ba la yang dag par gzhol ba ni bcom ldan
241a3(sna tshogs): 'das kye ma a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dan
241a4(sna tshogs): bri'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ga ting dpag dka' ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das
241a5(sna tshogs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma a la
241a6(sna tshogs): la a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ni mkha' dang mtshungs pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin
241a7(sna tshogs): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni na mkha' lta bu yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma oM la la a
241a8(sna tshogs): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi brtson pas rtogs par dka' ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad
241b1(sna tshogs): smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mngon par mi 'artsod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / yid mi gzungs pa dang / don du mi gcer ba dang / thos pad
241b2(sna tshogs): mi ldan pa dang / shes rab chung ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dre ba mang ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos 'dzin du bcug pa dang / dad pa
241b3(sna tshogs): ma dang ldan pa dang / las dang po pa dang / skal pa med pa'i tshul can dang / yongasu mi 'dri ba'i tshul dang / shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa bas pa dang / le lo can dang / brtson
241b4(sna tshogs): 'grus chung ba dang / snying stobs chung ba dang / mos pa chung ba dang / dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par mi brtson pas mos par dka' ba ste/ rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab
241b5(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mos par dka' ba zhes bya'o// rang 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
241b6(sna tshogs): 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ des 'das pa dang mo byon pa dang / 
241b7(sna tshogs): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bzung ba yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lhag pa'i bsom pa phur
241b8(sna tshogs): sum tshogs pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chang bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
242a1(sna tshogs): mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang 'dru ba/ klog par bya/ kun chung par bya ste/ nges na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub mngon pa
242a2(sna tshogs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
242a3(sna tshogs): lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa rdzogs
242a4(sna tshogs): s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa tI pradz+nyA b+hA ra mi trA sarba thA ga ta mA te e ka any+dza ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
242a5(sna tshogs): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yig gcig ma zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma la phag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcag
242a6(sna tshogs): na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
242a7(sna tshogs): mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dkun dga' bo khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
242a8(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba 'di/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ a/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
242b1(sna tshogs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rje mi
242b2(sna tshogs): rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ yige gcig ma rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kau shi ka
242b3(sna tshogs): pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ kau shi ka zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 
242b4(sna tshogs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
242b5(sna tshogs): 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas ba com ldan 'das kyis lho'i dbang po brgya byin la
242b6(sna tshogs): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyi su blta bar mi bya/ gnyis ma yin par yang
242b7(sna tshogs): ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin par yang ma yin/ blang bar yang ma yin/ dor bar mi yin// bsnan par mi yin/ bsnon pa med par ma yin// 
242b8(sna tshogs): kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin// kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ rnam par bang ba yang ma yin pa yang ma yin/ spang bar
243a1(sna tshogs): ma yin/ spang bar ma yin par yang ma yin/ gnasu ma yin/ gnas ma yin pa yang ma yin/ sbyong bar ma yin/ sbyong bar ma yin par yang ma yin/ 'brel
243a2(sna tshogs): bar ma yin/ 'brel ba ma yin par yang ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen ma yin par yang ma yin// cho su ma yin/ chos ma yin par yang ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin// 
243a3(sna tshogs): de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par yang ma yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
243a4(sna tshogs): phyin pa'i don ni 'di lnga ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyamo// chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
243a5(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa zab bo// chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
243a6(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med do// chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems medado// chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i
243a7(sna tshogs): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do// chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do// chos thams
243a8(sna tshogs): cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa'o// chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba medo// chos thams cad
243b1(sna tshogs): 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med do// chos thams cad na mkha' lta bu'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mkha' lta bu'o// 
243b2(sna tshogs): gzugs mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu medo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'odi byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir
243b3(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / 
243b4(sna tshogs): rlung gi khams dang / ni mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do// ri rang mu med
243b5(sna tshogs): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu medo// rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu medo// rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir/ shes rab
243b6(sna tshogs): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo// chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer me // chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rimugasu med
243b7(sna tshogs): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmig suM med do// chos thams cad gsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
243b8(sna tshogs): gsal ba med par mnyamo// chos thams cad shed pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med ngo // chos thams cad bsam gyis mi
244a1(sna tshogs): khyab pa'i phyir/ shes rabakyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin da dang tshupa thams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
244a2(sna tshogs): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rog phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rogang phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
244a3(sna tshogs): smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yong su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
244a4(sna tshogs): mu meng ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lngar stong pa nyid bco brgyad de/ 'di lnga ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi rang stong pa nyid dang // stong
244a5(sna tshogs): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dang pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma bas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
244a6(sna tshogs): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi batshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
244a7(sna tshogs): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha
244a8(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// skar ma rab ring mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chungang dang // rmi lam klog dang sprin lnga bu// 'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya// na mo b+ha ga bad+ye Ar+ya pradz+nyA pa ri
244b1(sna tshogs): ye oM nga hi/ hrI shrI shru tI/ smr-i ti ma'i ga'i bi dza ya swA hA/ 'gag pa med cing skye mang la// chang pa mang cing rtag pa mang // tha dad don min don gcig min// 'ang ba med cing 'gro mang
244b2(sna tshogs): la spros pa'i bas zhi ba yi// rjen cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa// sgra mchog de la phag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ras
244b3(sna tshogs): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang / lnga'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
244b4(sna tshogs): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka zhes pa brdzogaso// 
244b5(sna tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya swa lpa/ akA ra badz+ra pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA ra sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yig rung du zhes pa ba theg pa chen po'i mang
244b6(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal/ 'di skad bang gi gris thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'o// bzong phung po'i ri
244b7(sna tshogs): dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / bang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs / brgya byin dang
244b8(sna tshogs): ngas pa dang ga rdar skyong ba la sogs pa/ lnga bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi sring po'i sang ga'i zi la 'a
245a1(sna tshogs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag gcig la gzar nas/ pus
245a2(sna tshogs): mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas 'dzum dbul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
245a3(sna tshogs): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyu du la/ bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bang bar 'gyur ba
245a4(sna tshogs): dang / byang chub tu nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag sngags bsgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ba 'du
245a5(sna tshogs): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba bir te/ riH
245a6(sna tshogs): kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir/ brtson pa legaso leg so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la/ yid la zung shig dang
245a7(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la
245a8(sna tshogs): nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags bsgrub par brtson pa de dag/ bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur 'o ngas khyod la bshad// de nas byang chub
245b1(sna tshogs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa spyan rus gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad
245b2(sna tshogs): shad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// mnyam par gzhag pa de sprin mtshams
245b3(sna tshogs): kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'od zer ngas/ sems cad
245b4(sna tshogs): dmyal ba pa yang chad / sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chug tu nges par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu
245b5(sna tshogs): g.yos so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bas kyi drung du lha'i can dan gyi phye ma'i tshar yang phab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
245b6(sna tshogs): tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
245b7(sna tshogs): sems su bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
245b8(sna tshogs): pa la phag 'tshalo// tad ya thA oM mu ne mu ne/ ma hA mu na ya swA hA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ing rnyed pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// sangs
246a1(sna tshogs): rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di thob pas/ de'i phyir 'ang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' ra
246a2(sna tshogs): po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcol pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa gshegs pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po nas
246a3(sna tshogs): bya bar 'gyuro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to// gang dag khyod kyi ming can pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan pa dang / glags par du
246a4(sna tshogs): bris ras/ mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus ra/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuraro// tang ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ pad mA b+he/ a ba me/ sa ras pa ti/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ra d+ha ra/ 
246a5(sna tshogs): dA rA d+hi ri de ba tA/ a ru pA la na/ bung d+hod ta ri Ni/ pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba A shA ma sarba sa twarAny+tsa/ sarba karba/ A ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ya/ bi she d+ha ya bub+d+has
246a6(sna tshogs): Sh+TA na ra swA hA/ don dam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum/ 'phral tu sdig pa brog pa/ bang tub sbyad
246a7(sna tshogs): par byang ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ phan yon brjod pa re me ru so// 'di klags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bsku
246a8(sna tshogs): bar 'gyuraro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang mchog tu 'gyura'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ 
246b1(sna tshogs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i pir du/ 
246b2(sna tshogs): sems can gang dag sprob chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sra bas
246b3(sna tshogs): byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phabs
246b4(sna tshogs): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du/ sems can thams cad la sban pa dang
246b5(sna tshogs): sems can bsod nams chu ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsa la pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar
246b6(sna tshogs): pa ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong
246b7(sna tshogs): de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
246b8(sna tshogs): 'phags pa shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ yi ge 'u du zhes pa pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bany+tsa bing sha ti be/ pradz+ra pA ri pa tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA ra sA tra
247a1(sna tshogs): bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
247a2(sna tshogs): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi zom la/ lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig
247a3(sna tshogs): 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / na mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci
247a4(sna tshogs): dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang // mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshigs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba/ 
247a5(sna tshogs): dpag tshad lnga brgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub senga'i sems
247a6(sna tshogs): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongasu bskor/ rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongasu bsngo
247a7(sna tshogs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bar snang las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
247a8(sna tshogs): byas nas/ phyogs gi cig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga po
247b1(sna tshogs): 'di ba 'i ngari shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje shes rab kyi pha ro
247b2(sna tshogs): phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM kun tu bzang po spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra'o// oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi
247b3(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM 'bar ba chen po'i chos
247b4(sna tshogs): nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tuyin pa'i sgo'i// oM brtson pa grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// 
247b5(sna tshogs): rdo rje thams cad brtag pa'i sems/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rang bzhir rnam
247b6(sna tshogs): par dag pa'i chos nying ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM las rnam par sbyong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o ngas par gnod mdzes
247b7(sna tshogs): rdo rje can phaT/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes
247b8(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo/ oM hUM/ thams cad la 'gro ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM hriHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM a des byab shes ra
248a1(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM a ma ba hUM shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i stsa
248a2(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM de bzhin gshegs bzad kyis gsu
248a3(sna tshogs): rnam par dag pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga
248a4(sna tshogs): skad ces bka' sprul nas/ bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
248a5(sna tshogs): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ga sungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes pa
248a6(sna tshogs): theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha ga ba ti/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sri
248a7(sna tshogs): po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ brgod phung po'i rolo// dge slong
248a8(sna tshogs): gi ge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'don chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa/ da chobacom ldan 'das ma pa richos kyi rnam grangs snang ba zhesug pa yo da
248b1(sna tshogs): la snyoms par zhug so// yang de'i tshwa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod par rnam par
248b2(sna tshogs): blta ste/ phung pa lnga po dag de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rnam par blta'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char
248b3(sna tshogs): po 'phags pa spyan ras gizags dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab
248b4(sna tshogs): par ba/ de skad ces sbas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces sdes/ 
248b5(sna tshogs): ro'u rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa ngas/ phung po lnga po de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong par yang
248b6(sna tshogs): rab par rdzasu mthong ba nga ltar blta bar bya ste/ gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nying bzug so// gzugs las stong pa nying gzhan ma yino// stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhan pa yi
248b7(sna tshogs): de bzhin du tshor ba dang rung shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ltar chos thams cad ri stong pa nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang
248b8(sna tshogs): ma skyes pa dang ma 'gas pa dang dri mo med pa dang / dri ma dang bral ba dang / bri ba med pa dang / gang ba med pa'o// shA ri ri bu/ de lta bas na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs mdo// tshorab
249a1(sna tshogs): med do// 'du shes mdo/ 'du byed rnams pa // rnam par shes pa meng ngo // rig le 'o// rna bi la 'o// sna ma do// lU med de// lus ngo // yid re // gzugs de ro// 
249a2(sna tshogs): sbyar ro// dri ma // ro ma // rab bya mdo/ chos rnams meng ngo // yig gi khams med cing / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa nas/ yid kyi khams meng cing / yid kyi rnam
249a3(sna tshogs): par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du mdo// ma rig pa med cing ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi rang cing rma shi zad pa'i bar du mdo// sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang 'geg par
249a4(sna tshogs): lam rnar rang ngo // sa pa mang ngo // thob pa rang // mthob nga yang med do// shA ri'i bu de lta bas ra/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i par/ shes
249a5(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas gnas te/ sems kyi sgrib ba med pas 'jigs pa med cing / phyin ci log las 'das te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar pan to// du
249a6(sna tshogs): gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtan to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
249a7(sna tshogs): sangs rgyas so// shA ri'i bu de lnga bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags te/ rigs pa chen po'i sngags dang // bla na med pa'i sngags dang / mi maHme pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags
249a8(sna tshogs): sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags te// ma log pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gsang sngags bden zhing / rigs pa yin par shes par bya'o// 
249b1(sna tshogs): tad ya thA/ gteg te/ pa ra ga te/ pa ra sang ga te/ bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar bslab
249b2(sna tshogs): par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ting 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu legs
249b3(sna tshogs): legaso// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes
249b4(sna tshogs): yid rango zhes legs bya ba byin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / byang chub seda' 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs kyi dbang
249b5(sna tshogs): phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang lnga pa yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
249b6(sna tshogs): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradzA pA ra mi tA sAr+ye gar+b+ha ma hA
249b7(sna tshogs): yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad le phyag 'tshal/ 
249b8(sna tshogs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma gtan chos kyi dgon pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang ba dang / bang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
250a1(sna tshogs): / kyi zhing mtha' yas pa nas 'dus pa chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' thim radang snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug pa dwe m+ba
250a2(sna tshogs): las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba mchis te/ 
250a3(sna tshogs): ldan 'das gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas byang chub si la nyi ma rang
250a4(sna tshogs): tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
250a5(sna tshogs): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces pa ka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu thabs mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin nyi ma zhes bya ba yod pas de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
250a6(sna tshogs): kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar thabs mkhas pa'i nyi ma'i
250a7(sna tshogs): ting 'dzin ni rnam pa bdun yod de/ gang zhe na dang po ni 'di ltar nyi mas myu gu smin par byed pa ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin nyi ma lta bus sen rnams la byang chub kyi myu gu
250a8(sna tshogs): smin par mdzad do// gnyis pa ni nyi ma la dbri dgrol med pa ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi thugs rje ni sen thad la snyoms par mdzad// gsum pa ni nyi mas nyal nyil sreg
250b1(sna tshogs): balngar byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong gi shes rab kyis nyon mongs pa'i zhal zil rnams sreg par bye'o// bzhi pa ni nyi mas 'khags pa 'jub lngar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
250b2(sna tshogs): gnyen po ye shes dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa 'khags pa 'ju ba lta bur bye // lnga pa ni ci mas mun pa sel ba ltar byang chung sems dpa'i so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyis
250b3(sna tshogs): bzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mun pa sel bar byed do// drug pa ni nyi mas gling bac+doM 'khor ba ltar bang chub sanga' 'phrin la sau phun sum tshogs pas sdug bsngal gyi rku bo bzhi las thar par
250b4(sna tshogs): mdzad do// bdun pa ni sems kun la snyoms par dro ba bzhin du byang chub seng 'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad la rag tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i thabs ni dro ba'i
250b5(sna tshogs): lus lta bu'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bste/ des 'di ltar chos thams cad rang ba'in
250b6(sna tshogs): med pa dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / mar na ma thams cad dang rab tu bral ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / dngos po thams cad dang bral ba da / gang zag pa med pa dang / gang zag pa
250b7(sna tshogs): thams cad dang bral ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnor
250b8(sna tshogs): bde bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang / bden pa dang gol 'byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bang chub sems dpa' 'i ma rab
251a1(sna tshogs): snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas yang chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba meng pa la bslab pa
251a2(sna tshogs): bya'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin med par rnam par dag pa la bslab par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par shes par bya'o// ngo bo nyid kyis
251a3(sna tshogs): dben par shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'dzin par byed na/ de las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ro// de bsod nams kyi tshogs skye bar
251a4(sna tshogs): 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi tshogs tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dran pa dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan po dang / ting 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
251a5(sna tshogs): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// mang
251a6(sna tshogs): thos dam pa'i chos la brtson// sems can kun la byams par ldan// brtson 'grus go cha phun sum tshogs// bdag dang gzhan gyi don la mos// bsam gtan ting 'dzin sgom la
251a7(sna tshogs): brtson// bdag dang sems can 'du shes med// yang dag theg pa'i lam la zhugs// sngon gyi rgyal sras de ltar spyod// mkhas pas mnor de bzhin slobs// bcom ldan 'das kyis
251a8(sna tshogs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba dang / lha dang mer bcos pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
251b1(sna tshogs): bstong // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i snying po theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan tragar+b+ha prad+hA pA ra mi tA ma hA yAn sU hA/ bong skad du/ 
251b2(sna tshogs): 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis bdus
251b3(sna tshogs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dang thabs gicig
251b4(sna tshogs): tu bzhug so// de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po 'dug pa stan las langs nas/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
251b5(sna tshogs): byang chub se ra rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par 'gyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba'i
251b6(sna tshogs): snying po chos thams cad dngos po dang bral ba gang yin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rtog pa med kyang gling bzhir 'khor
251b7(sna tshogs): byed cing mun pa rnams rag tu sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa la spyod pa ni rtog pa med kyang phyin ci log bzhi
251b8(sna tshogs): rnams la thugs rjes 'kho bo zhing rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams sel bar byed kyang mi rtog pa'i phyi ro// zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bong chub se nga'i shes
252a1(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 
252a2(sna tshogs): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i gnas skabs na gzung bar rtog pa dang 'dzin par rtog pa ste/ de spong
252a3(sna tshogs): bar byed pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par mi rdeg pa'i yas te/ 
252a4(sna tshogs): shes de ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir na mi rtog pa'i phyiraro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol dang tshu rol gyi mtha' gang la yang mi gnas pa'i piro// 
252a5(sna tshogs): shes rab kyi ni gzugs nas rnam pa zade mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba ra du rang bzhin med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang ba zhin med par shes par bya'o// gzugs la sogs
252a6(sna tshogs): pa'i chos rnams dus gsum du mi dmigs shing / ma bcings ma grol bar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad mnyam pa cid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam panyi 'o// 
252a7(sna tshogs): chos thams cad 'gag pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa zhi // chos thams cad mtshan ma med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med pa'o// chos
252a8(sna tshogs): thams cad skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed pa med pa'o// chos thams cad chad pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ched pa med pa'o// chos zang 'ang ba red
252b1(sna tshogs): pas// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba med pa'o// chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad
252b2(sna tshogs): rtag pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa med pa nyid do// / 
252b3(sna tshogs): chos thams cad don gcig pa nyid pas// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252b4(sna tshogs): phyin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// mdor na thams cad mtshan ma dang / rang bzhin dang / ngo bo nyid las 'das pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa'o// de lta bas
252b5(sna tshogs): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngag so// tad+ya thA/ oM pradz+re pradz+nye ma hA pradz+re tsan+da pradz+dza/ sarba shA sa ka ri swA hA/ chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung / de
252b6(sna tshogs): nyid kun rdzob bden pa ste/ rang bzhin med cing spros med pas// de nyid don dam spyad yul// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
252b7(sna tshogs): zla ba'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor deng / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
252b8(sna tshogs): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra li tA sa mar
253a1(sna tshogs): b+ha dra ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu bzang po theg pa chen po'i mdo ngas
253a2(sna tshogs): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga ta dgon par chos kyi snying por bzhugs te/ phyogs bcul sa
253a3(sna tshogs): zhing tshad mang grangs med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa dang thabs gcig/ thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i slan la
253a4(sna tshogs): mngar brnyes pa spyod pa la gnas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir la snyoms
253a5(sna tshogs): par bzhug so// ting 'dzin de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhang gi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa thams cad g.yo so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
253a6(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag gis dbul reg par gyur to// de ltar reg pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha rnams kyis mthun pa
253a7(sna tshogs): tshig su bcad pas bstod pa// 'jig rten sgron ma lha'i'i dpe las 'das// yon tan rgya mtsho lta bur pha rol phyin// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba khyod kyis sgrol// ded dpon khyod
253a8(sna tshogs): kyis rab tu bskyab par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bslab par bya ba'i
253b1(sna tshogs): don shes rab dang 'dra ba dang / shes rab yin pa la bslab par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po shes rab 'dra ba ni/ 'jig rten tshogs kyi lam
253b2(sna tshogs): pa rnams kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o// shes rab yin pa ni sa dang po yan chad kyi shes rab gang yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub
253b3(sna tshogs): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po thog pa
253b4(sna tshogs): chen po'i mdo rdzogaste// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA bA ra mi tA badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yA ra sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa
253b5(sna tshogs): chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thar/ sa cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs
253b6(sna tshogs): ta/ de'i tshe 'khor der bang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'dug pa stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas shes
253b7(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la 'di ltar bslab
253b8(sna tshogs): bar bya ste/ chos thams cad skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par ba'o// gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa'i ngos thams cad rang bden pa yings pa dang
254a1(sna tshogs): mtshan pa mchis pa dang / dngos po dang bral ba dang / mi dmigs pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// rang sdang ba nying ra
254a2(sna tshogs): dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// lag na rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs
254a3(sna tshogs): rgyas thams cad kyi yum ste/ rigs pa chen po'i sngags 'di ni tshig ni 'di dag go// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ri mu ni/ ma hA mu na yau swA hA/ su zhig shes rab kyi pa
254a4(sna tshogs): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams gzung bar 'gyur// de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// mi 'amapa
254a5(sna tshogs): thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi 'bras bu tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang dus rtag tu 'grogs
254a6(sna tshogs): par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phag na rdo rje dang
254a7(sna tshogs): lha dang ma dang lha mo yid dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa she
254a8(sna tshogs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag 'jo rje'i ming zag pa chen po rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA badz+ra ka tu ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa shes ra kyi
254b1(sna tshogs): pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
254b2(sna tshogs): 'das rgyal po'i khang na bzhugs te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig go// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dug pa de stan
254b3(sna tshogs): las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos gang dang ldan na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
254b4(sna tshogs): bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang / 
254b5(sna tshogs): sdug bsngal bar shes pa dang / spros pa thams cad dang dang bral ba'i chos nyid du ldan pa dang / thams cad miHga mi dmigs par bsgom pa'o// gzhan yang
254b6(sna tshogs): chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na shes rab skye ba'i rgyu ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ da po gang zag chos sla ba'i mkha na po rten pa dang / gnyis pa de'i dam pa'i chos nyan
254b7(sna tshogs): ba dang / gsum pa don la 'jug cing sems pa dang / bzhi pa gzhan la tshul bzhin du ston par mos pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab skye ba'i rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byung
254b8(sna tshogs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan ma ring
255a1(sna tshogs): // pa dang / ma bcings pa dang / ma grol ba dang / snang ba med pa dang / mun pa meng pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de
255a2(sna tshogs): bas na bang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / gnas
255a3(sna tshogs): pa rang po'i rdul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bcom lda ra'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po'i
255a4(sna tshogs): ngo nyid du bsgom/ shes rab skye ba'i rgyu la mos/ mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i/ shes rab don la bsrang bar bya'o// bcom ldan
255a5(sna tshogs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs pa lha dang / mi dang / lho ma yin dang / dri
255a6(sna tshogs): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags
255a7(sna tshogs): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo rdzogs s+ho// // dge'o// // bkra shis// / 
1a1(rdo gcod): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gtsang ba bzug
1b1(rdo gcod): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra tshe dzi ka pradz+nyA ba ra ma ngan ma ma hA yan sutra/ ber skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje bcad pa nas
1b2(rdo gcod): bya ba theg pa rin po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di sang bdag gis thos pa ngas gcig ra/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
1b3(rdo gcod): yeng na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyir gyi kun dga' rab ni/ dge slong stong 'i sa brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems
1b4(rdo gcod): dpa' rin po rab tu mang po dag rang / 'bas gcig tu bzhugs pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi yas thabs dang chos gos sku la gsal
1b5(rdo gcod): lhung bzed bsnams nas/ ma'am yong kyi grong khyer chen por bsod sems la gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa na yang kyi grong khyar chen par bsang sems
1b6(rdo gcod): bya gshegs nas thal zas gsol nas zas kyi byi ba mdzad de/ zas phyi ma'i bsod sngams spangs pas lhung bzed dang chos nges bag las zhangs bsal pa ba
1b7(rdo gcod): pa dkrol ma nga bangs nas su drang bar srung ste dras pa mangs du bdaga' ma bzhugs sa rangs rag srang mang pos brtsamapa'ang kyi lams
2a1(rdo gcod): stongs kyi phyir gshegs nas zhal zas gsol te zas kyi bya ba mdzad/ zas phyi ma'i bsod sems spangs nas lhung brjed
2a2(rdo gcod): dang chos gos bzhag nas/ zhal bsil te gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du
2a3(rdo gcod): bzhag nas bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong mang pos bcom lnga ni 'das ga le ba di ri dong ste lhags
2a4(rdo gcod): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos pag 'tshal te lan gsuM bskor babs nas pogs gcig tu
2a5(rdo gcod): 'khod// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de zhing du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar stan las
2a6(rdo gcod): langs te bra gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus po g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs
2b1(rdo gcod): thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
2b2(rdo gcod): rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i dam pa ji snyed pas pan gdags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa byang chub sems dang
2b3(rdo gcod): sems dpa' chen po rnams la yongasu gtad pa'i dam pa ji snyed pas yongasu gtang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lagaso// 
2b4(rdo gcod): bcom ldan 'das bang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar gnas par bgyi// ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rab tu bzung bar
2b5(rdo gcod): bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom lda na 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka 'astsal to// rab 'byor legaso lag so// rab 'byor de
2b6(rdo gcod): de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa'i dam bos pa na gdag so// de bzhin go sheg
2b7(rdo gcod): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas yongs su gtad do// rab 'byor de'i pir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la
2b8(rdo gcod): zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar slob par ba ba dang / ji ltar sems rab tu gzung
3a1(rdo gcod): bar bya ba sa khang la bshad po/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rang 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa
3a2(rdo gcod): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'bor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg po la yang dag par zhugs pas/ 'di snyam
3a3(rdo gcod): du bdag gis sems can ji tsam sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa/ sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngol las skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus
3a4(rdo gcod): skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzug sa can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/ sems
3a5(rdo gcod): con gyi khams ji tsam sems can du gdags bas brtag pa de dag thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
3a6(rdo gcod): yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o// de ltar sems can tshad med pa yongasu ma ngon las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med do snyam du
3a7(rdo gcod): sems bskyod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can du 'du shes 'jug na/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi ba ba'i par/ 
3a8(rdo gcod): de ci'i phyir na na/ rab 'byor gang sems can du 'du shes 'jug gam/ srog tu 'du shes 'jug gi maM/ gang zag tu 'jo shes 'jug na de byang chub sems dpa'o zhes mi ba
3b1(rdo gcod): / yang ra 'byong byang chub sems da 'angos po la mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin par byam// cil yang mi langs par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// gzugs la
3b2(rdo gcod): yango ma gnas par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro ngo // reg pa dang / chos la yang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// rab 'byor ci nas kyang
3b3(rdo gcod): mtshan mar 'du shes pa la yang mi gnas par de ltar byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa' bang mi gnas par sbyin pa
3b4(rdo gcod): sbyin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ rab 'byor tshe da gzung bar sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// ra ba 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ bar phyogs kyi mamakha'
3b5(rdo gcod): tshong gzung bar sla snya ma 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
3b6(rdo gcod): 'ber de bzhin du lce dang nub dang / bang dang / steng dang / 'og gi pags dang / phyogs mtshams dang / pogs bcu'i nam mkha'i tshad gzung bar sla snyam mam/ rab
3b7(rdo gcod): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang la yang mi
3b8(rdo gcod): gnas par sbyin pa sbyin phra de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ rab 'byor tshad gzang bar sla ba ma yin pa'i ngo ro// rang 'bar 'di snyam du sems mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de
4a1(rdo gcod): bzhin gshegs par blta bar ba snam mam/ rab byar gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ngani ralab so// mtshan dun sum tshogs pas
4a2(rdo gcod): bzhin gshegs par blta bas bgyi lag so// de ci'i slad du de na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhes gang gsungs pa de nyid/ mtshan phun sum
4a3(rdo gcod): tshogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor ji tsam du
4a4(rdo gcod): mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de tsam du brdzun no// ji tsam du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa med pa de tsamau du mi brdzun te/ da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la
4a5(rdo gcod): mtshan dang mtshan ma meng bar blta'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
4a6(rdo gcod): 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ sems can gong la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa dag
4a7(rdo gcod): la yang dag par 'ju shes bskyed par 'gyur ba 'byung ba lta mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus
4a8(rdo gcod): lnga brgya'i tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ sems can gang la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig po bang po dag la yang dag par 'du shes
4b1(rdo gcod): bskyed par 'gyur ba 'byung ba lta mchis lags sam zhes khyod de skad ma zer cig/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig
4b2(rdo gcod): par 'gyur ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa dag 'byung ste/ rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa
4b3(rdo gcod): sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur bas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrad pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'bor sangs
4b4(rdo gcod): rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byas shing sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'byung ngo // 
4b5(rdo gcod): rab 'byor yang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa dag la sems dad pa gcig tsam rnyed par 'gyur ba de ngag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhan to// 
4b6(rdo gcod): rab 'bor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ ra ba 'byor sems can de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed cing yongs
4b7(rdo gcod): sdang por 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ bdag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / sems
4b8(rdo gcod): can du 'dushes pa ma yin/ srog tu 'du shes pa mo yin/ gang zag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
5a1(rdo gcod): chen po de dag kyang che su 'du shes pa dang / chos med par yang 'du shes mi 'jug ste/ de dag ni 'du shes mang par yang 'jug par ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
5a2(rdo gcod): zhem/ rab 'bar gal te bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ chesu 'du shes 'jug na yang bzhing de dag gis bdag tu 'dzan par 'gyur zhing / sems can du 'dza
5a3(rdo gcod): pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i per ro// la li te chos bdag med par 'du shes 'jug na yang de 'di de dag gis bdag tu 'dzin par
5a4(rdo gcod): 'gyur zhing / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / sreg tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'ber bang chub
5a5(rdo gcod): sems dpa' ches kyang leg par bzung bar mi ba ste/ chos ma yin pa yang mi bzung ba'i phyir ro// de bas na de las dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pas ches
5a6(rdo gcod): kyi rnam grangs 'di gzings lta bur shes pa rnams kyi chos rnams kyang spang bar ba na/ chos ma yin pa rnams lta sa smos so// zhes gsungs// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das
5a7(rdo gcod): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'bor 'od ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chu
5a8(rdo gcod): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang yod snyam mom/ de bzhini gshegs pas chos de gang yang bstan snyam mam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
5b1(rdo gcod): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'jal ba ltar ma/ de bzhin
5b2(rdo gcod): gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de dgang yang ma mchis lag so// de bzhin gshegs pas
5b3(rdo gcod): bstan pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis lag so de ci'i slad na na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos de gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am/ bstan pa
5b4(rdo gcod): gzung du ma mchis brjed du ma mchis te/ de ni chos kyang mi lags/ chos ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa'i smrada'o// de ci'i slad du nen/ 'phags pa
5b5(rdo gcod): zag rnams ni 'dus ma bas kyis rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'a bya 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
5b6(rdo gcod): kyi bu mo gang pa la nig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che snga bdun gyis rab tu gang bar bas te spen pa byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
5b7(rdo gcod): bu me pa'i de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bsred snyam mam/ rab 'bor gyis bsil po/ bcom ldan 'das mang logs/ bang bar gshegs pa mang lang
5b8(rdo gcod): so rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de de'i gaMni las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyed do// de ci'i srang zhe na/ bsed nams kyi phung po de ring bang po ma mchis
6a1(rdo gcod): ba'i slad du ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bsad nams kyi phung po / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber
6a2(rdo gcod): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu gang gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu yang bar bas te sbyin pa smin pa bas/ gong
6a3(rdo gcod): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa rnam bzung nas gzhan dag la 'tshang cing yang dag par rab tu ston na/ gni nga las bsod nams
6a4(rdo gcod): kyi phung po ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bsku // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bani na gshegs pa dgra bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
6a5(rdo gcod): sangs rgyas rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub ni 'di las byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'di las skyes pa'i
6a6(rdo gcod): phyir ro// de ci'i par zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes pa ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag med par rang bzhin gshegs
6a7(rdo gcod): bos gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nas pag/ 'tha' bar 'di snyam du sems/ rgyun rdzozhugs pa 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun tu zhugs
6a8(rdo gcod): pa'i 'bras bu the ba snyam du sems snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gosal ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du nam/ bcom ldan 'das de na chos
6b1(rdo gcod): yang zhugs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// gzugs la yang ma zhugs/ sgra la yang ma lags/ dri la yang ma lags/ ro la yang
6b2(rdo gcod): ma lags/ reg pa la yang ma lags/ chos rnams la yang ma zhugs te/ des na rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyan
6b3(rdo gcod): tu zhugs pa 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa snyam du sems par gyur na/ de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lag so// sems can du
6b4(rdo gcod): 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur lal// bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis pa/ 'a sngal te/ rab 'bar 'do sam dus
6b5(rdo gcod): lan cig pir 'ong ba'ang snyam du bdag gis lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// snyam du sems snyam mam/ rab 'bor gyis gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'a
6b6(rdo gcod): de ni ma lagoso// de ci'i phyir ni na/ gang lan cig par 'ong bo nyid zhugs pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na lan cig par 'ong ba zhes bgyi'o// 
6b7(rdo gcod): ldan 'das gal ta lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'di snyam du bdag gis lan cig pir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du sems par gyur na/ de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur la
6b8(rdo gcod): se sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gong zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snya
7a1(rdo gcod): du sems/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'di snyam du bdag gis phyir mi 'ong 'bras bu thob po snyam du sems snyam mam/ rab 'bar gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
7a2(rdo gcod): 'das de ni ma lag so// de ci'i slad du na na/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba nyid du zhugs pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ de'i phyir par mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi'i// bcom
7a3(rdo gcod): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thobo snyam du sems snyam 'am/ rab 'bor
7a4(rdo gcod): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang dag dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i sring
7a5(rdo gcod): du// bcom ldan 'das gal te dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob snyam du sem sa par gyur na/ de nyid nga'i bdag tu 'dzin par
7a6(rdo gcod): 'gyur lags so// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
7a7(rdo gcod): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnam kyi mchog tu bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod chags dang bral ba dgra bcom
7a8(rdo gcod): pa lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du bdag ni dgra bcom pa'o snyam du mi sems lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa'ing
7b1(rdo gcod): thob snyam du sems par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la rigs kyi bu rab 'bor ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog yin te/ ci la yang mi gnas pas
7b2(rdo gcod): na nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa zhes lung mi ston lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshangs pas nga
7b3(rdo gcod): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las gang blangs pa'i chos de gang yang yod snyam mam/ rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
7b4(rdo gcod): ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// de bzhin gshegs pas nga ba nyin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las gang blangs pa'i
7b5(rdo gcod): chos de gang yang yong le ma mchis lag so// bcom lnga na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig 'di skad bdag gi
7b6(rdo gcod): zhing bkod pa rnams smra bo nas zer na de ni mi bden par smra'o// de ci'i phyir za na/ rab 'byor zhing bkod pa rnams zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ bkod pa de dag meng par
7b7(rdo gcod): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar mi
7b8(rdo gcod): gnas par sems bskyed par bya ste/ tsau la yang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// gzugs la yang mi gnas par sems bsred par bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ra dang ra
8a1(rdo gcod): bya dang ches la yang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig lus 'di lta bur gyur te/ 'di lta sA ra
8a2(rdo gcod): rgyal po raM rab tsam du gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ lus de che ba yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus de che ba lags// 
8a3(rdo gcod): bde bar gshegs pa lus de che ba lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas de dngos po ma mchis par gsungs pa'i slad ste/ des na lus de che ba zhes
8a4(rdo gcod): bgyi'o// da dngos po ma mchis pas nges na lus zhes bya 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems/ gang+ga'i klung gi ba
8a5(rdo gcod): ma ji snyed pa gang+gA'i klung yang de snyed kho nar gyur la/ de dag gi bye ma gang yin pa de dag mang ba yin sna pa 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa
8a6(rdo gcod): klang de dag nyid kyang mang lags na/ de dag gi bye ma lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor khod mos par bya'o// khod kyis kheng
8a7(rdo gcod): du chud par bya'o// gang+gA'i klung de dag gi bi ma dza snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang
8a8(rdo gcod): bar byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems// skyes pa 'am
8b1(rdo gcod): bud med nga gzhi nga las bsod nams mang du bskyed sngam mama~M/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mngal ga so// skyes
8b2(rdo gcod): pa 'am bud med de gni de las bsod nams ming du bskyed pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rin pa
8b3(rdo gcod): che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi
8b4(rdo gcod): grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcang ba tsam bzung nas/ gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bshad de yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ de nyid gni de las bsod
8b5(rdo gcod): rnams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// yang rab 'bor sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam gra ngas 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa
8b6(rdo gcod): tsam 'den tam ston pa'i sa pogs de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'dzag rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na su zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dri
8b7(rdo gcod): ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te sa po
8b8(rdo gcod): ngan ston pa 'am/ bla ma lta bu gang yang rung bar gnas so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
9a1(rdo gcod): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'did mang lags 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang
9a2(rdo gcod): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste 'di ltar zungs shig/ de ci'i phyir
9a3(rdo gcod): zhen/ rab 'bor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gsungs pa de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir te/ des ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa zhes bya'o// 
9a4(rdo gcod): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos de gang yang yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das pa
9a5(rdo gcod): bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
9a6(rdo gcod): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de mang ba yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i rdul de mang
9a7(rdo gcod): legaso/ kheng par gshegs pa mang lag so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i rdul gang la gos pa nga rdul ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas
9a8(rdo gcod): gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na sa'i rdul zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gang lags pa de dag khams ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa
9b1(rdo gcod): slad du ste/ des na 'jig rten gyis khams zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
9b2(rdo gcod): sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu blta bar bskum 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
9b3(rdo gcod): ldan 'das de ni ma lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang dag de bzhin go shegs pas gsungs pa ngag mtshan ma mchis
9b4(rdo gcod): par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ nges na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam sa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
9b5(rdo gcod): sprul pa/ rab 'byor skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gis lus gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snyed yongasu btang ba bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
9b6(rdo gcod): las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa tsam du bzung ste gzhan dag la yang dag par bsten no// de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs meng dadag tu
9b7(rdo gcod): med pa bskyed// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma phyung ste/ des mchim phyis nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
9b8(rdo gcod): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nga bzhin gshegs po ji snyed pas gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// 
10a1(rdo gcod): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ye shes skyes chun chung bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon nam yang mthos lagaso// bcom ldan 'das mdo snga
10a2(rdo gcod): bshad pa 'di la gang dag yang dag par 'du shes bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du tha na/ bcom ldan
10a3(rdo gcod): 'das yang dag par 'du shes pa gang lags pa nga'ong 'du shes ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na yang dag par 'du shes zhes de bzhin gshegs pas grangaso// bcom
10a4(rdo gcod): ldan 'das bdag ni chos ci rnam kangs 'di bshad pa la rtog cing mos pa ni/ bdag la ngo mtshar ma lags kyis bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i cha slang ma'i dus lnga brgya
10a5(rdo gcod): tha ma la sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag na
10a6(rdo gcod): ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur lagaso// yang bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'a gyur zhing / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu
10a7(rdo gcod): 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes 'jug par 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / 
10a8(rdo gcod): sreg tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa gang lags pa de nyid 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
10b1(rdo gcod): rnams ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
10b2(rdo gcod): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di bshad pa la mi skrag cing mi dngang la kun tu dngang par mi 'gyur ba dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan
10b3(rdo gcod): par 'gyur ro// de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'ber pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ pha rol tu zin pa dam pa gang de bzhin gshegs pas
10b4(rdo gcod): gsungs pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'i pir te/ des na pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa zhes pa'o// yang
10b5(rdo gcod): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de nyid pha rol tu phyin pa mang de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor gang gi tshe ka ling
10b6(rdo gcod): ka'i rgyal pos/ nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe bya dag tu 'du shes sam/ sems can du 'jushes ma/ sreg tu 'du shes sapa/ gang zag tu
10b7(rdo gcod): 'du shes kyang ma byung zhing / nga la 'ju shes ci yang med la 'du shes med par gyur pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bar ba la 'de'i tshang la blang
10b8(rdo gcod): tu 'du shes byung sa/ de'i chag meng sems kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung la/ sems can du 'ju shes pa dang / srog tu 'grubs pa da gang zab tu 'ang shes byang ma
11a1(rdo gcod): gnang sems kyi 'jugs kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'breng ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na cha rabs lnga brgyad bzed pa smra ba zhes pa
11a2(rdo gcod): drang srod du gyur pa de'i tshe na yang / nga la bdag tu 'du shes ma byung / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / sreg tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes ma byung ngo // 
11a3(rdo gcod): rab 'bar de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem
11a4(rdo gcod): bskyed par bya'o// gzugs la yang mi gnas par sems bskyed par ba'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa la yang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// 
11a5(rdo gcod): chos la yong mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// chos med po la yang mi gnas par sems bskyod par bya 'o// ci la yang mi gnas par sems
11a6(rdo gcod): bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas pa gang yin pa de nyid mi gnas pa'i pir te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la yang
11a7(rdo gcod): mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// zhes gsungaso// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sbyin pa yongasu gtang bar bya'o// 
11a8(rdo gcod): sems can du 'ju bas pa gang yin pa de nyid kyang 'du shes med pa ste/ ngo bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad ces gang dag gsungs pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyang med pa
11b1(rdo gcod): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bar de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsungs/ bden par gsung ba/ de bzhin nyid gsung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni log par gsung ba ma yin
11b2(rdo gcod): ba'i bor ro// yang rab 'khor nga bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ bstan pa de la bden pa yang med/ rdzun pa yang med// rab 'byor
11b3(rdo gcod): 'di lta ste/ dper na mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig mun par zhugs na ci yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du gang dngos por lhung bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' blta bar
11b4(rdo gcod): ba'o// yang rab 'bor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam langs tenyi ma shar nas mig dang ldan pa'i mi'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ngag mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang
11b5(rdo gcod): dngos por ma lhung bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' blta bar ba'o// yang rab 'byor rig sa kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
11b6(rdo gcod): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klol pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu sten pa
11b7(rdo gcod): ngag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// 
11b8(rdo gcod): yang rab 'byer skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe lus gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snyeng yongasu gtong la/ phyed kyi dus dang / pi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang lus gang+gA
12a1(rdo gcod): klung gi bye ma snyeng yongs su gtong ste/ rnam grangs 'di lta bur bskal pa be ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lus yongs su gtong ba bas
12a2(rdo gcod): gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi spong na/ de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed na/ gang gis yi ger bris nas
12a3(rdo gcod): len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos yang
12a4(rdo gcod): rab 'bor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa meng de/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chos kyi rnam
12a5(rdo gcod): grangs 'di ni theg pa mchog la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / theg pa phul du phyi na po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams
12a6(rdo gcod): kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byang
12a7(rdo gcod): pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can de dag pom
12a8(rdo gcod): cad na ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gnal du
12b1(rdo gcod): med pa dang / chang med pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad nga'i byang chub phrag pa la thogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dam
12b2(rdo gcod): pa la mos pa rnams kyis chos kyi rnam par grangs 'di mnyan par mi nus te/ bdag tu lto ba rnams kyis ma yin/ sems can du lnga ba rnams kyis ma yin/ srog tu
12b3(rdo gcod): ba rnams kyis ma yin zhing / gang zag du lta ba rnams kyis mnyen pa dang blang ba dang bzung ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed mi nus te/ de ni gnas med pa'i phyir
12b4(rdo gcod): ro// yang rab 'byor sa phyogs gang na mdo sde 'di ston pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jog rten gyi mchod pa bya bar 'os par 'gyur
12b5(rdo gcod): sa bogs dpag ba bar 'os pa dang / skor ba ba bar 'o sa par 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ra ro// yang rab 'bor rigs kyi bu 'am
12b6(rdo gcod): rigs kyi bu ma gong dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshi gau 'di dag len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ni mnang bar 'gyur
12b7(rdo gcod): shin tu mnar bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can de dag ni tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba'i las ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba gang dag bas pa de dag cha
12b8(rdo gcod): 'di zhing la mnar bas/ tshe rabs lnga ma'i mi dge ba'i las ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba gang dag byas pa de dag byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang thob par
13a1(rdo gcod): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa ma/ de bzhin ga
13a2(rdo gcod): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mor me mdzad kyi snga rol gyi yang ches lnga rol na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa ba ni ngag byung ba ngas ma
13a3(rdo gcod): bar byas te/ ma mnyes par ma bas nas thugs 'byung bar ma byas te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ngas mnyes par bas nas thugs 'byung bar ma ba
13a4(rdo gcod): gang yin pa dang / pi ma'i dus lnga brgya'i tha mar gyur pa na/ mdo sde 'di lon pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
13a5(rdo gcod): byed pa gang yin pa las rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang
13a6(rdo gcod): grangs dang chang dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang zla dang rgyur yang mi bzong ngo // rab 'byor gal te de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bsod nams kyi phung ba
13a7(rdo gcod): ji skad rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nga dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ngas brjod na/ sems can rnams mos myes por 'gyur cing sems 'bra
13a8(rdo gcod): par 'gyu'o// ma ba 'byor chos kyi rnam gras 'di sam gyis mi byas/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab po'ing dungs pa / 
13b1(rdo gcod): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ji ltar
13b2(rdo gcod): gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rab tu bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la 'di
13b3(rdo gcod): skad ces bka' stsal te/ rab 'ber 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa
13b4(rdo gcod): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs mya ngan las bzla'o// da ltar sems can tshad med pa rings su ma ngan las 'das kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las
13b5(rdo gcod): 'das par gyur pa med do// snyam du sems bskyed paraba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bar ba la de byang chub sems dpa' sems can du 'ju shes
13b6(rdo gcod): 'jug na de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi ba'o// gang zag gi bar du 'du shes 'jug na yang / de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ba'i pir ro// de ci'i pir zhe na/ 
13b7(rdo gcod): rab 'ber bong chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bye ba'o chas dgang yang med pa'i bor ro// rab 'ber 'di ji sam du sems/ de bzhi na gshes
13b8(rdo gcod): bas ba'im yong babs pa par me mdzad las pa blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byab chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos yang yang mams
14a1(rdo gcod): de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar gyis 'di skad ces bsel te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
14a2(rdo gcod): gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ches de gang yang ma mchis so// 
14a3(rdo gcod): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'bar de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
14a4(rdo gcod): bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chu ba tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshes de nga
14a5(rdo gcod): yang med do// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gsheg sa pas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe sa de 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na/ de bzhin brtse
14a6(rdo gcod): pa mar ma mdzad kyis ngal bram ze'i khe'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur
14a7(rdo gcod): zhes lung mi sten pa zhig no/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
14a8(rdo gcod): pa'i chos de gang yang med pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga la bram ze'i khe'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
14b1(rdo gcod): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur nas lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa ni/ yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla
14b2(rdo gcod): drags yin pa'i pir ro// yang rab 'bor gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
